input: Ìrètí wà pé, ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò gbáradì ní òwúrọ̀ òní fún ìfigagbága ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ mìíràn tí yóò wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ ọ̀hún àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Atletico de Madrid, tí ó ń kópa nínú ìdíje La Liga lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain, ní pápá ìṣeré Godswill Akpabio láago mẹ́fa ìrọ̀lẹ́ òní.
target: The Super Eagles are expected to train this morning as the friendly with La Liga outfit Atlético de Madrid will take place at Godswill Akpabio International Stadium this evening, starting from 1800 hours.

input: Ighalo sọ̀rọ̀ ṣaájú ìfigagbága ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ tí wọn yóò gbá pẹ̀lú England, England ní àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó dára púpọ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, a ò ní fojú tẹ́ńbẹ́lú wọn rárá.
target: Speaking on the upcoming friendly against England,England have a very good and fantastic team, we are not going to underrate them.

input: Mò ń fojú sọ́nà fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà torí pé, mo ti kópa rí nínú ìdíje ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì EPL, tí mo sì fẹ́ràn láti rí àwọn ojú tí a jọ wà tẹ́lẹ̀.
target: I am looking forward to that game because I have played in the EPL before and I’ll like to see some familiar players on the pitch again.

input: Iwobi fẹnu ko pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ LG láti jẹ́ aṣojú wọn.
target: Iwobi signs up for LG ambassador

input: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Alex Iwobi ti bọwọ́ lu ìwé ìbásepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí ìpèsè ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé LG Electronics, láti jẹ́ aṣojú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.
target: LG Electronics has signed Super Eagles winger, Alex Iwobi as its official brand ambassador.

input: Chelsea fàgbà hàn Manchester United láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje FA Cup.
target: Chelsea beats Manchester United to win FA Cup

input: Chelsea fàgbà han Manchester United láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje FA Cup, nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tí ó wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Saturday.
target: Chelsea beat Manchester United 1-0 to lift the FA Cup thanks to Eden Hazard’s penalty at Wembley on Saturday to salvage a disappointing season.

input: Ní báyìí, pípàdánù ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje FA ọ̀hún sọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, ló fihàn pé, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester United parí sáà yìí láìgba ife-ẹ̀yẹ kankan.
target: Now loosing the trouphy of the game into the hand of the Chelsea, shows that Manchester football team ended this season without any trouphy.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí balógun ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Gary Cahill ṣe sọ, A ṣisẹ́ takuntakun láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ yìí, láti yẹ́ sáà wa tọdụ́n yìí sí, látàrí àìṣe déédé wa nínú ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìdíje yòókù tí a kópa nínú rẹ̀.
target: According to the captain of the team, Gary Cahill we worked earnestly to win the trouphy to honor this season this year as a result of our consistency in all our different games we played.

input: Romelu Lukaku tí ó jẹ́ ẹni tí ó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù ságbọ̀n júlọ̀ fún ikọ̀ Manchester United ni sáà yìí, kò láǹfààní láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà látàrí ìfarapa ráńpẹ́ tí ó ní.
target: Romelu Lukaku who was the highest goal scored for Manchester United this season does not have the opportunity to take part in the competition from the beginningdue to the injury he sustained.

input: Dalung- Super Eagles nílò àtìlẹyìn tí ó péye ṣaájú ìdíje àgbááyé.
target: Super Eagles need total support from Nigerians, NFF – Dalung

input: Mínísítà tó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ ere ìdárayá àti ìdàgbàsókè àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Nàìjííríà, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Solomon Dalung ti pè fún àtìlẹyìn tí ò lẹ́gbẹ́ látọwọ́ àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà fún àṣeyọrí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles ṣaájú ìdíje àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: Minister of Youth and Sport, Solomon Dalung has appealed to Nigerians to show solidarity and support to ensure the success of the Super Eagles at the FIFA World Cup in Russia

input: Dalung sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ eléyìí tí amúgbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ pàtàkì rẹ̀ lóri ́ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbódegbà àti ìfitónilétí, Nneka Ikem-Anibeze, gbé jáde lọ́jọ́bọ Thursday nílùú Abuja, Ó gbóríyìn fún ikọ̀ ọ̀hún fún gbogbo akitiyan wọn, ìbáṣepọ̀ àti ìwà akínkanjú tí wọ́n ní ṣaájú ìdíje náà tó ń ti ń sún mọ́lé báyìí.
target: Dalung in a statement issued on Thursday in Abuja by his Special Assistant, Media, Nneka Ikem-Anibeze, thanked the team for their commitment, patriotism and unity of purpose as the World Cup approaches.

input: Ó wá rọ, àpapọ̀ ikọ̀ ọ̀hún àti àwọn tọ́rọ̀ kàn nínú ikọ̀ náà pé, kí wọ́n ríi dájú láti kópa dáradára nínú ọ̀kan-ò-jọkan ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ wọn tí wọn yóò gbá fún ìgbáradì ní kíkún ṣaájú ìdíje ńlá náà.
target: He urged the team and other stakeholders to continue to produce the desired results in their friendly games and aspire to win the cup.

input: Mo gbósùbà káreláí fún ìjọba àpapọ̀ látàrí àtìlẹyìn wọn lọ́lọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan fún ikọ̀ yìí.
target: I sincerely commend the Federal Government and Nigerians for their unflinching support and solidarity to the team and officials.

input: Ìjọba fi dá àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè lójú láti ṣètò bí ó ti tọ́ àti bí ó ti yẹ ṣaájú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ wa yòókù tí a ó gbá pẹ̀lú, DR Congo, England àti Czech Republic.
target: The government assured Nigerians to do the needful before the friendly competitions to be played withDR Congo, England and Czech Republic.

input: Bákan náà, mínísítà tuń kí àjọ NFF, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá gbogbo fún akitiyan wọn, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó rọ̀ wọ́n láti pa ọkàn wọn pọ̀ sójúkan fún ìgbáradì ìdíje náà.
target: Also the Minister commended NFF, the workers and the coaches for their efforts then he appealed to them to unit their heart for the training.

input: DR Congo kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lù méjídínlọ́gbọ̀n tí yóò kojú Super Eagles.
target: DR Congo releases 28-man list for Nigeria friendly

input: Nàìjíríà dípò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta mú nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA.
target: Nigeria retains 47 position in FIFA ranking

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àbájáde ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA tí ó jáde lọ́jọ́bọ Thursday, Nàìjíiríà dipò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta mú lágbàáyé nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ ọ̀hún tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jáde.
target: As projected, Nigeria has retained her 47th position in the latest FIFA rankings

input: Ipò àtẹ ọ̀hún ni àjọ FIFA gbé jáde lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára wọn lọ́jọ́bọ Thursday, eléyìí tí orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta di ipò wọn mú gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣe wà tẹ́lẹ̀.
target: The rankings released on FIFA website on Thursday recorded few changes as the first 47 countries retained their previous positions.

input: Orílẹ̀-èdè Germany, Brazil àti Belgium wà lórí òkè téńté tábìlì ọ̀hún ní ìtẹ̀léǹtẹ̀lé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Argentina, Croatia àti Iceland wà ní ipò karùn-ún, ipò kejìdínlógún àti ipò kejìlélógún.
target: Germany, Brazil and Belgium were on the top three positions, while Super Eagles world cup foes Argentina, Croatia and Iceland were on fifth, 18th and 22nd positions.

input: Ipò àtẹ mìíràn yóò tún jáde lọ́jọ́ keje oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: The next rankings would be released on June 7.

input: Oborududu yóò dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ ní New York.
target: Oborududu joins team Nigeria in New York

input: Blessing Oborududu tí ó ní òṣùwọ̀n kílógíràmù méjìdínláàádọ́rin 68kg, ti balẹ̀ sílùú New York láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ yòókù fún ìdíje ìfigagbága tí yóò wáyé lọ́jọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: Nigeria’s Blessing Oborududu 68kg has arrived in New York to join her teammates for the Beat The Streets Invitational Wrestling Tournament’’ beginning on May 17.

input: Oborududu kò láǹfààní láti bá àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ lọ lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Sunday, látàrí ìdojúkọ ìwé ìrìn àjò tí ò ní.
target: Oborududu was unable to travel on Sunday with her teammates due to visa problems.

input: Ó dara pọ̀ mọ Ọdúnayọ Adékúoróyè tí ó ní òṣùwọ̀n kílógírámù mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta 57kg àti Aminat Adéníyì tí ó ní òṣùwọ̀n kìlógírámù méjílélọ́gọ́ta 62kg, fún ìfigagbága tí yóò wáyé ní gbàgede
target: She joined Odunayo Adekuoroye 57kg and Aminat Adeniyi 62kg for the competition that will hold at the popular Times Square, New York.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Purity Akuh, tí ó jẹ àkọ́nimọ̀ọ́jà ikọ̀ náà,Inú mi dùn púpọ̀ pé, ikọ̀ mi ti pé báyìí.
target: Speaking from New York, Purity Akuh, the wrestlers’ coach to the competition, said he was happy to finally have his full team on ground.

input: Mo ń fojú sọ́nà fún ìdíje World Championships tí yóò wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Hungary, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìfigagbága yìí yóò ṣe àǹfààní fún wa láti fi gbáradì ṣaájú ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún.
target: I’m looking forward for the World Championships in Hungary later this year, and this tournament will also serve as preparation.

input: Atletico fàgbà han Marseille pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóódo.
target: Atletico flogs Marseille 3-0 to win third Europa cup

input: Atamátàsé agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Atletico Madrid, Antoine Griezmann ti ran ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Europa League fún ìgbà kẹta báyìí, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n fàgbà han ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Olympique de Marseille pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóódo 3-0, lọ́jọ́rú Wednesday.
target: Atletico Madrid striker Antoine Griezmann struck twice as they beat hapless Olympique de Marseille 3-0 on Wednesday to win the Europa League for the third time.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àmì-ayò kínni wáyé látàrí àṣìṣe agbábọ́ọ̀lù ẹ̀yìn Marseille Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa, eléyìí tí balógun ikọ̀ Madrid, Gabi já gbà kí ó tó ṣè ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò ọ̀hún fún Griezmann ní ìṣẹ́jú kọkànlélógún sáà àkọ́kọ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà.
target: Marseille dominated the opening stages but gifted Atletico the lead when Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa failed to control goalkeeper Steve Mandanda’s pass out and Gabi intercepted before setting Griezmann free to score in the 21st minute.

input: Marseille pàdánù àǹfàaní lóríṣiriṣi láti dá àmì-ayò náà padà, ṣùgbọ́n ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà tún wá burú jáì lẹ́yìn tí agbábọ́ọ̀lù àárín ikọ̀ náà, Dimitri Payet fara pa, tí ó sì jáde níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú kọkànlélọ́gbọ̀n sáà kínní ọ̀hún.
target: Marseille had wasted a chance to take a fourth-minute lead when Valere Germain skewed his shot wide with only Jan Oblak to beat and it got worse for them when playmaker Dimitri Payet left the field injured in floods of tears in the 32nd minute.

input: Ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́rin gbàrà tí sáà kejì bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, Koke tún ṣe ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò mìíràn fún Griezmann.
target: Four minutes after the re-start, Koke assisted Griezmann to score a goal.

input: Gabi gbá àmì ayò mìíràn wọ̀lé láti sọ àpapọ̀ èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún di mẹ́ta sóódo 3-0.
target: Gabi added a late third goal and the final score was 3-0

input: Brazil kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lu mẹ́tàlélógún fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.
target: Brazil names provisional 23-man squad

input: Rohr kéde ọgbọ̀n agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí yóò kópa fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.
target: Rohr announced a 30-man list of footballers for the World cup

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Gernot Rohr ti kéde àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí yóò lọ ṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: Nigeria Coach Gernot Rohr has announced the country’s provisional squad for the upcoming FIFA World Cup in Russia.

input: Nàìjííríà yóò kojú Argentina, Turkey nínú ìdíje àgbááyé FIBA.
target: Nigeria face Argentina, Turkey in FIBA World Cup

input: Nàìjíírìà yóò máa kojú ikọ̀ Australia, Argentina àti Turkey nínú ìpele kejì ìyíkoto ìfigágbaga ìdíje àgbááyé 2018 FIBA Women Basketball tí yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ kejìlélógún oṣù kẹsàn-án títí di ọgbọ̀n ọjọ́ ọdún tí a wà yìí, nílùú Tenerife, lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain.
target: Nigeria have been drawn against Australia, Argentina and Turkey in Group B of the 2018 FIBA Women’s Basketball World Cup from September 22 to 30 in Tenerife, Spain.

input: Australia dipò kẹrin mú nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ FIBA tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jáde, Turkey wà ní ipò keje, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Argentina dipò karùndínlógún mú lágbàáyé.
target: Australia are ranked fourth in the latest FIBA rankings while Turkey are seventh and Argentina are 15th in the world.

input: Ikọ̀ Tigress wà ní ipò mẹ́tàdínlógójì lágbàáyé, tí wọ́n sì di ipò karùn-ún mú nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà.
target: Coach Sam Vincent’s D’Tigress are currently ranked 37th in the world and fifth in Africa.

input: Senegal bọ́ sí ìpele kẹrin, tí wọn yóò sì máa kojú Latvia, USA àti China.
target: Senegal were drawn in Group D alongside Latvia, the USA and China.

input: Nàìjííríà pegedé fún ìdíje àgbáyé FIBA fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lọ́dún 2006, ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò jáwé olúborí nínú ìfigagbága kankan tí wọ́n fi já kúrò nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún.
target: Nigeria qualified for their first World Cup in 2006 but failed to win any game at the competition.They were eliminated from the group stage.

input: Bákan náà, gẹ́gẹ́ bí àjọ NBF Nigeria Basketball Federation, wọ́n ní, ikọ̀ Tigress yóò pàgọ́ sílùú Atlanta, Georgia, lórilẹ̀-èdè USA fún ìgbáradì ìdíje náà ní kíkún.
target: Meanwhile, the Nigeria Basketball Federation on Sunday said the team would camp in Atlanta, Georgia, USA for their World Cup preparations.

input: Agbẹnusọ̀rọ̀ àjọ ọ̀hún, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Afọlábí Òní sọ pé, wọn yóò kéde àpapọ̀ ikọ̀ tí yóò máa kópa fún ìdíje ọ̀hún ní kété tí ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé Russia 2018 bá parí.
target: The federation in a statement by their spokesman Afolabi Oni said they would release a provisional list of invited players for the competition after the Russia 2018 World Cup.

input: Mancini fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit.
target: Roberto Mancini quits Zenit as the Club Manager

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit St Petersburg, Roberto Mancini ti gbà láti fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ó fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú àdéhùn tí ó rọ̀ mọ́ ìfisẹ́ sílẹ̀ náà.
target: Manager Roberto Mancini has agreed to leave Zenit St Petersburg by mutual consent.

input: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàlélógójì ọ̀hún ni ìrètí wà pé yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ láìpẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.
target: The 53-year-old has been heavily linked with the vacant manager’s job of the Italian national team.

input: Bákan náà, Ó tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester City, Inter Milan, kí ó tó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit lọ́dún 2017, tí ó sì ran ikọ̀ ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti parí ìdíje sáà yìí sípò karùn-ún lórí tábìlì.
target: Former Manchester City and Inter Milan boss Mancini took charge of Zenit in June 2017, and they are fifth in the Russian Premier League.

input: Zenit àti Roberto Mancini fẹnu kò láti fòpin sí ìbáṣepọ̀ wọn.
target: Zenit and Roberto Mancini agree to an early end to the manager’s contract,.

input: Ní báyìí, Mancini yóò kúrò nínú ikọ̀ ọ̀hún láìgba owó gbàmábìínú kankan.
target: The contract will be terminated by mutual consent without any compensation payable.

input: Edmund fàgbà han Djokovic nínú ìdíje Madrid open.
target: Edmund stuns Djokovic in Madrid open

input: Tiger Woods yóò kópa nínú ìdíje British open.
target: Tiger Woods to feature in British open

input: Tiger Woods ti sọ pé, òun yóò kópa nínú ìdíje mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́jọ British Open tí ìgbìmọ̀ náà yóò ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀, eléyìí tí yóò wáyé ní gbàgede Carnoustie lọ́jọ́rú.
target: Former world number one Tiger Woods has confirmed his entry for the 147th British Open at Carnoustie, the tournament organisers announced on Wednesday.

input: Woods, ọmọ ọdún méjílélógójì náà, ẹni ti ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje ọ̀hún fún ìgbà mẹ́ta ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n kò tíì láǹfààní láti kópa nínú ìdíje náà láti ọdún 2015 látàrí ìfarapa tí ó ní.
target: Wood, the 42-year-old has lifted the Claret Jug three times in his career but has not contested the sport’s oldest major championship since 2015 due to injury.

input: Bákan náà, Woods tí gba ife ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́rìnlá ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó tún kópa nínú ìfigagbága méje ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ lọ́dún yìí, lẹ́yìn àṣeyọrí iṣẹ́ abẹ́ ọ̀pá ẹ̀yìn èyí tí ó làkọjá nínú oṣù kẹrin ọdún tí ó kọjá.
target: Woods, a 14-time Major champion, has played seven times this year on his comeback after a successful spinal fusion operation last April.

input: Ní ìparí, ìdíje British Open náà yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ kọkàndínlógún, oṣù keje títí di ọjọ́ kejìlélógún oṣù kan nàà ọdún tí a wà yìí July 19 to July 22.
target: The British Open will be played from July 19 to July 22.

input: Àṣìṣe aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ Ac Milan, Gianluigi ṣokùnfà bí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ṣe pàdánù.
target: AC Milan goalkeeper Gianluigi's blunder made them loss the match

input: Àṣìṣe aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Ac Milan Gianluigi Donnarumma ti ṣokùnfà bí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ṣe pàdánù ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àṣekágbá ìdíje Coppa Italia sọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Juventus nínú ìfigagbága tí ó wáyé lọ́jọ́bọ Thursday.
target: A double blunder by Ac Milan goalie goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma ensured that Juventus won the Coppa Italia on Thursday.

input: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́̀ ẹ̀yìn Juventus Medhi Benatia, gbá àmì ayò méjì wọlé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Douglas Costa gbá àmì ayò mìíràn wọlé.
target: Central defender Medhi Benatia struck twice for Juventus and Douglas Costa scored another goal.

input: Nikola Kalinic ṣe àṣìṣe gbá àmì ayò kan mìíràn wọnú agbọ̀n rẹ̀, láti sọ àpapọ̀ èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà di àmì ayò mérin sóódó.
target: An own goal by substitute Nikola Kalinic made them to lose 4-0

input: Dennerby kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n tí yóò kojú Gambia.
target: Dennerby, the Super Falcons coach lists 26 for Gambia

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Falcons yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìgbáradì ní kíkún fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìpegedé ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Áfíríkà 2018 táwọn obìnrin tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà, eléyìí tí wọn yóò gbá pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Gambia.
target: The Super Falcons return to camp on Thursday ahead of their 2018 Women’s Africa Cup of Nations qualifier against Gambia.

input: Ní báyìí, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Thomas Dennerby ti pe agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ́n, tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn tí ó fi ilẹ̀ òkèrè ṣe ibùgbé.
target: And Nigeria coach Thomas Dennerby has invited 26 players, including overseas-based players.

input: Ribery sún àsìko rẹ̀ síwájú sí nínu ikọ̀ agbabọ́ọ̀lù Bayern Munich.
target: Ribery extends contract with Bayern Munich

input: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern Munich, Franck Ribery ti sún àsìkò rẹ̀ síwájú síi nínú lkọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern lẹ́yìn tí ó bọwọ́lu ìwé ìṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ ọlọ́dún kan.
target: Bayern Munich winger Franck Ribery has signed a one-year contract extension until the end of next season.

input: Ọmọ ọdún márùnlélọ́gbọ̀n ọ̀hún ní àmì ayò márùn-ún péré nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mọ́kàndínlógún tí ó gbá ní sáà yìí láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ kẹjọ ìdíje Bundesliga.
target: The 35-year-old, who was out of contract at the end of the season, scored five goals in 19 appearances to win his eighth Bundesliga title with Bayern.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí adarí ẹ̀ka ètò ìdárayá fún Bayern, Hasan Salihamidzic ṣe sọ, Inú wa dùn púpọ̀ pé Franck ṣì fẹ́ dúró tìwá.
target: We’re very pleased that Franck is staying with us, Bayern sporting director Hasan Salihamidzic said in a statement.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Ribery dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern lọ́dún 2007 láti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Olympique de Marseille.
target: Ribery joined Bayern Club since moving from Olympique de Marseille in 2007.

input: Ribery sọ pé, inú mi dùn pé máa tún kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù yìí fún sáà kan sí i,
target: I’m very happy that I’ll get to play for this great club for another year, he said,

input: Munich ti jẹ́ ilé fún èmi àti ẹbí mi láti ọjọ́ pípẹ́, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ó jẹ́ ìwúrí fún mi.
target: Munich has long since become home for me and my family and I’m therefore very proud

input: Eagles ṣetán fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé – Balogun
target: Eagles ready for World Cup – Balogun

input: Atamátàsé agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Leon Balógun sọ pé, ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí pé àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ òun kò ní ìfarapa kankan ṣááju ìdíje àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
target: Nigeria defender Leon Balogun says it is crucial his fellow Super Eagles team-mates stay injury-free ahead of the 2018 World Cup.

input: Nínú ìdíje àgbááyé náà, eléyìí tí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles jẹ́ ikọ̀ kínní tí ó kọ́kọ́ pegedé fún ìdíje ọ̀hún nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà, ni wọn yóò máa wàákò pẹ̀lú Argentina, Croatia àti Iceland.
target: Nigeria, the first side from Africa to seal a spot in Russia, have been drawn in Group D alongside Argentina, Croatia and Iceland.

input: Balógun wa sọ pé, kí okun àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù pé yóò ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ púpọ̀ láti ṣàṣeyọrí nínú ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún.
target: Balogun says the fitness of players will be key to having a successful campaign this summer.

input: A ní ikọ̀ tí o le fakọyọ ní Russia, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni a lè dé ìpele tí ó lápẹrẹ tí a bá ní okun àti ìlera tí ó pé.
target: We have a team capable of doing well in Russia and this team can perform to expectations if we have everyone in great shape,.

input: Mo mọ̀ pé, ìfarapa máa ń wáyé nípasẹ̀ kíkópa lórí pápá, tí a bá sì ní oreọ̀fẹ́ láti má nìí ìfarapa kankan tí ìdíje náà yóó fi bẹ̀rẹ̀, èyí yóò ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún wa lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀.
target: I know injuries come with football and if we are very lucky not have it, then all the players in Nigerian colours have the spirit to fight for success until the end.He said.

input: Nínú irúfẹ́ ìdíje ọ̀hún tí ó wáyé sị̀kẹyìn, eléyìí tí balogun ikọ̀ náà tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Joseph Yobo àti Vincent Enyeama tukọ̀ rẹ̀, ikọ̀ ọ̀hún dé ìpele kejì nínú ìdíje ni Brazil kí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù France kó tó já wọn kúro.
target: At their last appearance, the experienced Super Eagles led by Joseph Yobo and Vincent Enyeama reached the second round in Brazil before losing to France, and Balogun says the current team is focussed on success.

input: Bákan náà, ni ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò tún kojú England lọ́jọ́ kejí oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí, ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley ṣaájú ìfigagbága ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ kẹyìn pẹ̀lú Czech Republic lọ́jọ́ kẹfà sí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún.
target: World Cup-bound England will be Nigeria’s opponents on June 2 at Wembley ahead of the final warm-up fixture against Czech Republic on June 6.

input: Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà NPFL.
target: The result of the football competitions in Nigeria NPFL.

input: Èyí ni èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà Nigeria Professional Football League NPFL, tí ó wáyé lópin ọ̀sẹ̀
target: This is the result of the Nigeria Professional Football League NPFL which came up last weekend

input: Super Eagles yóò fakọyọ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia – Yobo
target: Super Eagles will excel at Russia 2018 – Yobo

input: Balógun ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles tẹ́lẹ̀ rí, Joseph Yobo, sọ pé, òun ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò fakọyọ nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: Nigeria’s ex-international, Joseph Yobo, says he believes the current squad of the Super Eagles will excel in the forthcoming FIFA World Cup in Russia.

input: Yobo gba ikọ̀ ọ̀hún níyànjú láti má ṣe jáyà fún ikọ̀ akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn kankan tí wọn yóò jọ máa figagbága, tí ń ṣe Croatia, Argentina àti Iceland.
target: Yobo said the team should not be intimidated by others in their group — Croatia, Argentina and Iceland.

input: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn náà tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Yobo gbóríyìn fún akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Gernot Rohr, fún akitiyan rẹ tí ó sà láti kó ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan agbábọ́ọ̀lu tí ó dáńtọ́ jọ láti figagbága fún ààyè ṣaájú ìdíje ọ̀hún.
target: The former defender, Yobo commended the effort of the Coach, Gernot Rohr, in bringing together gifted players to fight for jerseys ahead of the mundial.

input: Yobo wá yànàná ìdojúkọ tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún kojú ní ẹ̀ka agbábọ́ọ̀lù aṣólé, pé ikọ̀ náà yóò la ìdojúkọ ọ̀hún kọjá tí wọn yóò sì fakọyọ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: Yobo said he was of the opinion that the challenge in the goalkeeping aspect would be overcome and the team would do the nation proud in Russia.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Yobo ṣe sọ, Mo ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé ikọ̀ Super Eagles yìí yóò fakọyọ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: I believe the current squad of the Super Eagles would excel in Russia, Yobo said.

input: Ó fikún un pé, agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀dọ́ tí ó pọ̀ nínú ikọ̀ náà yóò ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ nínú ìdíje náà.
target: He noted that with the team having a rich blend of youth and experience

input: Roberto Mancini fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú àjọ FA láti tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.
target: Roberto Mancini has agreed to become new Italy coach

input: Roberto Mancini ti fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Italy láti jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún.
target: Roberto Mancini has reached an agreement to become the next Italy coach, according to multiple media reports on Tuesday.

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit St Petersburg náà, ṣe ìpàdé pọ̀ pẹ̀lú aṣojú àjọ FA orílẹ̀-èdè Italy, Alessandro Costacurta àti olùdarí àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà, Gabriele Oriali fún wákàtí méjì gbáko nílùú Rome nírọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ Ajé.
target: The Zenit St Petersburg manager met with the Italian FA sub-commissioner Alessandro Costacurta and team manager Gabriele Oriali for over two hours in Rome on Monday evening.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn Gazzetta,Mancini bọwọ́ lu ìwé láti ṣe iṣẹ́ ọlọ́dún méjì, èyí tí yóò mú un wà nínú ikọ̀ ọ̀hún títí di ọdún 2020, tí yóò sì máa gba mílíọ́nù mẹ́rin owó ilẹ̀ òkèrè euro lọ́dọọdún.
target: Gazzetta News agency said the federation had offered the former Manchester City manager a two-year contract until 2020 worth four million euros 4.8million a year.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Mancini ṣe sọ, ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí fún mi lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ láti jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ọ̀kan lára ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè tí ó lààmìlaaka jùlọ nínú eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé,
target: Coaching the national team would be prestigious and a source of pride for me because Italy are one of the most important teams in the world, Mancini said.

input: Ní báyìí, ìrètí wà pé, Mancini yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní kété tí ìdíje orílẹ̀-èdè Russia bá parí ní ọjọ́ kẹtàlá oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: Mancini is expected to take over the national team after the final round of Russian domestic fixtures on May 13 and before the May 20 deadline set by the Italian FA.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, fún gbogbo sáà ọdún mẹ́tàdínlógún tí Mancini ti yan iṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá láàyò, Ó tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester City gba ife ẹ̀yẹ́ ìdíje ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì EPL fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lọ́dún mẹ́rìnlélógójì ní ọdún 2012.
target: During his 17-year coaching career Mancini led Manchester City to their first English title in 44 years in 2012.

input: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó tún gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Serie A mẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Inter Milan, tí ó sì tún tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Fiorentina àti Lazio.
target: He also won three Serie A titles with Inter Milan and Italian Cups with Inter, Fiorentina and Lazio.

input: Lára àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá mìíran tí wọ́n rò pé wọ́n kójú òṣùwọ̀n láti tukọ̀ ọ̀húAntonio Conte àti Claudio Ranieri.
target: Among the other names being touted for the position are Antonio Conte and Claudio Ranieri.

input: Real Madrid pegedé sínú àṣekágbá ìdíje UEFA champions league.
target: Real Madrid sneak into third straight champions league final

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lu Real Madrid ti pegedé sínú aṣekágbá ìdíje UEFA champions league fún ìgbà kẹta léra wọn báyìí.
target: Real Madrid have qualified for their third consecutive UEFA champions league final, but only just.

input: Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún parí sí àmì-ayò méjì-méjì 2-2, tí àpapọ̀ àmì ayò náà sì jẹ́ àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí mẹ́ta 4-3.
target: The European champions held German side FC Bayern Munich to a 2-2 draw, but sneaked through 4-3 on aggregate.

input: Joshua Kimmich ló gbá àmì ayò kínní wọlé, tí Karim Benzema sì dá àmì- ayò ọ̀hún padà ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́jọ sí àmì ayò àkọ́kọ́.
target: Joshua Kimmich gave Bayern a third minute lead, but Los Merengues responded through Karim Benzema who headed in the equalizer eight minutes later.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ní kété tí sáà kejì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, àṣìṣe aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern, Sven Ulreich ni ó ṣokùnfà bí Benzema tún ṣe gbá àmì-ayò kejì wọlé.
target: Barely after resumption of the second half, Bayern keeper Sven Ulreich’s huge error ultimately proved decisive as his failure to clear a lose pass allowed Benzema to extend the Madrid side’s lead to two points.

input: Bí ó ti lẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, James Rodriguez gbá àmì ayò mìíràn wọ̀lé, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ju ọkà lọ.
target: James Rodriguez raised hopes with a close-range finish to tie the match at 2-2.

input: Ní báyìí, Real Madrid yóò kojú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá jáwé olúborí nínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù AS Roma tabi Liverpool, èyí tí yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Stadio Olympico nílùú Rome ní àṣálẹ́ ọjọ́rú.
target: Real Madrid will meet the winner of the AS Roma or Liverpool clash, which will be played at the Stadio Olympico on Wednesday in Rome.

input: Wọn yóò ṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé VAR nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ Nàìjííríà àti England - Pinnick
target: VAR to be used for England, Nigeria friendly- Pinnick

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún yóò wáyé lọ́jọ́ kejì oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí, fún ìgbáradì ní kíkún ṣaájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbáyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
target: The football match will take place on June 2 in a warm-up game ahead of the World Cup in Russia.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Pinnick ṣe sọ, Wọn yóò ṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé VAR nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ wa pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè England.
target: VAR will be used for our friendly against England, Pinnick said.

input: Bákan náà, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Gernot Rohr náà bọwọ́lù ṣíṣe àmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé ọ̀hún pé, yóò ṣàtìlẹyìn ńlá fún olùdarí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà.
target: Eagles Coach Gernot Rohr has also backed VAR, saying it will make refereeing fairer.

input: Dalung fẹ́ kí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀¸ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ Eagles àti DR Congo wáyé nílùú Abuja.
target: Dalung wants Eagles to play the football match with DR Congo in Abuja

input: Dalung sọ ọ̀rọ̀ náà di mímọ̀ lásìkò tó ń bá àwọn akòròyìn sọ̀rọ̀, lẹ́yìn ayẹyẹ ìṣíṣọ lójú eégún ìdíje eré ìdárayá abẹ́lé tí yóò wáyé nílùú Abuja lọ́jọ́ Ajé.
target: Dalung was speaking with media after the opening ceremony of grassroots sports festival in Abuja on Monday.

input: Ní báyìí, A ń wo pápá ìṣeré ìlú Port Harcourt, tí àtúnṣe pápá ìṣeré ìlú Abuja kò bá tíi parí.
target: We are looking at Port Harcourt if by then we are unable to complete work at the stadium here in Abuja.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Super Eagles yóò máa gbáradì láti gbá ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀ré pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè Czech Republic, England àti DR Congo fún ìpalẹ̀mọ́ ìdíje àgbááyé náà.
target: The Super Eagles, who will face Argentina, Croatia and Iceland at the Russia 2018 World Cup, will play friendly matches with Czech Republic and England after the DR Congo friendly.

input: Ó di dandan kí ìfigagbága pẹ̀lú Anthony Joshua kó wáyé – Wilder
target: Anthony Joshua fight will definitely happen – Wilder

input: Òǹdíje olùjà ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà, Deontay Wilder sọ pé, òun kò lérò pé ìfigagbága pẹ̀lú Anthony Joshua kò ní wáyé, bí ó tilẹ̀ jé pé, òun kó àádọ́ta mílíọ́nù owó dọ́là sílẹ̀ fún ìfigagbága ọ̀hún, èyí tí ikọ̀ náà kọ̀ láti gbá.
target: Deontay Wilder says he does not believe his unification fight with Anthony Joshua is in any doubt, despite his 50m offer not being accepted by his prospective opponent’s team.

input: Ní ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí, Wilder kó àádọ́ta mílíọ́nù owó dọ́là 50m sílẹ̀ fún Joshua láti figagbága pẹ̀lú rẹ̀, tí ó sì fi gbèdéke ọjọ́bọ Thursday sílẹ̀ láti ṣè’pinnu.
target: This week, Wilder offered Joshua 50m to accept the fight and set him a deadline of Thursday to make a decision.

input: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, Joshua gbà láti kojú Wilder, lẹ́yìn tí ó fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára Instagram, pàpàsíbẹ̀ ọjọ́ ìfigagbága ọ̀hún wáyé, tí ó sì tún ré kọjá lọ.
target: Joshua responded to Wilder on Instagram, saying let’s roll.But despite the Briton’s apparent willingness to fight, the deadline came and went without a deal.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, pẹ̀lú gbogbo ìdúnàádúrà ìfigagbága náà, Wilder ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé ìfigagbága ọ̀hún yóò sì wáyé.
target: However, despite the latest hurdle in negotiations, Wilder is sure the fight is still going to go ahead.

input: Ancelotti kọ̀ láti ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.
target: Ancelotti rejects Italy job as a coach

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn ṣe sọ lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Sunday, wọ́n ní, Carlo Ancelotti ti kọ̀ láti ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.
target: Carlo Ancelotti has turned down the offer to take over as Italy coach, according to press reports on Sunday.

input: Ancelotti, tí ó jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lu Bayern Munich tẹ́lẹ̀ rí, ṣe ìpàdé pọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Italy ní Rome lósẹ̀ tí ó kọjá.
target: Ancelotti, who was sacked by Bayern Munich inSeptember, had met with Italian Football Federation officials in Rome last week.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn Corriere dello, wọ́n ní, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, ọmọ ọdún méjídínlọ́gọ́ta ọ̀hún fi ọjọ́ méjì ronú láti sọ ìpinnu rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n ibi pẹlẹbẹ náà lọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún jásí.
target: But Corriere dello Sport reported that despite the 58-year-old being offered the job he had decided to turn it down after taking a few days to consider his decision.

input: Bákan náà, ó ṣeéṣe kí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Arsenal tún fiṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá lọ Ancelotti, lẹ́yìn tí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ ọ̀hún Arsene Wenger ti pinnu láti fi ikọ̀ náà sílẹ̀ bí sáà yìí bá parí.
target: Ancelotti has also been linked with taking over as Arsenal manager when Arsene Wenger steps down at the end of the season.

input: Ẹ̀we, oríṣiríṣi ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ni Ancelotti ti tukọ̀ rẹ̀, tí ó fimọ́ ife ẹ̀yẹ lọ́lọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan, Ó tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lu Chelsea, Real Madrid, AC Milan, Juventus, Roma àti Paris Saint-Germain.
target: The Italian coach, who has also managed Chelsea, Real Madrid, AC Milan, Juventus, Roma and Paris Saint-Germain, has three Champions League titles to his name as a coach.

input: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Ó gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Champions League mẹ́ta ni France, Germany àti England.
target: He has also won the three leagues in Italy, France, Germany and England.

input: Àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá mìíràn tí àjọ ọ̀hún tún ní lọ́kàn láti pèRoberto Mancini, Antonio Conte àti akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Leicester rí, Claudio Ranieri, lẹ́ni tí ó ń tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Nantes báyìí.
target: Among the other names being touted are Zenit St Petersburg coach Roberto Mancini, Chelsea boss Antonio Conte and former Leicester coach Claudio Ranieri, now in charge of French club Nantes.

input: Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà NPFL.
target: Match Day 19 fixtures results

input: Ìdíje NNL yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.
target: NNL season to commence saturday

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan lára àwọn tọ́rọ̀ kàn gbòngbòn nínú ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń sàkóso ìdíje Nigeria National League NNL, Lawrence Katken, sọ pé, ìdíje sáà 20172018 yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Àbáméta.
target: Lawrence Katken, the Chief Operating Officer of Nigeria National League NNL, says the league’s 20172018 season would start on Saturday.

input: Ìdíje ọ̀hún ni ìrètí wà tẹ́lẹ̀ pé, yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ nínú oṣù kẹta ọdún yìí, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n sún un síwájú látàrí àfikún àwọn ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù mìíràn tí ó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ìdíje ọ̀hún.
target: The league was earlier scheduled to start on March 3, but the addition of new clubs led to a postponement.

input: Lọ́dún tó kọjá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù méjìlélọ́gbọ́n ló kópa nínú ìdíje yìí, ṣùgbọ́n lọ́dún yìí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ogójì ni yóò kópa nínú ìdíje náà.
target: Last year 32 clubs participated in the league, but this year we have about 40 clubs in the league.

input: Àwọn ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tuntun ti yóò dara pọ̀ mọ́ ìdíje náà, ni ó wá láti inú ìdíje Nigeria Professional Football League NPFL.
target: The new clubs are those relegated from the Nigeria Professional Football League NPFL.

input: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni àwọn mìíràn gbà ìgbéga láti inú ìdíje Nationwide League One NLO, tí àwọn mìíràn sì ra ààyè ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù mìíràn láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ìdíje ọ̀hún.
target: Some were promoted from the Nationwide League One NLO and some of them bought other clubs’ slots to join the league.

input: Àwọn ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù mìíràn ọ̀húKada Football Club, Malumfashi FC, Bimo FC, Real Stars FC, Stores FC àti Rovers FC.
target: The new clubs include Kada Football Club, Malumfashi FC, Bimo FC, Real Stars FC, Stores FC and Rovers FC.

input: Ó fikún un pé, ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń sàkóso ìdíje náà gbà láti jẹ́ kí àwọn ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tuntun darapọ̀ mọ́ ìdíje ọ̀hún, ní pàápàá jùlọ láti mú òfin mìíràn, èyí tí yóò dá ìdíje ọ̀hún dúró gbàrà tí ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé bá bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀.
target: He said the competition’s organising body had agreed on the introduction of an abridged league system for the season.

input: A ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ òfin tuntun náà láti fi àyè sílẹ̀ fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé 2018tí yóò wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: We introduced the abridged system in order not to be interrupted by the Russia 2018 World Cup matches.

input: A ó gba ìsinmi ráńpẹ́ ní kété tí ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé bá bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, tí a ó sì bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ padà tí ìdíje náà bá wá sí ìparí.
target: We will go on break as soon as the World Cup starts, and we will resume immediately after the global football event.

input: Real Madrid fàgbà han Bayern pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò méjì sóókan.
target: Real Madrid rally to pip Bayern Munich 2-1

input: Super Eagles yóò gbáradì ní kíkún fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ pẹ̀lú England - Mikel
target: Super Eagles will be ready for England friendly - Mikel

input: Balógun ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Mikel Obi sọ pé, Super Eagles gbáradì sílẹ̀ fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnse ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún yóò gbá pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè England, èyí tí yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley nílùú London, lọ́jọ́ kejì inú oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yii.
target: The Captain of the Super Eagles, Mikel Obi says the Super Eagles will be at their best for the prestige international friendly match against England at Wembley Stadium in London on June 2.

input: Kò sí ọ̀nà mìíràn fún wa ju pé, kí á gbáradì ní kíkún sílẹ̀ fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé náà tó ti ń súnmọ́ etílé.
target: There will be no option for us other than to give our best with the FIFA World Cup fast approaching.

input: Ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ ọ̀hún yóò wáyé ní ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì sí ìdíje FIFA bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé ọ̀hún.
target: The match comes up only two weeks before our first match at the FIFA World Cup.

input: Nàìjííríà yóò wàákò pẹ̀lú Croatia nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún, ní pápá ìṣeré Kaliningrad lọ́jọ́ kẹrìndínlógún oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: Nigeria take on Croatia in their first match at the 21st FIFA World Cup finals at the Kaliningrad Stadium on June 16.

input: Bákan náà, ìfigagbága pẹ̀lú Iceland yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Volgograd lọ́jọ́ kejìlélógún inú oṣù kẹ̀fà.
target: In their other Group D matches, they will then face Iceland at Volgograd on June 22.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìwé pélébé ìwòran fún ìfẹsèwọnsẹ̀ tí yóò wáyé láàrín England àti Nàìjíría ti wà lọ́jà fún títà báyìí, tí ìye rẹ̀ jẹ́ pounds márùndínlógójì 35 pounds owó ilẹ̀ òkèrè.
target: Meanwhile, tickets for the EnglandNigeria match are still selling, with the lowest ticket going for 35 pounds.

input: Rohr Uzoho yóò fakọyọ nínú ìdije bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.
target: ‘Uzoho will shine at the world cup’ – Rohr assures

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Gernot Rohr fọwọ́ sọ̀yà pé, aṣọ́lé tuntun fún ikọ̀ Super Eagles Francis Uzoho yóò kópa dáradára nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: Super Eagles coach Gernot Rohr is upbeat that young goalkeeper Francis Uzoho will come good at the World Cup in Russia as first choice.

input: Mi ò lérò pé Uzoho yóò ní ìṣòro kankan láti kojú irú agbábọ́ọ̀lù bi Messi àti àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù jàǹkànjàǹkàn mìíràn, nítorí pé lẹ́yìn tí ó kojú Lewandowski, Aguero àti Di Maria, Ó ṣe dáradára, èyí ni ó fún mi ní ìdánilójú pé yóò fakọyọ nínú ìdíje náà.
target: I don’t believe he will get stage fright playing against the likes of Messi and other big names in Russia, because after playing against the likes of Lewandowski of Poland, Aguero and Di Maria of Argentina, I am optimistic that he would rise to the occasion in Russia.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Rohr fikún ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ pé, òun yóò ṣètò àpapọ̀ àgbábọ́ọ̀lù márùndínlógójì tí yóò kópa nínú ìdíje náà fún àjọ NFF lọ́jọ́ kẹrin oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: On his 35-man team list for the World cup, Rohr stated that he would submit the lost by May 4 to the NFF.

input: Òpin sáà - Arsene Wenger yóò fi ipò rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá Arsenal.
target: ‘End of an era ‘- Arsene Wenger to step down from Arsenal

input: Lẹ́yìn ọdún mejìlélógún ti akọnímọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Arsenal, Arsene Wenger ti ń tukọ̀ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀hún, Wenger ti kéde báyìí láti fi ikọ̀ náà sílẹ̀ lópin sáà tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ yìí.
target: Long-serving coach of Arsenal football club, Arsene Wenger, has announced he will step down at the end of the season, ending a near 22-year reign at the club.

input: Mo dúpẹ́ lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ fún àǹfààní láti sin ikọ̀ yìí fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọdún.
target: I am grateful for having had the privilege to serve the club for so many memorable years.

input: Mo tukọ̀ yìí tọkàn-tọkàn pẹ̀lú oyè kíkún.
target: I managed the club with full commitment and integrity.

input: Mo fé dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́, àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù, olùdarí gbogbo, àti pàápàá jùlọ àwọn olólùfẹ́ ikọ̀ yìí, fún àtìlẹyìn àti ìfẹ́ wọn tí ò lẹ́gbẹ̀ tí wọ́n fi hàn sí mi láti ìgbà tí mo ti ń tukọ̀ ikọ̀ yìí.
target: I want to thank the staff, the players, the Directors and the fans who make this club so special.

input: Mo rọ àwọn olólùfẹ́ wa láti túbọ̀ dúró ṣinṣin pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ yìí láti pàri sí ibi tí ó lápẹrẹ lórí tábìlì ní sáà yìí.
target: I urge our fans to stand behind the team to finish on a high.

input: Sí àwọn olólùfẹ́ wa, ẹ ri dájú láti ṣe ìtọ́jú àwọn ohun ìní wa gbogbo.
target: To all the lovers, take care of the values of the club.

input: Ifẹ́ mi àti àtìlẹyìn mi fún ikọ̀ yìí, yóò wà títí ayérayé.
target: My love and support for ever.

input: Antonio Conte gbóríyìn fún Victor Moses.
target: Antonio Conte commended Victor Moses.

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, Antonio Conte ti gbósùbà káreláí fún agbábọ́ọ̀lù rẹ̀ ọmọ bíbí àti agbábọ́ọ̀lù kan gbòógì nínú ikọ̀ Super Eagles Nàìjíríà, Victor Moses.
target: Chelsea chief coach Antonio Conte has commended one of his players who is a Nigerian and a special player in the team of the Nigeria Super Eagles, Victor Moses.

input: Moses gbá àmì ayò kan wọlè, tí ó sì ṣẹ̀ ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò kan láti ran ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea lọ́wọ́ láti jáwé olúborí nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Burnley ní pápá ìṣeré Turf Moor.
target: Moses scoered a goal which helped Chelsea football team to win the competition with Burnley football team at Turf Moor stadium.

input: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, Ashley Barnes dá àmì-ayò kan padà, láti sọ èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún di àmì ayò kan sí méji 1-2, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ ju ọkà lọ.
target: Though Ashley Barnes retured a goal to make the match one goal to two 1-2, but it was unfortunate.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Antonio Conte ṣe sọ,A kópa ribiribi lónìí, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, a ní ẹ̀tó sí àmì mẹ́tẹ̀ẹ̀ta ọ̀hún, ní pàápàá jùlọ, Moses ṣe gudugudu méje ọ̀hún yààyà mẹ́fa, léyìn tí ó gbá àmì-ayò kan wọlé tó sì tún ṣe ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò kan.
target: Accoding to Antonio Conte, ‘we played very well today and we deserve the three goals, most especially Moses tried so much after he had scored a goal and helped for another goal.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, jí jáwé olúborí nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ méji léra yóò ṣe ìrànwọ́ ńlá fún wa láti kópa dáradára nínú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ wa mìíràn tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
target: Winning in two in two consecutive games will help us a great deal to play very well in our forth coming competition.

input: Ní báyìí, Chelsea yóò lọ kojú Southampton nínú ìfigagbága ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá ìdíje FA lọ́jọ́ Àìkú.
target: Now Chelsea will face Southampton in the second league of the FA finals on Sunday.

input: Fún àwọn eré ìdárayá mìíràn ní èdè Gẹ̀ẹ́sì kan síi.
target: For other games in English language.

input: Djoliba já MFM kúrò nínú ìdíje CAFCC.
target: MFM kicked out of CAFCC by Djoliba

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù MFM FC tílù Èkó, lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti jáde kúrò nínú ìdíje CAF Confederation Cup CAFCC, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, èsì ìfigagbága ẹsẹ̀ kejì náà parí sí ọ̀mì ayò 0-0 pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Djoliba torílẹ̀-èdè Mali.
target: Nigeria’s MFM FC have been knocked out of the CAF Confederation Cup CAFCC, despite playing out a 0-0 draw against Djoliba of Mali in the second leg of their play-off tie.

input: Ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Modibo Keita ní Bamako, lẹ́yìn tí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Djoliba ti fàgbà han MFC tẹ́lẹ̀ nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ pẹ̀lú àmì ayò kan sóódo1-0.
target: The match played at the Modibo Keita Stadium in Bamako saw the hosts edged out the Olukoya Boys 1-0 on aggregate.

input: Bákan náà, oríṣiríṣi àǹfààní ni Oumar Kida, Siaka Bagayoko àti Mohammed Cisse pàdánù láti tún gbá àmì ayò wọlé.
target: Oumar Kida, Siaka Bagayoko and Mohammed Cisse also wasted clear-cut opportunities for the hosts in the entertaining encounter.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Enyimba FC tìlú Abá nìkan ló kù tí yóò máa sojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà nínú ìdíje náà, lẹ́yìn tí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Plateau United àti Akwa United ti já kúrò ṣaájú.
target: Nigeria now has only one representative, Enyimba FC of Aba, left in the competition following the ouster of Plateau United and Akwa United.

input: Plateau United pàdánù pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́rin sóódo 4-0 sọ́wọ́ USM Alger torílẹ̀-èdè Algeria lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, tí àpapọ̀ èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún sì parí sí àmì ayò márùn-ún sí méji 5-2.
target: Plateau United lost 4-0 against Algeria’s USM Alger on Tuesday, bowing out 5-2 on aggregate.

input: Bákan náà, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́pé wọ́n jaẃé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sóókan nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ẹsẹ̀ kejì pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Al Hilal, ṣùgbọ́n ikọ̀ náà já kúrò nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún látàrí èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́, eléyìí tí ó parí sí àmì ayò méjì sóódo.
target: Also, Akwa United beat Al Hilal of 3-1 in Uyo earlier on Wednesday but exited the competition on away goals rule having lost the first leg 2-0.

input: SWAN ẹ̀ka ìpínlẹ̀ Kwara ki Ọlárìnóyè kú oríire.
target: Kwara SWAN congratulates Olarinoye

input: SWAN sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ èyí tí igbákejì akọ̀wé ẹgbẹ́ ọ̀hún, Abdulrosheed Okiki gbé jáde nílùú Ìlọrin pé, ìyànsípò dókítà náà níí ṣe pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ takuntakun tí ó ń gbése àti àṣeyọrí rẹ̀ nínú ojúṣe tórílẹ̀-èdè yàn fún un.
target: The SWAN in a statement issued in Ilorin by its Assistant Secretary, Abdulrosheed Okiki said the appointment is a well-deserved going by his track record of achievements in previous national assignments.

input: SWAN fikún-un pe, ìyànsípò dókítà Ayọ̀dèjì Ọlárìnóyè ni ó jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà tí yóò ṣe irú àṣeyọrí báyìí, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni wọ́n gbàdúrà pé Ọlọ́run yóò fún un ní ọgbọ́n àti òye láti kojú àwọn ìṣòro lọ́lọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan bí ó bá ṣe ń wá sí iwájú rẹ̀.
target: The SWAN noted that Dr Ayodeji Olarinoye is the first Nigerian to achieve the feat and prayed that he succeed in the onerous task of championing anti-doping in football at the international level.

input: Lára àṣeyọrí Dókítà Ọlárìnóyè tí SWAN tó kà sí, ni iṣẹ́ takuntakun rẹ̀ tí ó ṣe nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tàwọn ọ̀dọ́ náà, tọdún 2013 àti 2015, èyí tí ikọ̀ Golden Eaglets gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje ọ̀hún wálé.
target: The SWAN recalled that Dr Olarinoye made his name as the team doctor for the 2013 and 2015 Golden Eaglets teams that won the FIFA Under-seventeen World Cup.

input: Dókítà Ọlárìnóyè jẹ́ ọmọ bíbí adarí ẹ̀ka àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀-òkèrè nínú àjọ NFF tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Dókítà Steve Ọlárìnóyè.
target: Dr Olarinoye is the son of retired civil servant and former Head of International Department of the NFF, Dr Steve Olarinoye.

input: Ipo ̀atẹNàìjííríạ̀ bọ́ sí ipò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta lágbàáyé.
target: Nigeria now ranked 47th

input: Nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé FIFA, tí ó ṣẹ̀sẹ̀ jáde, Nàìjííríà bọ́ sí ipò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta lágbàáyé, tí wọ́n sì di ipò kẹfà mú nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà pẹ̀lú àpapọ̀ àmì Òjìlélẹ́gbẹ̀ta-dín-márùn-ún tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ní.
target: Nigeria has moved five places up, now 47th in the world and sixth in Africa with 635 points in the April FIFACoca Cola rankings released.

input: Nínú ipò àtẹ kẹyiǹ tí ó jáde, Nàìjííríà wà ní ipò méjílélógójì lágbàáyé pẹ̀lú àmì ẹgbẹ̀wa-ó-lé mẹ́sàn-án lórí tábìlì.
target: In the previous rankings, Nigeria was on 52nd position with 609 points.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, orílẹ̀-èdè Tunisia ni ó wà lókè jùlọ ṣaájú orílẹ̀-èdè mìíràn nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n di ipò kẹrìnlá mú lágbàáyé, tí Senegal àti DR Congo sì di ipò méjídínlọ́gbọ̀n àti ipò méjídínlógójì ní ìtẹ̀léǹtẹ̀lé.
target: Meanwhile, Tunisia is the highest ranked African team on 14th place with Senegal and DR Congo on 28 and 38 positions respectively.

input: Germany sì dúro lókè téńté tábìlì ipò àtẹ lágbàáyé, tí Brazil sì tẹ̀lé wọn, Belgium bọ́ sí ipò kẹta láti ipò karùn-ún tí wọ́n wà tẹ́lẹ̀.
target: Germany still retains first place with Brazil following closely while Belgium who was fifth in the March rankings is now third.

input: Bákan náà, àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí Nàìjííríà yóò máa wàákò pẹ̀lú nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé 2018 tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà, Argentina, Croatia àti Iceland wà ní ipò karùn-ún, ipò kejìdínlógún àti ipò kejìlélógún ní ìtẹ̀lẹ́ǹtẹ̀lé.
target: Nigeria’s foes at the 2018 World Cup Argentina, Croatia and Iceland have plummeted from their current positions, with the South Americans now fifth, Croatia 18th and the Nordic country 22nd.

input: Ipò àtẹ́ àjọ FIFA mìíràn yóò tún jáde lọ́jọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: The next world ranking will be published on 17 May, 2018.

input: Real Madrid áti Bayern pegedé sípele kejì àṣekágbá ìdíje UEFA.
target: Real Madrid and Bayern Munich are moving to the semi-finals of UEFA

input: Pápá ìṣeré Jos yóò parí fún lílò nínú oṣù karùn-ún.
target: Jos stadium to be ready in May

input: Adarí àgbà Ilé-iṣẹ́ ìkọ́lé, BCC Tropical Nig.Ltd, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Plamen Iliev, tó ń kọ́ pápá ìṣeré ultra-modern stadium nílùú Jos sọ pé, iṣẹ́ yóò parí lórí pápá ìṣeré ọ̀hún nínú oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: The Jos ultra-modern stadium will be ready for continental matches in May, Mr Plamen Iliev, Director, BCC Tropical Nig.Ltd, handlers of the project, said in Jos.

input: Iliev sọ ọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún fún gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Plateau, Simon Lalong, lásìkò àbẹ̀wò rẹ̀ sí pápá ìṣeré náà, Ó sì fikún un pé gbogbo ohun èlò ni ìpèsè rẹ̀ ti wà nílẹ̀ báyìí láti kọ́ pápá ìṣeré ọ̀hún ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ìlànà tí àjọ CAF fi sílẹ̀.
target: Iliev told Plateau governor Simon Lalong, who paid an unscheduled visit to the site, that materials needed to meet Confederation of African Football CAF specifications had been acquired and were being installed.

input: Àwọn olólùfẹ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Pleateau united ti bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lu bí ikọ̀ náà ṣe pàdánu ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ẹsẹ̀ kejì wọn nínú ìdíje CAF Champions League látàrí pápá ìṣeré ìpínlẹ̀ Kano tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ti lọ gbá ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà, èyí tí ó jìnà sí ilé wọn.
target: Supporters of the Jos side have blamed the soccer outfit’s early exit from the CAF Champions League on the fact that it played its home matches in Kano, far away from home.

input: Gómìnà Simon Lalong, sọ pé ìjọba yóò ri dájú láti mú àtúnṣe bá pápá ìṣeré ọ̀hún gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìlànà tí àjọ NPFL fi sílẹ̀ láti tẹ̀lé ṣaájú kí ìdíje CAF mìíràn ó tó bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀.
target: In a brief remark, Lalong said that government had desired to meet all the conditions before the commencement of the NPFL and CAF competitions.

input: Òǹdíje ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon márùn-ún sọnù ní Commonwealth Games.
target: Cameroonian athletes missing at Commonwealth Games

input: Òǹdíje ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon márùn-ún tó ń kópa nínú ìdíje Commonwealth Games tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Australia, ni wọn kò rí mọ́ báyìí.
target: Five Cameroonian athletes competing at the Commonwealth Games in Australia have gone missing.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí alákòóso ikọ̀ tó ń sojú Cameroon nínú ìdíje náà.
target: The country’s Team Manager, Victor Agbor Nso, said on Tuesday.

input: Ògbẹ́ni Victor Agbor Nso, ṣe sọ lásìkò tó ń bá àwọn akọ̀rọ̀yìn CRTV sọ̀rọ̀ lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, Nso sọ pé, òǹdíje nínú ìrin gbígbé, Olivier Matam, oluja Ndzie Tchoyi àti Simplice Fotsala ni wọ́n yẹ kí wọ́n figagbága lọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun Tuesday, ṣùgbọ́n tí wọn kò rí wọn.
target: Nso told Cameroon state broadcaster CRTV that Weightlifter Olivier Matam and boxers Ndzie Tchoyi and Simplice Fotsala were due to compete on Tuesday but could not be found.

input: Nso fikún ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ pé, àwọn òǹdíje olùgbé irin mìíràn, tí a mọ̀ sí weightlifters, Aka Angeline Filji ati Mikoumba Petit David, ni wọn kò rí ní Gold Coast.
target: He added that two other weightlifters Aka Angeline Filji and Mikoumba Petit David, had earlier gone missing from the games at the Gold Coast, but did not specify when.

input: Sụ̀gbọ́n, ní báyìí ọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún ti wà lọ́wọ́ àwọn ọlọ́pàá Australia.
target: He explained that Australian police were informed about the situation.

input: Nso tẹnu mọ́ ọn pé, A ti fi ọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún tó àwọn tọ́rọ̀ọ́ kàn gbangban tí ó rán wa wábí létí, tí àjọ tó ń rí sí eré ìdárayá, tí ó fi mọ́ ààrẹ ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń rí sí ṣísàkóso ìdíje Olympic ní Cameroon National Olympic Committee of Cameroon.
target: He said the Ministry of Sports and the president of the National Olympic Committee of Cameroon.

input: Bákan náà, ni a ti ṣe ohun tí ó tọ́, láti fi ọ̀rọ̀ náà tó àwọn agbófinró létí ti Australia.
target: We have also laid formal complaint to the Australian police.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìròyìn fi múlẹ̀ pé, èyí kìí ṣe ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí àwọn òǹdíje aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon yóò sọnù nínú irúfẹ́ ìdíje báyìí.
target: It is not the first time Cameroonian athletes disappeared at major sporting event.

input: Lọ́dún 2012, òǹdíje márùn-ún nínú ìfigagbága ìjà five male boxers, agbábọ́ọ̀lù obìnrin kan àti olụ̀wẹ̀ ọkùnrin kan ni wọ́n di àwátì nílùú London.
target: In 2012, five male boxers, a female footballer and a male swimmer absconded from the London Olympic village.

input: Jurgen Klopp-Ìdíje Champions League ní ń ṣe pẹ̀lú èsì.
target: Jurgen Klopp-Idije Champions League has to do with the result.

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Liverpool, Jurgen Klopp ti gbósùbà káreláí fún ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n já ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn Manchester City kúrò nínú ìdíje Uefa Champions League pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò méjì sóókan 2-1, láti pegedé sípele kejì sí àṣekágbá ìdíje ọ̀hún.
target: Liverpool chief coach, Jurgen Klopp has commended his team after defeatin g their counterpart Manchester City out of the UEFA champions League with two goals to one 2-1, to qualify for the semi finals of the game.

input: Lẹ́yìn tí Liverpool jáwé olúborí nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóódo 3-0 ní pápá ìṣeré Anfield.
target: After Liverpool won in the first match with three goals to nothing 3-0 at Anfield stadium.

input: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, City gbá àmì-ayò kínní wọlé ní kété tí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ ju ọkà lọ, lẹ́yìn tí Liverpool dá àmì-ayò méjì padà gbàrà tí sáà kejì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ní pápá ìṣeré Etihad Stadium.
target: Though City scored a goal immediately the match started, but the stuggle was much after Liverpool retured two gaol immediately the second half of the game started at Etihad stadium.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Klopp ṣe sọ,Inú mí ò dùn rárá fún bí a ṣe kópa ní sáà kínní ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún.
target: According to Klopp, ‘I’m not happy for the way we played in the first half of the game.

input: Ní báyìí, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Real madrid yóò gbàlejò Juventus ni pápá ìṣeré Santiago, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Bayern Munich yóò gbàlejò Sevila ní pápá ìṣeré Alliance Arena.
target: Now Real Madrid football team will host Juventus at the Santiago stadium, also Bayern Munich will host Sevila at Alliance Arena Stadium.

input: Oyema fakọ yọ nínú ìwe-ìtàn, Ezuruike, Ndidi gbà àmì-ẹ̀yẹ góòlù.
target: Powerlifter Oyema sets world record, Ezuruike, Ndidi win gold

input: Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà ń kópa ribiribi nínú ìdíje Commonwealth games tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Australia.
target: Nigeria’s gold rush at the ongoing commonwealth games is well and truly on with the para powerlifters leading the charge.

input: Esther Oyema fìtàn balẹ̀ lágbàáyé nínú eré ìdárayá irin gbígbé Para powerlifter, Ó fìtàn balẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ó gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ góòlù ṣaájú àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ tí wọ́n jọ kópa.
target: Para powerlifter Esther Oyema set a new world record by winning a gold medal in the lightweight category.

input: Oyema gbé ìkún irin tí ó lé lọ́kànlélógóje Kílò 141.6kg, ṣaájú akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ Lucy Ejike, tí ó gbé ìkùn irin tí ó lé lọ́kànléláàádóje Kílò 131.4kg.
target: Oyema set a new world record for the women’s under 50kg class with a 141.6kg lift, edging compatriot Lucy Ejike, who claimed the silver medal with a lift of 131.4kg.

input: Bákan náà, nínú ẹ̀ka irin gbígbé tàwọn ọkùnrin, Roland Ezuruike tukọ̀ Nàìjííríà gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ góòlù, lẹ́yìn tí ó gbé ìkún irin ìwọ̀n tí ó lé lókòólénígba-ó-lé-mẹ́rin Kílò 224.3kg.
target: In the men’s lightweight category Roland Ezuruike led Nigeria to a one-two finish by claiming the gold medal with a lift of 224.3kg.

input: Akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀, Paul Kẹ́hìndé gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ ipò kẹta tí ń ṣe, silver lẹ́yìn tí ó gbé ìkún irin ìwọ̀n tí ó le lókòólénígbadínkan Kílò 219.9kg.
target: Fellow Nigerian Paul Kehinde picked up the silver with a 219.9kg lift.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ní ẹ̀ka irin wúwo gbígbé, Ndidi Nwosu gba àmì-ẹyẹ góòlù láti sọ àpapọ̀ àmì-ẹyẹ ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà di mẹ́jọ, góòlù mẹ́rin àti Silver mẹ́rin lápapọ̀.
target: In the heavyweight category, Ndidi Nwosu won the gold medal to take Nigeria’s medal haul to four gold, four silver medals.

input: Ìrètí wà pé màá bá Salah láìpẹ́.
target: I hope to catch up with Salah

input: Bákan náà, ní kane tún ń gbérò láti ran ikọ̀ àgbábọ́ọ̀lù rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ láti parí ìdíje sáà EPL tọdún yìí sípò tí ó dára lórí tábìlì, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni.
target: But the EPL forward is also focused on helping Spurs finish the season strongly.

input: Kane ń gbèrò láti parí ìdíje sáà yìí gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù ságbọ̀n jùlọ fún ìgbà kẹta léra wọn.
target: Kane is bidding to end the campaign as the division’s top scorer for the third time in a row.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Kane ṣe sọ lásìkò tó ń bá àwọn akọ̀ròyìn sọ̀rọ̀, Mo ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé mo ṣì lè ṣe é, tí mo bá le pa ọkàn pọ̀ nínú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tí ó kù.
target: I still believe I can, Kane told British media.Whatever happens, there are still games to go.I’ve got to focus on my game.

input: Spurs yóò máa wàákò pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester City nínú ìdíje EPL lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, oṣù kẹrin, kí wọn ó tó kojú ikọ̀ Manchester United nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ipele kejì sí àṣekágbá ìdíje FA Cup.
target: Spurs next face Manchester City in the league on Saturday, before taking on Manchester United in an FA Cup semi-final on April 21.

input: Ìfigagbága ipele kẹta sí àṣekágbá ìdíje UEFA Champions League.
target: quarter final of the UEFA Champions League.

input: Ahmed Musa, Moses Simon dara pọ̀ mọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń ṣàkóso DW sports.
target: Ahmed Musa, Moses Simon join DW sports management

input: Ahmed Musa àti akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ Moses Simon ti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń ṣàkóso DW sports.
target: Super Eagles duo of Ahmed Musa and Moses Simon have joined sports agency DW sports management.

input: Ní báyìí èyí túmọ̀ sí pé, àwọn méjéèjì yóò wà lára ìṣàkóṣo kátàkára ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù bá fẹ́ kópa fún.
target: This means the sports agency will now be in charge of the players’ transfer negotiation with any club they desire to play for.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, látàrí dídara pọ̀ mọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ iṣàkóso DW sport ọ̀hún, èyí ló fòpin sí ìbáṣepọ̀ Musa àti Tony Harris, lẹ́ni tí ìṣàkóso kátàkárà Ahmed Musa láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù lóríṣiríṣi wà lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀, bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ láti ìgbà tí ó kúrò nínú ikọ̀ agbábóòlù Kano Pillars lọ sí ilẹ̀ òkèrè.
target: Veteran winger Musa’s move to the French consortium ends his long association with football agent Tony Harris, who was pivotal Musa’s departure from former Nigerian league champions Kano Pillars to Europe.

input: Bákan náà, Moses Simon wà lábẹ́ ìṣàkóso kátàkára Tony Harris.
target: Moses Simon was also under the agency of Tony Harris.

input: DW sports fi ìdùnnú wọn hàn láti ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù méjèèjì lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára Twitter wọn.
target: DW sports management through their twitter handle expressed delight to have both players under their books.

input: Dídara pọ̀ mọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ ọ̀hún ni yóò di agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles méje tí yóò máa ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú DW sports.
target: The move brings to seven the number of current Eagles team members now working with DW sports management.

input: Àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles mìíràn tí wọ́n jọ máa ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀ báyìíBryan Ìdòwú, Shehu Abdulahi, Henry Onyekuru, Oghenekaro Etebo, àti Mikel Agu.
target: The other Nigerian players are Bryan Idowu, Shehu Abdulahi, Henry Onyekuru, Oghenekaro Etebo, and Mikel Agu.

input: Ikọ̀ mẹ́rìnlélọ́gọ́ta 64 yóò kópa nínú eré ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù Mike Okonkwo.
target: sixty-four 64 teams for 2018 Mike Okonkwo Cup

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìnlélọ́gọ́ta ni wọ́n ti bọwọ́ lù báyìí pé wọn yóò kópa nínú eré ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù Bishop Mike Okonkwo Football Championship 2018, èyí tí yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré National Stadium tìlú Èkó, bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ karùn-ún oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: Sixty-four clubs have been confirmed for the 2018 Bishop Mike Okonkwo Football Championship scheduled to kick off on May 5 this year at the National Stadium in Lagos.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àwọn tí ó ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje náà, ìdíje ọ̀hún ni ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù obìnrin ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ mẹ́jọ yóò kópa nínú rẹ̀ fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́.
target: According to the organisers, the competition will feature eight teams in the female category, which has just been introduced.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí alága ìgbìmọ́ tí ó ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje ọ̀hún, ọgbẹ́ni Malachy Ndubuzor, Ó ṣe é lálàyé pé, wọn yóò ríi dájú láti fojú sílẹ̀ mú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá fakọyọ nínú ìdíje náà sínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù TREM Football Academy.
target: Chairman of the organising committee for the competition Malachy Ndubuzor said in a statement that some of the players discovered would form the basis of the TREM Football Academy.

input: Àṣekágbá ìdíje ẹ̀ka méjéèjì, tí ń ṣe ikọ̀ ọkùnrin àti tobìnrin, yóò wáyé ní ilé-ìwé gíga fáfìti onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ̀ Yaba College of Technology lọ́jọ́ kínní oṣù kẹsàn-án ọdún tí a wà yìí nílùú Èkó.
target: He said the finals of both categories would hold at the Yaba College of Technology in Lagos on September 1.

input: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Super Eagles tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Waheed Akanni, tí ó jẹ́ àlejò pàtàkì lásìkò ìyíkoto ìfigagbága ìdíje ọ̀hún, gbórìyìn púpọ̀ fún Bishop Mike Okonkwo fun akitiyan tó ń kò láti gbé ìdíje ọ̀hún lárugẹ lọ́dọọdún.
target: Former Super Eagles player Waheed Akanni, who was a special guest at the draws, commended Bishop Mike Okonkwo for investing in the youths with the annual football championship.

input: Ò fikún-un pé, ìdíje ọ̀hún yóò ṣe ìrànwọ́ láti ṣàwárí àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ò lẹ́bùn eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá.
target: He said such competitions would discover more youths that are talented football players.

input: Arsenal, Atletico gbé ẹnu lé ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá Europa League.
target: Arsenal, Athletico close in on semis

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Lazio náà gbo ewúro sójú Salzburg pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́rin sí méji 4-2, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù RB Leipzig fạ̀gbạ̀ han Olympique de Marseille pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò kan sóódo 1-0.
target: Lazio also stayed on course to progress after an action-packed 4-2 home win over Salzburg in their quarter-final first leg and upstarts RB Leipzig will head to Olympique de Marseille with a 1-0 advantage.

input: Koke gbá àmì-ayò kínní wolé níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú péréte tí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, kí Antoine Griezmann kó tó fọba lé e kí sáà àkọ́kọ́ ó tó wá sí ìparí.
target: Koke scored inside the opening 30 seconds and Antoine Griezmann added the second shortly before half-time.

input: Commonwealth 2018 Nàìjííríà fàgbà han Malaysia nínú ìfigagbága bọ́ọ̀lù orí tábìlì.
target: Nigeria defeats Malaysia in table tennis

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orí tábílì Nàìjííríà ti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfigagbága wọn nínú ìdíje Commonwealth Games tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Australia.
target: The Nigerian table tennis team began their campaign in Group 4 of the men’s team event at the 2018 Commonwealth Games in Gold Coast, Australia on a bright note on Thursday.

input: Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà fàgbà han Malaysia àti Belize nínú ìfigagbága àkọ́kọ́ tí ó wáyé lọ́jọ́bọ̀.
target: Team Nigeria defeated Malaysia and Belize in their opening two ties on Thursday.

input: Olájídé Ọmọ́táyò fàgbà han Chee Feng olùkópa fún Malaysia pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́tàlá sí mọ́kànlà 13-11, márùndínlógún sí mẹ́tàlá 15-13, mọ́kànlá sí méje 11-7 ní ìtẹ̀léǹtẹ̀lé.
target: Olajide Omotayo defeated Chee Feng from Malaysia in three straight sets, recording 13-11, 15-13, 11-7 in his second match of the day.

input: Ní báyìí, Abiodun yóò lọ kojú Javen Choong láti Malaysia àti Terry Su láti Belize, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Jamiu náà yóò lọ kojú Rohit Pagarani láti Belize.
target: Abiodun will take on Javen Choong from Malaysia and Terry Su from Belize later on Thursday in his remaining games, while Jamiu will face Rohit Pagarani from Belize.

input: Ìdíje Commonwealth Games yìí, ni yóò di ìgbạ̀ kẹtàlá tí Nàìjíírìà yóò kọpà nínú rẹ̀ láti ọdún 1950.
target: The Gold Coast Commonwealth Games will be Nigeria’s 13th since its maiden appearance in 1950.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà yóò máa fojú sọ́nà láti tún fìtàn mìíràn balẹ̀ tí yóò kọjá èyí tí orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún ní tẹ́lẹ̀ nínú irúfẹ̀ ìdíje náà tí ó wáyé lọ́dún 1994 ní Canada, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́tàdínlógójì nínú ìdíje náà.
target: Team Nigeria will also be seeking to surpass their best performance at the competition, having won a record 37 medals at the 1994 Commonwealth Games in Canada.

input: Bákan náà, nínú ìdíje Commonwealth Games tí ó wáyé ní Glasgow, lórílẹ̀-èdè Scotland lọdún 2014, Nàìjííríà gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́rìndínlógójì, tí ń ṣe 11 Gold, 11 silver ati 14 bronze.
target: Nigeria won 36 medals 11 Gold, 11 silver and 14 bronze at the last edition of the Commonwealth Games which was held in Glasgow, Scotland in 2014.

input: Ní ìparí, ìdíje Commonwealth 2018 ọ̀hún tí ó bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́rú, ní ìrètí wà pé yóò parí lọ́jọ́ karùndínlógún oṣù kẹrin ọdún tí a wà yìí.
target: The 2018 Commonwealth Games which got underway with a colourful opening ceremony on Wednesday is expected to end on April 15.

input: Ìbànújẹ́ ló jẹ́ pé mi ò ní tẹ̀síwájú nínú ìdíje Commonwealth.
target: Sally Pearson sad over injury knock-out

input: Sally Pearson ọmọbíbí orílẹ̀-èdè Australia, tí ó tún jẹ olùkópa tí ó dára jùlọ lágbàáyé nínú eré sísá hurdles ni kò ní tẹ̀síwájú nínú ìdìjé Commonwealth Games tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ látàrí ìfarapa tí ó ní lẹ́sẹ̀, léyìí tí ó sì mú yébà kíkópa nínú eré-ìdárayá ọ̀hún fún ọ̀dún kan.
target: Australia’s world champion 100m hurdler Sally Pearson has been forced to withdraw from her home Commonwealth Games as she battles a serious Achilles injury that could sideline her for up to a year.

input: Dalung rọ ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà láti lọ fakọyọ nínú ìdíje Commonwealth.
target: Dalung urges Team Nigeria to compete fairly

input: Mínísítà tó ń rí sí eré-ìdárayá àti ìdàgbàsóke àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Nàìjììríà, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Solomon Dalung, ti rọ ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà tí yóò lọ sojú nínú onírúurú ìdíje eré-ìdárayá Commonwealth Games tí yóò wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Australia láti kópa dáradára.
target: The Minister of Youths and Sports, Solomon Dalung, on Tuesday advised Nigerian athletes at the XXI Commonwealth Games in Gold Coast, Australia to compete fairly without tarnishing the country’s image.

input: Nínú ọ̀rọ̀ àgbélẹ̀kọ̀ rẹ̀, èyí tí àmúgbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ pàtàkì sí mínísítà ọ̀hún ní ẹ̀ka ìròyìn àti ọ̀rọ̀ ìfitóniléti ṣe sọ, ogbeni Nneka Ikem-Anibeze, Ó ní, mínísítà gbà wọ́n níyànjú láti lọ sojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà dáradára.
target: Nneka Ikem-Anibeze, the Special Assistant on Media to Dalung, quoted the minister in a statement as giving the advice while addressing Team Nigeria athletes and officials in Gold Coast.

input: Ò sọ̀rọ̀ náà di mímọ̀ ní kété tí wọ́n parí ayẹyẹ ìṣíṣọ lójú eégún láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìdíje ọ̀hún, tí wọ́n sì kéde ikọ̀ tí yóò máa sojú Nàìjííríà.
target: He addressed the athletes immediately after the Welcome Ceremony organised by the organisers of the Games to officially welcome Team Nigeria to the Games Village.

input: Mo ríi pé, ẹ ti ń fojú sọ́nà láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ń kópa, léyìí tí ó fara hàn pé, ẹ ti gbáradì lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ fún ìdíje yìí.
target: I see you are all to be in high spirits and it shows that you have prepared for the competition.

input: Ni fikún un pé, ìrètí ààrẹ Buhari ni láti ríi pé, orúkọ Nàìjííríà gòkè àgbà, kí orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún sì fakọyọ nínú ìdíje náà.
target: It is the President’s wish, that at the end of our sojourn here, the name of Nigeria will be greater.

input: Ayẹyẹ ìṣíṣọ lójú eégún ọ̀hún ni ó wáyé láti ṣe ìkíni káàbọ̀ àwọn ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè kọ̀ọ̀kan tí yóò máa kópa nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún pẹ̀lú orin, ìlù àti ijó látọwọ́ ẹgbẹ́ oníjó Munujali.
target: The ceremony saw the athletes being entertained with a dance troupe from the Munujali tribe.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, olùkópa tí ó bá gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ góòlù Gold yóò láǹfààní sí ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbààta owó dọ́là 5,000, àmì-ẹ̀yẹ̀ ipò kejì Silver yóò gba ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbàajì owó dọ́là 3,000, bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni àmì-ẹ̀yẹ ipò kẹta bronze yóò gba ẹgbàá owó dọ́là 2,000.
target: Each gold medalist will receive 5,000, silver will attract 3,000 while bronze medalists will get 2,000 each.

input: Ayẹyẹ láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìdíje XXI Commonwealth Games náà yóò wáyé láago méje ọjọ́rùú, ní pápá ìṣeré Carrara ní Gold Coast, Australia.
target: The opening ceremony of the XXI Commonwealth Games holds on Wednesday at the Carrara Stadium in Gold Coast from 7 p.m.

input: Cristiano Ronaldo dúpé lọ́wọ́ àwọn olólùfẹ́ Juventus.
target: Cristiano Ronaldo thanks all the Juventus fans

input: Ìfẹsẹ̀wọ̀nṣẹ̀ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá NPFL tí yóò wáyé lónìí.
target: The NPFL match will come up today

input: Èyí ni àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tí yóò máa wáyé nínú ìdíje orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà NPFL lónìí
target: This are the matches that will be coming up in the Nigeria NPFL today

input: West Brom àti Alan Pardew fẹnu kò láti fòpin sí ìbaṣepọ̀ wọn.
target: West Brom and Alan Pardew part ways ‘by mutual consent’

input: Pardew ni ikọ̀ ọ̀hún gbà ní oṣù mẹ́rin sẹ́yìn ní ìrètí pé yóò mú àyípadà ọ̀tun dé bá ikọ̀ náà lórí tábìlì ìdíje EPL, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ ju ọkà lọ.
target: Pardew was only appointed four months ago to improve West Brom’s standing on the Premier League EPL table.

input: Ògúnbọ̀wálé, Azubuike rán ikọ̀ wọn lọ́wọ́ láti jáwé olúborí.
target: Ogunbowale, Azubuike propel U.S.basketball teams to victory

input: Àríkẹ́ Ògúnbọ̀wálé ran ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àfọ́wọ́gbá rẹ̀ Notre Dame láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje National Collegiate Athletic Association NCAA tọdún 2018 pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò ọ̀kànlélọ́gọ́ta sí mẹ́jìdínlọ́gọ́ta 61-58 láti fàgbà han Mississippi State.
target: Arike Ogunbowale was on Sunday night the star as she propelled Notre Dame to deliver the 2018 National Collegiate Athletic Association NCAA basketball title with a 61-58 victory over Mississippi State.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìṣẹ́jú péréte díẹ̀ tókù kí ìfigagbága ọ̀hún wá sí ìparí ni Ògúnbọ̀wálé ju bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé sínú agbọ̀n Mississippi State láti ran Notre Dame lọ́wọ́ gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje NCAA tàwọn obìnrin àkọ́kọ́ láti ọdún 2001, èyí tí ó sì di èèkejì irú rẹ̀ tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ti gbà báyìí.
target: Ogunbowale’s a late rescuing jump shot, with 0.1 seconds left, crowned Notre Dame their first women’s NCAA championship since 2001 and only the second in history.

input: Lẹ́yìn tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún fàgbà han Connect cut lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì Friday nínú ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá ìdíje náà, jíjáwé olúborí lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Sunday nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje náà jẹ́ ohun ìyàlẹ́nu tí ó sì tún fìtàn balẹ̀ nínú ìwé ìtàn ìdije náà.
target: After hitting a game-winning shot on Friday to beat Connecticut in the tournament’s national semi-finals, her winning shot on Sunday night was described as the greatest last-second shot in championship game history.

input: Ògúnbọ̀wálé sọ pé,Láti ṣe irú eléyìí nínú ọ̀sẹ̀ kan péré, ó jẹ́ ohun ìtàn nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfọwọ́gbá yìí, Ògúnbọ̀wálé ju bọ́ọ̀lù àmì mẹ́tàdínlọ́gbọ̀n wọlé nínú ìpele kejì àṣekágbá ọ̀hún lọ́jọ́ Ẹti ̀Friday, léyìí tí ó mú un gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ olùkópa tí ó tayo jùlọ nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún.
target: To do that twice in one weekend, the biggest stage in college basketball, it’s crazy, Ogunbowale said.Ogunbowale, who scored 27 points in Friday’s epic semi-final win over the Huskies, earned most outstanding player honours for the tournament.

input: Mo ti gbáradì púpọ̀ fún irú àkókò yìí, ọ̀pọ̀ olùkópa ló ń fẹ́ láti lọ́wọ́ nínú àmì-ayò tí yóò ran ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ, ṣùgbọ́n gbígbáradì ṣaájú ìfigagbága ṣe pàtàkì.
target: I practise this all the time.It’s everyone’s dream to get a game-winning shot.So, you practise this in the gym when you’re by yourself.So, I was prepared for this moment.

input: Bàbá Ògúnbọ̀wálé, Gregory, jẹ́ ọmọbíbí Nàìjííríà, tí ó sì fẹ́ràn bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá àti bọ́ọ̀lù àfọwọ́gbá rugby, bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni ìyá rẹ̀, Yolanda, jé ọmo bíbí Amẹ́ríkà tí ó sì tún jẹ́ olùkọ́.
target: Ogunbowale’s father, Gregory, is from Nigeria, where he played football and rugby while her mother, Yolanda, is an American-born teacher who was a softball pitcher.

input: Bákan náà, nínú irúfẹ́ ìdíje NCAA tàwọn ọkùnrin, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Kansas, tí Udoka Azubuike ǹ kópa fún, pàdánù ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá ìdíje ọ̀hún sọ́wọ́ Villanova pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò márùndínlọ́gọ́rùn-ún sí mọ́kàndínlọ́górin 95-79.
target: Meanwhile, Udoka Azubuike’s Kansas lost to Villanova 95-79 in the NCAA Men semi-finals.

input: Ẹ̀kọ́ ńlá ni pípàdánù sọ́wọ́ Serbia jẹ́ fún wa – Dalung
target: Defeating to Serbia is a great lesson – Dalung

input: Mínísítà tó ń rí sí eré ìdárayá àti ìdàgbàsókè eré ìdárayá ní Nàìjíríà, Solomon Dalung sọ pé, inú ìjọba kò bàjẹ́ rárá látàrí pípàdánù ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀ré kejì sọ́wọ́ Serbia lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun Tuesday.
target: The Minister of Sports in Nigeria, Solomon Dalung, says the federal government was not disappointed with the loss to Serbia in the second international friendly played on Tuesday.

input: Mínísítà sọ̀rọ̀ náà di mímọ̀ fún àwọn akọ̀ròyìn lẹ́yìn ìpàdé àpérò ìgbìmọ̀ ìjọba tọ́rọ̀ kàn gbàngbàn Federal Executive Council FEC tí wọ́n ṣe pẹ̀lú ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari.
target: The Minister reacted to the result while briefing State House correspondents after the Federal Executive Council FEC meeting presided over by President Muhammadu Buhari.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Ó ṣe sọ, Ó ní, pípàdánù ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà ṣe àfihàn àwọn kùdìẹ̀-kudiẹ tó kù fún akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ náà àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àjọ NFF ní láti ṣe ṣáájú ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
target: According to him, the defeat has exposed the weaknesses of the team which they will strengthen before the beginning of the World Cup in Russia.

input: Bóyá ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ Super Eagles ọ̀hún tẹ́milọ́rùn tàbí kò tẹ́milọ́rùn, tèmi ni pé, mo ní ìgboyà fún ikọ̀ náà.
target: Whether I am satisfied with the performance of the Super Eagles in view of their last defeat, I am quite confident.

input: Bí a ṣe pegedé fún ìdíje àgbááyé yìí kò rọrùn rárá, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni a kò le máa jáwé olúborí nínú gbogbo ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ wa.
target: The process of qualification was not that very smooth we must not win every match to be able to say that we are prepared.

input: Diego Costa- Olùgbàlà ni Messi jẹ́ fún Argentina.
target: Diego Costa- Messi is a Savior for Argentina.

input: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Atletico Madrid, tí ó tún ń kópa fún Spain, Diego Costa ti rọ Argentina láti dúpẹ́ pé ikọ̀ náà ní agbábọ́ọ̀lù bí Lionel Messi nínú ikọ̀ ọ̀hún.
target: Atletico Madrid football striker, who is playing for Spain, Diego Costa has urged Argentina to be grateful that the team has a player like Lionel Messi in the team.

input: Diego Costa ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé, jíjáwé olúborí Spain nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ pẹ̀lú Argentina láìsí atamátàsé ọ̀hún, Messi nínú ikọ̀ náà ṣe àfihàn bí Messi ṣe ṣe pàtàkì fún Argentina tó.
target: Diego Costa believed that the victory of Spain in the friendly match with Argentina without the striker, Messi in the team shows how important Messi is to Argentina.

input: Spain fàgbà han Argentina pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́fà sóókan 6-1, tí àwọn ayò ọ̀hún sì wá láti ọwọ́ Costa, Thiago Alcantara, Iago Aspas áti Isco tí ó gbá àmì-ayò mẹ́ta wọlé.
target: Spain defeated Argentina with six goals to one 6-1, and the goals were from Thiago Alcantara, Iago Aspas áti Isco who scored three goals.

input: Costa sọ pé, Ó fara hàn gbangba gbangba pé, bí Messi kò bá kópa nínú ikọ̀ Argentina, ó máa ń nira fún ikọ̀ ọ̀hún láti ṣiṣẹ́ pọ́, léyìí tí ó wà lára bí a ṣe fàgbà hàn wọ́n pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò tí ó tóyìí.
target: Costa said it is obvious that if Messi is not in the Argentina team it is very difficult for the team to work together, which is part of the reason they were defeated with such goals.

input: irú agbábọ́ọ̀lù bí Messi kò ṣe é bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lú.
target: a player like Messi can not be looked down.

input: Ó yẹ kí wọ́n máa dúpẹ́ pé wọ́n ní Messi lára wọn ni.
target: They are supposed to be grateful for having Messi in the team.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, inú Costa dùn púpọ̀ láti padà sínú ikọ̀ Spain, lẹ́yìn tí o kópa fún ikọ̀ náà lásìkò àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìpegedé fún ìdíje àgbááyé náà látàrí wàhálà tí ó kojú lásìkò rẹ̀ nínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea.
target: Costa was very happy to return into the Spanish team after he has played for the team during their qualifying matches due to the problem he was facing at the time in Chelsea.

input: Ìpínlẹ̀ Kano mú ìgbèrú bá ikọ̀ àgbábọ́ọ̀lù mọ́kànlélógójì 41.
target: Kano State boosts 41 clubs

input: Ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Kano ti ṣe ìtọrẹ mílíọ́nù mẹ́tàlá ààbọ̀ náírà N13.5m fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù mọ́kànlélógójì 41 tí wọ́n fi ìpínlẹ̀ náà ṣe ibùgbé.
target: Kano State Government has donated N13.5m to 41 Nationwide Football League One clubs in the state.

input: Gomina Abdullahi Ganduje sọ pé, ṣíṣe ìtọrẹ owó ọ̀hún ni ó wáyé ni ọ̀nà láti mú ìdàgbàsókè tí ó yèkooro bá ikọ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan ní ìpínlẹ̀ náà.
target: Governor Abdullahi Ganduje said at Government House in Kano that the development was aimed at motivating the clubs.

input: Inú mí dùn pé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù yín ṣe dáradára, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìjọba, ojúṣe wa ni láti ran ikò kọ̀ọ̀kan lọ́wọ́ láti túbọ̀ máa ṣe dáradára síi.A fi ń dáa yín lójú pé a ó ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn tí ó tó fún-un yín.
target: I am happy that your clubs are doing well and as a government, we should encourage you to do better.We share your passion for the game and we will do our best to create the enabling environment for you to do better, .

input: Bákan náà, kò tí ì pẹ́ rárá tí a tún ṣe ìtọrẹ àwọn ohun èlò ìgbá bọ́ọ̀lù fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó tó ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbéje ní ìpínlẹ̀ yìí, eléyìí tí ó wà lára èrò wa láti mú ìgbèrú bá eré-ìdárayá ni í̀pínlẹ̀ yìí.
target: He added that not too long ago, we donated money and football kits to 1,206 football clubs in the state as part of our commitment to the development of sports.

input: O fi kún un pé, bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsègbá jẹ́ eré ìdárayá kan gbòógi tí kò ṣe é fọwọ́ yẹperẹ mú láwùjọ, ó máa ń fi ààyè ìbáṣepọ̀ tí ó dánmọ́rán sílẹ̀ láàrin àwọn ọ̀dọ́ àti àwọn ènìyàn lápapọ̀.
target: He said football is a major instrument of promoting peaceful co-existence, bridging cultural gaps and a critical factor in international relations.

input: Gómìnà náà wá rọ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù kọ̀ọ̀kan ní ìpínlẹ̀ náà láti túbọ̀ tẹpá mọ́ṣẹ́ wọn síi, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì nì O fi ń dá wọn lójú pé, ìṣàkóso ọ̀un yóò sa ipá rẹ̀ láti ṣàtìlẹyìn tí ó tó fún wọn nígbà kúùgbà àti lóòrèkóòrè.
target: The governor urged football clubs in Kano to sustain their zeal, assuring them that his administration would not relent in supporting them to win honours for the state.

input: Àwọn olóyè nínú àjọ NFF ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Carl Ikeme.
target: NFF chiefs visit Carl Ikeme

input: Àwọn tọ́rọ̀ kàn gbọ́ngbọ̀n nínú àjọ NFF ti lọ ṣàbẹ̀wò sí amúlé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Carl Ikeme tí ó ń gba ìtọ́jú nílé ìwòsàn Christie Clinic, Manchester.
target: The Nigeria Football Federation leaders on Tuesday visited ailing Super Eagles goalkeeper Carl Ikeme at Christie Clinic in Manchester.

input: Ikeme ni àwọn dókítà sàyẹ̀wò pé Ó ní àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ nínú oṣù keje ọdún 2017, tí ó sì ti ń gba ìtọjú láti ìgbà náà.
target: Ikeme was diagnosed with acute leukaemia in July 2017, and he has been receiving treatment.

input: Pinnick sọ pé, A mú ìkínni wá fún Ọ láti ọwọ́ ìjọba, àjọ NFF lápapọ̀, láti wá ṣàbẹ̀wò mọ ibi tí àwọn dókítà bá ìtọ́jú dé.Ní pàápàá jùlọ láti sọ fún Ọ pé a kò gbàgbé rẹ nígbà kankan, bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni O ṣì dúró digbí nínú ikọ̀ Super Eagles.
