input: Mikel jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára agbábọ́ọ̀lù Nàìjííríà tó ṣàṣeyọrí jùlọ Siasia.
target: Mikel, one of Nigeria’s greatest football exports – Siasia

input: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù àti akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ Super Eagles tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Samson Siasia sọ pé, kò sí nǹkan tí ó ṣe pàtàkì nínú ìfẹ́ tí òun ní sí balógun ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Mikel Obi.
target: Former Super Eagles handler and ex-international, Samson Siasia says there was nothing special in his love for the Super Eagles Captain, Mikel Obi.

input: Siasia yànàná ọ̀rọ̀ yìí látàrí awuyewuye mímú Obi lọ kópa nínú ìdíje 2016 Olympic, èyí tí ó sì gba àmì-ẹyẹ ipò kẹta silver wálé.
target: Siasia was speaking on the reason for his preference for Obi who he took to the 2016 Olympics and returned with a silver.

input: Kò sí nǹkan tí ó ṣe pàtàkì láàrin èmi pẹ̀lú Ò̀bí ó kàn jẹ́ pé mo nífẹ̀ẹ́ rẹ̀ púpọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́òlù.
target: There is nothing special between me and Obi it’s only that I so much like him as a player.

input: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni Ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù Nàìjííríà tí ó ti ṣàṣeyọrí nínú eré bọ́ọ̀lù lágbàáyé.
target: He is one of the greatest exports of Nigerian football.

input: Òbí kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó lààmìlaaka láti ọjọ́ kékeré ayé rẹ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ó ti gba oríṣiríṣi ife-ẹ̀yẹ gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́ọ̀lù, ó sì tún jẹ́ akínkanjú ẹni tó ń fara jìn fún iṣẹ́ rẹ̀.
target: Obi started playing for top clubs at an early stage in his life and has won virtually everything he wants and above all, he is a good and committed player.

input: Bákan náà, ipa rẹ̀ nínú ikọ̀ Super Eagles kò ṣe é yẹ̀ sílẹ̀, fún ìdí èyí, tani kò ní nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí irú agbábọ́ọ̀lù yìí,.
target: Furthermore, You can also see his contributions to the national team, so, who will not like such a player.

input: Ó fikún un pé, Obi ti kópa dáradára nínú ikọ̀ rẹ̀ nílẹ̀ òkèèrè àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles.
target: He said Obi had done creditably well both at the club level and the Super Eagles.

input: Ní ìgbà kan rí, Siasia fi Obi wé agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ àárín ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Real Madrid, Luka Modric àti àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù jàǹkànjàǹkàn mìíràn lágbàáyé.
target: Siasia had once said Obi was a player at par with Real Madrid ace midfielder, Luka Modric and other best midfielder in the world.

input: Morocco yóò ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé lọ́dún 2026 - Blatter.
target: Morocco should host 2026 World Cup – Blatter

input: Ààrẹ àjọ FIFA tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Sepp Blatter ti gbè sí orílẹ̀-èdè Morocco lẹ́yìn láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé lọ́dún 2026, lẹ́yìn tí ó fọwọ́ sọ̀yà pé orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún ti ó kángún sí àríwá gúsú ilẹ̀ Áfíríkà tó gbangba sùn lọ́yẹ́.
target: Former FIFA president Sepp Blatter has put his support behind Morocco’s bid to host the 2026 World Cup finals, saying the North African country would be the logical choice.

input: Morocco ti ń gbèrò láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé fún ìgbà karùn-ún báyìí, bákan náà wọn tún gbìyànjú láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje náà lọ́dún 1994, 1998, 2006 àti ọdún 2010.
target: Morocco is bidding for the fifth time to host the World Cup finals, having also tried for the 1994, 1998, 2006 and 2010 tournaments.

input: Àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mìíràn tí ó tún gbèrò láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje yìí papọ̀ lórílẹ̀-èdè U.S, Canada àti Mexico, èyí tí ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé FIFA yóò ṣe ìpàdé àpérò rẹ̀ nínú oṣù kẹfà, ní Moscow láti mọ orílẹ̀-èdè tí ó kójú òsùwọ̀n jùlọ láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje náà.
target: The only other bid is a joint one from the U.S., Canada and Mexico with football’s world governing body FIFA due to choose the hosts at its Congress in Moscow in June.

input: Ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé ọdún 2026 gbìgbìmọ̀pọ̀ láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé kò jẹ́ ìtẹ́wọ́gbà fún àjọ FIFA, lẹ́yìn èyí tí ó wáyé lọ́dún 2002.
target: World Cup 2026 Co-hosting rejected by FIFA after 2002 also applied in 2010 and 2018.

input: Ní báyìí Morocco ni ó ṣì láǹfààní báyìí láti ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀, tí yóò sì tún fàyèsílẹ̀ fún ilẹ̀-Áfíríkà
target: Morocco would be the logical host And it is time for Africa again

input: Ọmọ ọgọ́rin ọdún ọ̀hún, Blatter fipò rẹ̀ sílẹ̀, tí wọ́n sì tún fòfin dè é fún ọdún mẹ́fà látàrí títàpá sí ìlànà ìgbìmọ̀ àjọ FIFA.
target: The eighty-one-year-old Swiss quit his post and was later banned for six years for ethics violations by FIFA’s ethics committee.

input: Irúfé ìdíje ńlá yìí tí o wáyé kẹ́yìn nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà, wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè South Africa lọ́dún 2010, èyí tí Blatter kòsí kábàámọ̀ pé ilẹ̀-Áfíríkà ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀.
target: The only tournament staged in Africa so far was the 2010 finals in South Africa, something Blatter is immensely proud of.

input: Russia 2018 Aiteo gbóríyìn fún ètò NFF fún ìpalẹ̀mọ́ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.
target: Russia 2018 Aiteo hails NFF’s World Cup plans

input: Onígbọ̀wọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, ilé-iṣẹ́ epo rọ̀bì Aiteo ti fi ìdùnnú rẹ̀ hàn fún ètò àti ìpalẹ̀mọ́ ọlọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan tí àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ní Nàìjííríà, NFF ti ń pèsè sílẹ̀ ṣaájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.
target: Super Eagles official sponsor, Aiteo Group has expressed delight with the plans put in place by the nation’s soccer governing body, NFF ahead of the Russia 2018 World Cup.

input: Igbákejì adarí ilé-iṣẹ́ Aiteo, Francis Peters, Nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ lásìkò ìpàdé ìgbàmì-ẹ̀yẹ èyí tí ó wáyé nílùú Èkó lọ́jọ́ Ajé Monday, Ó ní inú ilé-iṣẹ́ Aiteo dùn lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ fún àwọn ètò àjọ NFF tí wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kéde fún ìpalẹ̀mọ́ ìdíje ńlá yìí.
target: Aiteo’s Deputy Managing Director, Francis Peters who spoke Monday night during the maiden NFF awards bankrolled by the oil giant said the company is delighted with Russia 2018 World Cup programme released recently by the NFF.

input: Ó fikún un pé Ní pàtàkì inú wá dùn púpọ̀ fún ìpalẹ̀mọ́ àjọ NFF ṣaájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lu àgbááyé yìí, èyí tí ó fara hàn gbangba gbàǹgbà pé ikọ̀ Super Eagles náà ti ṣetán fún ìdíje náà.
target: We are particularly delighted by NFF’s preparation for the tournament, as is evident in their World Cup plans recently publicized.

input: Èrò wa ni láti rí Super Eagles kí ó kópa dáradára kọjá èròńgbà wa.
target: For the Super Eagles, our wish is that the team matches our expectation.

input: AITEO tí ó jẹ́ onígbọ̀wọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles yóò wà ní digbí lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia fún àtìlẹyìn tí ò lẹ́gbẹ́ àti igbani-níyànjú.
target: AITEO as Super Eagles Official Sponsor will certainly be in Russia to offer support and encouragement in our usual way.

input: Láti ṣàfihàn mímú ikọ̀ yìí lọ́kùn-únkúndùn, pàápàá jùlọ fún ikọ̀ náà láti lọ ṣàṣeyọrí nínú ìdíje yìí, à ti san ọgbòn ọ̀kẹ́ owo dollar 600,000 àti okòólélọ́ọ̀ọ́dúnrún mílíọ́nù owo Naira N320 million láti pèsè àwọn ohun èlò lọ́lọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan fún ìgbáradì ní kíkún fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbáyé yìí.
target: To demonstrate our commitment to achieving a successful World Cup outing, we have paid the sum of 600,000 and N320 million to cover our contractual obligation of providing support to the technical crew of all the teams for the whole of 2018, well beyond the World Cup.

input: Peters tún gbóríyìn fún Gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Akínwùmí Ambode àti ìjọba rẹ̀ fún àtìlẹyìn wọn láti mú ìgbèrú bá bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ní Nàìjííríà àti ní ilẹ̀ Áfíríkà.
target: Peters further gave a pat on the back to Lagos State governor, Akinwumi Ambode who he noted shares the same vision with Aiteo, that of taking Nigerian and African football to greater heights.

input: MFM FC pegedé sínú ìpele kejì ìdíje CAF Champions League.
target: MFM advance to second round at the CAF Champions League

input: MFM FC ilú Èkó, nínú ìfigagbága ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tí ó wáyé lọ́jọ́ru Wednesday, ikọ̀ ọ̀hún pegedé sínú ìpele kejì ìdíje CAF Champions League, léyìn tí wọ́n fàgbà han ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù AS Bamako orílẹ̀-èdè Mali pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò kan sóódo 1-0.
target: MFM FC of Lagos on Wednesday booked their way to the second round of the CAF Champions League with a 1-0 win over AS Bamako of Mali in Lagos.

input: MFM pegedé lápapọ̀ àmì-ayò ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún, lẹ́yìn tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún gbá àmì-ayò kọ̀ọ̀kan nínú ìfigagbága àkọ́kọ́ tí ó wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Mali, kí wọn ó tó wá gbá àmì-ayò kan sóódo ní pápá ìṣeré Agége.
target: MFM qualified in all the competitions after played one goal in the first competition that came up in mali before playing one goal to nothing at Agege stadium.

input: Akuneto Chijioke ló gbá àmì ayò kan ṣoṣo ọ̀hún wọlé ní sáà kejì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà, èyí tí Lawal Àbáyọ̀mí ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìndínlógún ṣì ṣe ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò ọ̀hún.
target: Akuneto Chijioke scored the singular goal in the second half of the competition, which Lawal Abayomi a sixteen year old player assisted in scoring the goal.

input: Ó fikún un pe, Àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù mi ti fi ara wọn hàn pé àwọn tó gbangba sùn lọ́yẹ́.
target: He added that, my playershave proved themselves that they are qualified.

input: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, a fi ń da àwọn olólùfẹ́ wa àti ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó lójú pé, a kò ní jáwọn kulẹ̀ nígbà kankan.
target: And we are assuring our fans and the government of Lagos that we will not disappoint them at anytime.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí kò kópa fún MFM FC nínú wọn la ti rí, Sikiru Ọlátúnbọ̀sún, Akila Jesse, Ṣhọlá Brossa àti Waheed Àkànní, èyí sì wáyé látàrí ìdojúkọ tí ó wáyé lásìkò ìforúkọsílẹ̀ fún ìdíje náà.
target: The player that did not play for MFM FC are Sikiru Olatunbosun, Akila jesse, Shola Brossa and Waheed Akanni, and this came up as a result of the challenge during the registration for the competition.

input: Infantino-Russia ṣetán láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.
target: Infantino insists Russia ready to host World Cup

input: Ààrẹ àjọ FIFA, Gianni Infantino sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ìgbésẹ̀ ìgbáradì tí Russia ti gbé láti gbàlejò ìdíje lọ́dún yìí.
target: Fifa president Gianni Infantino insisted on Tuesday said that Russia is ready to host the World Cup later this year.

input: Ààrẹ FIFA- Bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ní Nàìjííríà ju ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀sìn lọ.
target: FIFA President- Football is more than a religion in Nigeria

input: Ààrẹ àjọ FIFA, Gianni Infantino ti ṣàlàyé bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ní Nàìjííríà gẹ́gẹ́ bí ohun tí ó ju ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀sìn lọ.
target: FIFA President Gianni Infantino has described Nigeria as a country with unquantifiable passion and love for football, and where football is more than a religion.

input: Nínú ìpàdé ìgbàmì ẹ̀yẹ ọ̀hún tí ó wáyé nílé ìtura Eko Hotels and Suites, ni wọ́n ti fi àmì-ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó dára jùlọ tí àjọ NFF dá agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Chelsea FC, Victor Moses lọ́lá.
target: The event held at the Eko Hotels and Suites saw Chelsea FC winger Victor Moses winning the Player of the Year award.

input: Bákan náà, Moses tún gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje EPL fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea ní sáà 20162017, tí ó sì kópa nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ogójì fún ikọ̀ náà.
target: Moses also helped his Chelsea side reclaim the English Premier League title in the 20162017 season where he featured in 40 games.

input: Àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó tún gba onírúurú àmì-ẹ̀yẹ mìíràRasheedat Ajíbádé, agbábọ́ọ̀lù obìnrin AITEO-NFF tí ó dára jùlọ Player of the Year Women, Ikouwon Udoh, àmì-ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó kéré jùlọ Young Player of the Year Women.
target: Other winners at the awards include Rasheedat Ajibade who claimed the Player of the Year Women’’ award and Ikouwon Udoh who emerged Young Player of the Year Women’’.

input: Ann Chiejine, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tí ó dára jùlọ Coach of the Year Women, tí agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ MFM FC, Sikiru Ọlátúnbọ̀sún gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ àmì ayò tí ó dára jùlọ
target: Ann Chiejine won the Coach of the Year Women’’ award, while MFM FC’s midfielder Sikiru Olatunbosun took the Goal of the Year’’ award.

input: Kennedy Bòbóyè, tí ó jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Plateau United FC tìlùú Jos.
target: The Coach of the Year Men’’ award went to Kennedy Boboye, coach of 20172018 NPFL champions Plateau United FC of Jos.

input: Channels Television gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ Developmental Award.
target: Channels Television won the Developmental Award.

input: All-Time Legendary Awards lọ sọ́dọ̀ Chiejine, Christian Chukwu, Uche Okechukwu, Austin Eguavoen, Felix Owólabí, Austin Okocha, Nwankwo Kanu, Ṣẹ́gun Ọdẹ́gbàmí, Adokie Amaesimaka, Mercy Udoh ati Thompson Usiyen.
target: The All-Time Legendary Awards went to Chiejine, Christian Chukwu, Uche Okechukwu, Austin Eguavoen, Felix Owolabi, Austin Okocha, Nwankwo Kanu, Segun Odegbami, Adokie Amaesimaka, Mercy Udoh and Thompson Usiyen.

input: The Platinum Award lọ sọ́dọ̀ Ààrẹ àjọ FIFA Infantino
target: The Platinum Award went to Infantino.

input: Roger Federer gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ Rotterdam Open.
target: Roger Federer wins Rotterdam Open

input: Roger Federer ṣayẹyẹ ìpadàsípò kínni rè lágbàáyé pẹ̀lú gbígba ife-ẹ̀yẹ Rotterdam Open lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Sunday, èyí tí ó jẹ́ ife-ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́tàdínlógórun lápapọ̀ tí ó ti gbà báyìí.
target: Roger Federer celebrated his impending return to the top of the world rankings by winning the Rotterdam Open on Sunday, his 97th title.

input: Ọmọ ọdún mọ́kàndínlógójì náà, tí ó sì tún jẹ́ olùkópa tí ó dàgbà jùlọ nínú ìtàn ìdíje ATP, fàgbà han akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ láti orílẹ̀-èdè Bulgaria, Grigor Dimitrov pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́fà sí mẹ́ji 6-2, nínú àṣekágbá ìfigagbága ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo ọ̀hún.
target: The 36-year-old, the oldest ATP No.1 in history, thrashed Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov 6-2, 6-2 in a one-sided final.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, olùkópa ọmọ bíbí orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà, Jimmy Connors nìkan ní àpapọ̀ ìfe-ẹ̀yẹ tí ó gbà jù ti Federer lọ, lẹ́yìn tí ó ti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ tí ó lé ní ọgọ́rùn-ún.
target: In the Open era, only American Jimmy Connors has won more titles than Swiss master Federer, with 109.

input: Federer, ẹni tí ó ti gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ Grand Slam ní ìgbà ogún báyìí, yóò tún gba ipò kínní rẹ̀ padà tí ipò àtẹ tuntun ATP mìíràn bá jáde lọ́sẹ̀ tí a wà yìí.
target: Federer, the record 20-time Grand Slam winner, will retake the number one ranking he last held in October 2012 when the official ATP rankings are published on Monday.

input: Ọmọ Didier Drogba dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Guingamp.
target: Didier Drogba son joined Guingamp football club.

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀dọ́ Guingamp tó ń kópa nínú ìdíje orílẹ̀-èdè Faransé, tọ́jọ́ orí wọn kò ju mọ́kàndínlógún lọ, Guingamp U19 ti ra Isaac Drogba, ọmọ atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea tẹ́lẹ̀rí, tí ó tún jẹ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Cote dIvoire, Didier Drogba wá sínú ikọ̀ náà báyìí.
target: The young Guingamp footballer who are not more than sixteen years playing in the French league contracted Isaac Drogba, the former Chelsea striker son, who is also a citizen of Cote divoire, Didier Drogba into the team now.

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Guingamp sọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún di mímọ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára lọ́jọ́ Ajé Monday.
target: Guingamp football team made this known on the internet on Monday.

input: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàdínlógún ọ̀hún, Isaac Drogba yóò tún lọ kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Guingamp, tí bàbá rẹ̀ ti kópa fún lọ́dún mẹ́rìndínlógún sẹ́yìn.
target: The seventeen year old Isaac Drogba will also play for Guingamp football team where his father played for the past sixteen years.

input: Drogba fi ìdùnú rẹ̀ hàn lẹ́yìn tí ó kí ọmọ rẹ̀ kú oríire lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára Instagram,ó jẹ́́ ohun ìwúrí fún mi láti ríi pé Isaac dara pọ̀ mọ́ Guingamp.
target: Drogba showed his delight after congratulating his son on Instagram, I am encouraged to see Isaac join Guingamp.

input: Didier Drogba kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Guingamp fún sáà kan, kí ó tó lọ dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Le Mans lọ́dún 2002.
target: Didier Drogba played for Guingamp football team for a season before he joined Le Mans football team in 2002.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Drogba tún fikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Marseille sílẹ̀, tí ó sì tún lọ dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, níbi tí ó ti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje EPL àti ìdíje UEFA Champions League.
target: Drogba left Marseille football team, and joined Chelsea, where he took the EPL medal and UEFA champions League.

input: Wọn yóò ṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé VAR nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà.
target: Won will use VAR technology in Africa.

input: Ní báyìí, fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ wọn yóò lo ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé Fonran, Video Assistant Referee VAR nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà ní pápá ìṣeré Stade Mohammed V, Casablanca lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta Saturday.
target: Now, for the first time a Video Assistant Referee VAR will be used in Africa especially at State Mohammed V stadium, Casablanca on Saturday.

input: Àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà CAF, ló sọ ọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún di mímọ̀ pé, wọn yóò lo ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé náà nínú ìdíje 2018 Caf Super Cup, èyí tí yóò wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Wydad Athletic Club àti TP Mazembe lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Saturday.
target: CAF made this known that the mordrn technology will be used in the 2018 caf Super Cup which will comeup between Wydad Athletic club and TP Mazembe football club on Saturday.

input: Ìfigagbága ìdíje 2018 CAF Super Cup , ni ó máa ń wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ tí ó bá gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ 2017 Caf Champions League àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ 2017 Caf Confederation Cup.
target: The 2018 CAF Super Cup competition, will come up between the team that won the cup in 2017 CAF Champions League and team which won the 2017 CAF confederation Cup.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ̀wé àgbà àjọ CAF, Amr Fahmy.
target: According to the secretary general of CAF Amr Fahmy.

input: Èyí jẹ́ ohun ìtàn nínú eré ìdárayá bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà.
target: This is a history in football game in Africa.

input: Bákan náà, alákòóso olùdarí àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àjọ CAF, Eddy Maillet fi ìdùnú rẹ̀ hàn fún ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ṣíṣe àmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé náà nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà.
target: Also the chairman of the CAF competitions Eddy Maillet show his delight for the lunching of the modern machine in Africa.

input: Ó tẹ̀síwájú pé, àwọn ti ṣetán láti ṣe àmúlò ẹ̀rọ VAR náà nínú ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ CAF tí yóò máa wáyé.
target: He continued that they are very ready to use the VAR in the subsequent CAF competition that will be coming up.

input: Ganduje yóò buyi-kùn àṣekágbá ìdíje Ramat Cup.
target: Ganduje to grace Ramat Cup final

input: Gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Kano, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Abdullahi Umar Ganduje, yóò jẹ́ àlejò pàtàkì nínú àṣekágbá mẹ́rìndínlógójì ìdíje Ramat Cup, èyí tí ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Kano àti àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá àti ìdàgbàsókè àwọn ọ̀dọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀.
target: Governor Abdullahi Umar Ganduje of Kano State will today be the Special Guest of honour at the finals of the 36th edition of the ongoing Ramat Cup competition being organised by the Youth Sports Federation of Nigeria in conjunction with the Kano State Government.

input: Gawuna ṣàlàyé pé, Gomina Ganduje fẹ́ láti kópa nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje náà látàrí ìfẹ́ tí ó ní fún ìdàgbàsókè àwọn ọ̀dọ́ àti fún eré-ìdárayá.
target: Gawuna explained that governor wanted to be at the final because of his love for youth empowerment and development of grassroots sports in the country.

input: Ganduje jẹ́ Gómìnà tí ó fẹ́ràn eré-ìdárayá púpọ̀, tí ó sì máa ń setán láti ran àwọn ọ̀dọ́ lọ́wọ́ nípasẹ̀ kíkún wọn lọ́wọ́ láti mú ìgbèrú bá ẹ̀bùn tí wọ́n ní fún àǹfààní àwọn ará-ìlú àti ìdàgbàsókè orílẹ̀-èdè.
target: Ganduje is a sports loving governor, who is always ready to assist the youths develop their talents and become useful citizens and that is why he wants to be physically present in the finals, he said.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Kano tí ó ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje ọ̀hún, yóò máa wàákò pẹ̀lú ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tí yóò máa wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Kano Pillars, Sabon Garri, Kano.
target: Meanwhile, the host stare, Kano will meet Lagos in the finals to be decided at the Kano Pillars Stadium, Sabon Garri, Kano.

input: Abia Warriors fàgbà han Yobe Desert Stars.
target: Abia Warriors beats Yobe Desert Stars

input: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Abia Warriors FC lọ́jọ́ Àìkú Sunday gbo ewúro sí akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn lójú láti ìpínlẹ̀ Yobe, Yobe Desert Stars FC pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóókan 3-1, ní pápá ìṣeré Umuahia Township Stadium.
target: Hosts Abia Warriors Football Club on Sunday rediscovered their winning streak with a 3-1 bashing of visiting Yobe Desert Stars FC in the match played at the Umuahia Township Stadium.

input: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ ọ̀hún Effiong Ndifereke ló gbá àmì-ayò kínní wọlé níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú mọ́kàndínlọ́gbọ̀n sáà àkọ́kọ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún, béẹ̀ sì ni Sam Obi gbá àmì-ayò kejì wọlé kí sáà àkọ́kọ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà ó tó wá sí ìparí.
target: Abia Warriors’ forward Effiong Ndifereke helped to turn the team’s fortunes around with a brace in the ninth and 29th minutes.Sam Obi scored Abia Warriors’ second goal at the 16th minute during a goal-mouth scramble.

input: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, ikọ̀ Yobe Desert ṣe gudugudu méje òhun yàhàyà mẹfà láti gba àmì-ayò kan wọlé níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú mọ́kàndínlọ́gọ́rin sáà kejì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ ju ọkà lọ, lẹ́yìn tí Abia Warrios tún gbá àmi-ayò mìíràn wọ̀lé, ẹ̀yí tí ó kásẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà nílẹ̀.
target: The Damaturu- based boys sustained the pressure until the 79th minute, when Manika Usman’s grounder beat Abia Warriors’ goalkeeper for the visitors’ lone goal.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Yobe Stars, Ganaru Mohammed ṣe sọ,Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ yìí bàmí nínú jẹ́ púpọ̀.
target: Yobe Stars’ coach Ganaru Mohammed, in a post-match interview, said he was disappointed with the outcome of the game.

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà Abia Warriors Emmanuel Deutsch gbósùbà káre láí fún ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n jáwé olúborí nínú ìfigagbága náà.
target: Also speaking, Abia Warriors’ coach Emmanuel Deutsch attributed the team’s victory to hard work and resilience.

input: Nàìjííríà já wálẹ̀ nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA.
target: Nigeria drops one spot further

input: Nàìjííríà já wálẹ̀ nínú ipò àtẹ tuntun àjọ FIFA, èyí tí ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé gbé jáde lọ́jọ́bọ Thursday.
target: Nigeria has dropped further one spot in the latest FIFA ranking released by the football governing body on Thursday.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àtẹ̀jáde àjọ FIFA tí ó jáde nínú ẹ̀rọ ayélujára wọn lọ́jọ́bọ Thursday ṣe sọ, Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles tí ó wà ní ipò mọ́kànléláàádọ́tà lágbàáyé pẹ̀lú àmì ọ̀tàlélẹ́gbẹ̀ta-dín-,mẹ́ta nínú oṣù-kínní ọdún yìí.
target: The Super Eagles, who were 51st in the world with 651 points in January, are now 52nd with 606 points, according to the ranking on FIFA’s official website on Thursday.

input: Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà sepò kejì nínú ìdíje CHAN tí ó wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Morocco.
target: The Nigeria team finished second at the African Nations Championship in Morocco recently.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, lẹ́yìn tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún já wálẹ̀ nínú àtẹ̀jáde ipò àtẹ FIFA lósù tí ó kọjá látàrí dídín àmì ikọ̀ náà tí wọ́n fi pegedé fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé, ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn olólùfẹ́ ikọ̀ Super-Eagles ló fọkàn si pé, ipò àtẹ mìíràn yóò wá sókè, ṣùgbọ́n tí kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀.
target: Having dropped in the January edition of the release due to the deduction of points from the World Cup qualifiers, most Nigerians would have hoped for an improvement, but that has not been the case.

input: Ní báyìí, Super Eagles dipò keje mú nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà, tí orílẹ̀-èdè Tunisia, Senegal, DR Congo, Morocco, Egypt àti Cameroon sì tẹ̀léra wọn.
target: The Super Eagles, however, remain seventh in Africa, where Tunisia, Senegal, DR Congo, CHAN champions Morocco, Egypt and Cameroon make up Africa’s top six countries.

input: Orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana, Burkina Faso àti Algeria náà tẹ̀léra wọn pẹ̀lú ipò kẹjọ, kẹsàn-án àti ìkẹwà-á lórí ipò àtẹ túntún ọ̀hún.
target: Ghana, Burkina Faso and Algeria are eighth, ninth and 10th respectively in Africa.

input: Ipò àtẹ tuntun mìíran yóò tún jáde lọ́jọ́ karùndínlógún oṣù kẹta .
target: The next FIFA World Ranking will be released on March 15.

input: Ronaldo fìtàn balẹ̀ nínú ìdíje Uefa Champions League gbígbá ọ̀gọ́rùn-ún àmì-ayò.wọ̀lé
target: Ronaldo sets record with 100th UEFA Champions League goal

input: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Real-madrid, Cristiano Ronaldo di agbábọ́ọ̀lù àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò gbá ọ̀gọ́rùn-ún àmì-ayò wọ̀lé nínú ìtàn ìdíje Uefa Champions League fún ikọ̀ kan-náà, lẹ́yìn tí ó gbá àmì-ayò méjì wọ̀lé nínú ìfagagbága pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Paris Saint-German lọ́jọ́rú Wednesday.
target: Cristiano Ronaldo on Wednesday became the first player to score 100 Champions League goals for the same club.This was when he found the net in Real Madrid’s last 16 clash at home to Paris Saint-Germain.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG ló kọ́kọ́ gbá àmì-ayò àkọ́kọ́ wọlé, ṣùgbọ́n ikọ̀ Real Madrid padà jáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóókan 3-1 ní pápá ìṣeré Santiago Bernabeu.
target: Real Madrid came back from a goal down to defeat PSG 3-1 at the Santiago Bernabeu.

input: Pápá ìṣeré Akwa-Ibom gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ pápá tí ó dára júlọ.
target: Akwa-Ibom stadium received the best stadium award.

input: Àmì-ẹ̀yẹ ọ̀hún náà fi ta ìpínlẹ̀ náà lọ́rẹ lásìkò ayẹyẹ tí ó wáyé nílùú Abuja tí ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí eré-ìdárayá àti ìdàgbàsókè àwọn ọ̀dọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè yìí ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀.
target: The award was given to the state during the celebration organized by the ministry of sprort and youth development in this nation.

input: Mínísítà eré-ìdárayá, Solomon Dalung ni adarí àgbà tó ń rí sí ṣíṣètò onírúurú nínú àjọ náà, ìyà-afin Hauwa Kulu-Akinyemi ló sojú rẹ̀, èyí tí kọmíṣọ́nà tó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ ìfitónilétí ní ìpínlẹ̀ Akwa-Ibom, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Charles Udoh gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ náà fún ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Akwa Ibom.
target: The Minister for sport, Solomon Dalung is the senior directo in charge of different peograms in the commission, Mrs Hauwa kulu-Akinyemi represented him, which the commissioner for information in Akwa-Ibom state, Mr Charles Udoh took the the award for Akwa-Ibom state.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àmì-ẹ̀yẹ ọ̀hún ló jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àmì-ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́ta tí ìpínlẹ̀ náà gbà nínú ayẹyẹ ọ̀hún.
target: The award was one of the three awards taken by the state in the celebration program.

input: Ìpínlẹ̀ náà tún gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ Diamond fún ìpínlẹ̀ tó ń ṣagbátẹrù ètò lọ́lọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan fún ìdàgbàsókè eré-ìdárayá jùlọ, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni wọ́n tún gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ akínkanjú, òǹfara jìn olólùfẹ́ eré-ìdárayá lórílẹ̀-èdè yìí.
target: The state also received Diamond award for the best state sponsoring different programs for the development of of sport, and also received the award of commited sport fan in this nation.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Udoh ṣe sọ,Gbígba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́ta náà ṣàfihàn iṣẹ́ rere tí Gómìnà Udom Emmanuel gbé ṣe láti mú eré-ìdárayá lọ́kùn-únkúndùn ní ìpínlẹ̀ náà,.
target: According to Udoh, receiving the three awards shows the good work that the Governor Udom Emmanuel did to take sport more importantly in the state.

input: Ní ìparí, alága ayẹyẹ ìgbàmì-ẹ̀yẹ ọ̀hún, Philips Asiegbu sọ pé, títẹ́wọ́ gba ikọ̀ Super Eagles àti ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan àtìlẹyìn ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ náà àti àwọn olólùfẹ́ rẹ̀ ṣokùnfá ṣíṣe àṣeyọrí àti jíjáwé olúborí nínú ìfigagbága ìpegedé ìdíje àgbááyé náà.
target: In conclusion the chairman of the award program, Phillips asiegba said accepting Super Eagles and different support of the state government and her fans brought about the success and victory in the world competition.

input: Ìpàdé Àjọ FIFA yóò wáyé nílùú Èkó.
target: FIFA executive summit to hold in Lagos

input: Àjọ tó ń rí si eré-ìdárayá bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, NFF sọ pé, ìpàdé àwọn tọ́rọ̀ kàn gbọ̀ngbọ̀n nínú Àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé, FIFA yóò wáyé nílùú Ékó, lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, èyí tí yóò jẹ́ ìpàdé kejìlá irúfẹ́ ìpàdé ọ̀hún báyìí, 12 FIFA Executive Football Summit EFS.
target: The Nigeria Football Federation has confirmed that FIFA will hold one of their 12 FIFA Executive Football Summit EFS meetings in Lagos, Nigeria.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Ààrẹ àjọ NFF, Amaju Pinnick ṣe sọ lásìkò tó ń bá àwọn akọ̀ròyìn sọ̀rọ̀ nílùú Abuja,Ìpàdé náà ni ìrètí wà tẹ́lẹ̀ pé yóò wáyé nínú oṣù kọkànlá ọdún 2017 sí oṣù kẹta ọdún 2018.
target: The FIFA Executive Football Summit meeting is expected to hold between November 2017 and March 2018.This was confirmed by the Nigeria Football Federation boss Amaju Pinnick in an address to the press.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àwọn tí yóò máa kópa nínú ìpàdé ọ̀hún nìrètí wà pé, wọn yóò mú ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìrírí àti ìdojúkọ tí orílẹ̀-èdè wọn là kọjá, eléyìí tí wọn yóò kojú nínú ìpàdé ọ̀hún.
target: Twelve presidents from African and six from the Caribbean are scheduled to report on their experiences and country-specific issues and bring themselves up to date on the global game in the summit that will provide all of the delegates with an opportunity to share their knowledge and coordinate next steps.

input: Pinnick fikún ọrọ rẹ̀ pé, Ààrẹ àjọ FIFA, Gianni Infantino yóò gúnlẹ̀ sí Nàìjííríà lọ́jọ́ Ajé Monday fún ìpàdé ọlọ́jọ́ mẹ́ta ọ̀hún, bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni yóò mú àwọn akọ̀ròyìn lágbàáyé wá sórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà,
target: Gianni Infantino will be in Nigeria on Monday for the FIFA Executive Summit which will be a three-day event and this will bring all international media down to Nigeria, Pinnick said.

input: NFF ń kẹ́dùn ikú Mgbolu.
target: NFF mourns Mgbolu

input: Àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà , NFF ti ṣe ìkẹ́dùn ikú agbẹnusọ̀rọ̀ àjọ ọ̀hún tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Austin Mgbolu.
target: The Nigerian Football Federation on Wednesday lamented the death of its former spokesman Austin Mgbolu.

input: Bákan náà, akọ̀wé àgbà àjọ NFF, Mohammed Sanusi ṣàlàyé pé, ìròyìn sọ pé Mgbolu ṣe iṣẹ́-abẹ lóṣù tí ó kọjá, léyìí tí ó sì fara hàn pé ara rẹ̀ ti mókun, ṣùgbọ́n tí àìsàn ọ̀hún tún peléke sí lọ́jọ́ru Wednesday léyìí tí ó ṣokùnfa ilé-ìwòsàn tí ó ti jáde láye.
target: The statement quoted the NFF General Secretary Mohammed Sanusi as saying, Reports said Mgbolu had a major surgery last month and appeared to have regained good health, before complications early on Wednesday morning led to his being rushed to the hospital where he died.

input: Nike ṣàfihàn àwọn ohun èlò tuntun tí Eagles yóò lò.
target: Eagles World Cup kits unveiled

input: Nike ti ṣàfíhan àwọn ohun èlò tuntun tí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles yóò lò nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia lọ́jọ́rùú Wednesday, nílùú London.
target: The Super Eagles’ new kits for the Russia 2018 World Cup were unveiled by Sports manufacturers Nike in London on Wednesday.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, aṣọ̀ tuntun ọ̀hún ló ṣàfihàn ẹ̀wù tí ikọ̀ Super-Eagles wọ̀ nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìpegedé ìdíje àgbááyé USA 94.
target: The jerseys feature the home kits that pay tribute to the 1994 squad which they wore during the USA ’94 World Cup qualifiers.

input: Alex Iwobi àti Sophia Omidiji wà lára àwọn tí o ṣàfihàn ẹ̀wù bọ́ọ̀lù tuntun ọ̀hún.
target: Alex Iwobi and Sophia Omidiji were among the models at the unveiling.

input: Ní báyìí, Eagles yóò lo ẹ̀wù tuntun náà fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ tí yóò wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ náà àti orílẹ̀-èdè Poland, kí wọn ó tó tẹkọ̀ létí lọ gbá ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ pẹ̀lú Croatia nínú ìdíje àgbááyé.
target: The Eagles will wear the jerseys for the first time when they face Poland in a friendly in Warsaw before the commencement of their World Cup campaign against Croatia at the Kaliningrad Stadium on June 16.

input: Nǹkan tí ikọ̀ le yí padà lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ni ìfẹ́ eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá.
target: A constant in Nigeria is an endearing love of football,.

input: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni, ẹ̀wù tuntun ọ̀hún ni Nike pèsè láti buyì kún àṣà orílẹ̀-èdè yìí.
target: The new Nike kit designs honour our federation’s rich traditions.

input: Rohr mú agbábọ́ọ̀lù CHAN Eagles méjì fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.
target: Rohr picks two CHAN Eagles for World Cup

input: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Gernot Rohr ti mú agbábọ́ọ̀lù méjì lára ikọ̀ CHAN Eagles láti kópa nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.Àwọn méjì ọ̀hún ni balógun ikọ̀ náà Ikechukwu Ezenwa àti agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn Stephen Eze.
target: Super Eagles coach Gernot Rohr has picked two players from 2018 CHAN to be part of his World Cup preparations – goalkeeper Ikechukwu Ezenwa and central defender Stephen Eze.

input: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan gbòógì lára òṣìṣẹ́ NFF ṣe sọ, Rohr ti pinnu láti mú Ezenwa àti Eze láti kópa nínú àwọn ikọ̀ rẹ̀ tí yóò kó lọ fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.Ó fikún ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ pé, ò wá kù sọ́wọ̀ àwọn méjèèjì láti jà fún ààyè wọ̣n nínú ikọ̀ náà.
target: Rohr has decided to pick Ezenwa and Eze for his World Cup preparations and it is now up to the two players to fight for a place in the final squad to Russia, a top official disclosed.

input: Nàìjííríà pegedé sínú àṣekágbá ìdíje CHAN tí ó wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Morocco, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n pàdánù ife-ẹ̀yẹ ọ̀hún sọ́wọ́ Morocco.
target: Nigeria reached the final of the CHAN in Morocco, where they lost to the home team.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Rohr ti kéde pé òun yóò mú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí yóò kópa fún òun nínú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ ọlọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan tí ikọ̀ Super-Eagles bá gbá fún ìgbáradì ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
target: Rohr has already announced he will name his squad for two important World Cup warm-up matches against Poland and Serbia by the first week of next month.

input: Ní báyìí, Super-Eagles yóò lọ kojú Poland lọ́jọ́ kẹtàlélógún oṣù kẹta ọdún tí a wà yìí, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni wọn yóò tún kojú Serbia lọ́jọ́ kẹtàdínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù kẹta nílùú London.
target: The Eagles are away to Poland on March 23, before they battle Serbia March 27 in London.

input: Netherland yan Koeman gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà tuntun.
target: Koeman named as Netherlands coach

input: Ronald Koeman ni orílẹ̀-èdè Netherland ti yàn báyìí gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà tuntun ikọ̀ ọ̀hún.
target: Ronald Koeman has been appointed as coach of the Netherlands national team.

input: Ní báyìí, ọmọ-ọdún mẹ́rìnléláàádọ́ta akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun ọ̀hún ló di akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá keje tí yóò tukọ̀ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè náà láti ọdún mẹ́jọ sẹ́yìn.
target: The 54-year-old former international defender is the seventh coach in eight years for the Dutch team, who have missed out on the last two major championships.

input: Mo lérò pé, orílẹ̀-èdè Netherland yẹ kó pegedé bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni, ó yẹ kí o ́máa kópa fún ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìdíje, mo rí àpẹẹrẹ tí ó dára fún ọjọ́ iwájú, eléyìí tí ó ṣokùnfà ìdí tí mo fi gba iṣẹ́ yìí.
target: I think the Netherlands should and must be qualifying for major finals and I see a bright future in that regard.That’s why I’ve taken the job.he said.

input: Orílẹ̀-èdè Netherland ṣe ipò kejì nínú irúfẹ́ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé ọ̀hún tí ó wáyé lọ́dún 2010, bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni wọ́n tún ṣe ipò kẹta lọ́dún 2014, ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tí ó wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè.
target: They were runners-up at the 2010 World Cup and finished third in Brazil four years later but failed to qualify for the 2014 finals in Brazil.

input: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìrètí yóò wà pé Ronald Koeman yóò ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ láti pegedé fún ìdíje Euro 2020, bákan náà ìdíje àgbááyé ọdún 2022 lórílẹ̀-èdè Qatar.
target: He will be expected to help the Dutch qualify for Euro 2020 and the World Cup in Qatar two years thereafter, reviving the team’s fortunes in the process.

input: Ní báyìí, Koeman yóò wàákò pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù England nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ ní pápá ìṣeré Amsterdam Arena lọ́jọ́ kẹtàlélógún oṣù kẹta ọdún tí a wà yìí, bákan náà, yóò tún máa wàákò pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Portugal nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ lọ́jọ́ kẹta sí ìfigagbága pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè England.
target: His first assignment will be a friendly against England at the Amsterdam Arena on March 23, followed by a meeting with Portugal in Geneva three days later.

input: Koeman tukọ̀ Ajax Amsterdam gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Eredivisie lórílẹ̀-èdè Netherland tí sáà 2001-02, 2003-04, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Ó tún tukọ̀ PSV Eindhoven gba irúfẹ́ ife-ẹ̀yẹ náà lọ́dún 2006-07.
target: He did, however, enjoy significant success as a club coach in his homeland winning three Eredivisie titles two with Ajax Amsterdam 2001-02, 2003-04 and one with PSV Eindhoven 2006-07.

input: Ní àfikún, Koeman ti tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Vitesse Arnhem, Benfica, Valencia, AZ Alkmaar, Feyenoord àti Southampton.
target: He has also coached Vitesse Arnhem, Benfica, Valencia, AZ Alkmaar, Feyenoord and Southampton.

input: Ọ̀yájúu baálé ní ń pàdé ìbòsí lọ́nà.

input: Pamí-nkú obìnrín ṣorí bẹmbẹ sọ́kọ.

input: San là ń rìn ajé ní ń múni pá kọ̀rọ̀.

input: Sún mọ ọ̀hún, sún mọ́ ìhín Bí a bá kan ògiri ilée baba ẹni, ṣe là ń dúró gbọin-gbọin.
target: Move away, move over here When one moves until one is against the walls of one's father's house, one stands steadfast.

input: Ṣágo ń búgò, ó ló ṣẹnu gbáṣọ́rọ́.

input: Ṣàgbà-ṣàgbà ò níí sé àgbà títí láí.

input: Ṣàkì ń ṣe bí ọ̀rá, egungun ń ṣe bí ẹran.

input: Ṣáláporẹ́ ò mọ ẹgbẹ́ ẹ̀ nínú omi.

input: Ṣe bóo ti mọ, ẹlẹ́wàa Ṣàpọ́n.
target: Moderate your preening and strutting, beautiful woman of Ṣàpọ́n.

input: Ta ní ń bẹ níbẹ̀ làgbẹ́ fi ń sán ìbàǹtẹ́ wọ̀lú.
target: Who is there whose opinion matters is the attitude that makes the farmer come into town dressed only in a loin cloth.

input: Ta ní mọ Òkolo lÓyọ̀ọ́
target: Who knows O'kolo in Ọ̀yọ́

input: Ta ní ń jájá ní mọ́ṣáláṣí
target: What would a dog be doing in a mosque

input: Ta ní ń jẹun tájá ń jùrù
target: At whose dinner table is the dog wagging its tail

input: Tẹ̀tẹ̀ kì í tẹ́.

input: Tòlótòló mọ ẹni tó ń yìnbọn ìdí sí.

input: Wèrè èèyàn ní ń wípé irú òun ò sí irú ẹ̀ẹ́ pọ̀ ó ju ẹgbàágbèje lọ.

input: Wọ́n ń pe gbẹ́nàgbẹ́nà ẹyẹ àkókó ń yọjú.

target: Go buy bean fritters for me so we can eat them together that spells uncertainly about one's right to send the person concerned on an errand.

input: A bímọ kò gbọ́n, a ní kó má ṣàá kú kí ní ń pa ọmọ bí àìgbọ́n
target: A child lacks wisdom, and some say that what is important is that the child does not die what kills more surely than lack of wisdom

input: A dẹ́bọ fún igúnnugún, ó ní òun kò rú a dẹ́bọ fún àkàlà, ó ní òun kò rú a dẹ́bọ fún ẹyẹlé, ẹyẹlé gbẹ́bọ, ó rúbọ.
target: A sacrifice was prescribed for the vulture, but it refused to sacrifice a sacrifice was prescribed for the ground-hornbill, but it declined to sacrifice a sacrifice was prescribed for the pigeon, and it gathered the prescribed materials and made the sacrifice.

input: A fọwọ́ mú ajá o lọ, a ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń fi ìka méjì pè é.

input: A fún ọ lọ́bẹ̀ o tami si o gbọ́n ju ọlọ́bẹ̀ lọ.
target: You are given some stew and you add water you must be wiser than the cook.

input: A kì í bọ́ sínú omi tán ká máa sá fún òtútù.

input: A kì í dá aró nÍṣokùń àlà là ń lò.

input: A kì í fá orí lẹ́yìn olórí.

input: A kì í fi àì-mọ̀-wẹ̀ mòòkùn.

input: A kì í fi ara ẹni ṣe oògun alọ̀kúnná.

input: A kì í fi aṣọ ṣèdìdí yọwó.

input: A kì í fi ẹ̀tẹ̀ sílẹ̀ pa làpálàpá.

input: A kì í fi ìgbín sọ̀kò sórìṣà.

input: A kì í fi iná sórí òrùlé sùn.

input: A kì í fi ìtìjú kárùn.

input: A kì í fi owó du oyè-e alágbára.

input: A kì í pé kí òṣìkà ṣe é ká wò ó.

input: A kì í rí àjẹkù orò.

input: A kì í rí ewé nílẹ̀ ká fọwọ́ fámí.

input: A kì í rí ẹ́ni ranni lẹ́rù ká yọké.

input: A kì í sọrọ ìkọ̀kọ̀ lójú olófòófó.

input: A kì í sùn jẹ́rìí ìdí.
target: One cannot be asleep and also be able to vouch for one's anus.

input: A kì í ṣe fáàárí ẹ̀ṣẹ́ dídì sọ́mọ adẹ́tẹ̀.
target: One does not flaunt one's ability to make a fist in the face of a leper's child.

target: One does not drool in jest in the presence of the child of an epileptic.

input: A kì í ṣoore tán ká lóṣòó tì í.
target: One does not do a favor and then camp by it.

input: A kì í ṣòwò méjì kẹ́ran má jẹ ọ̀kan.

input: A kì í ti ojú ogun wẹ́fọ́n.

input: A kì í ti ojú oníka-mẹ́sàn-án kà á.

input: A kì í tijú bá baálé ilé jẹ akátá bó bá mú, ìwọ náà a mú tìẹ.
target: One should not be too embarrassed to eat a jackal with one's host as he helps himself, one also helps oneself.

input: A kì í wá aláṣọ-àlà nísọ̀ elépo.

input: A kì í wà nínú ìṣẹ́ ká perin tọrẹ.

input: A kì í wíjọ́ọ wíwò ká jàre.

target: One does not praise a child in his presence only backsliding results.

input: A kúnlẹ̀ a pàgbò, alubàtá ní ojú ò fẹ́rakù o fẹ́ bá wọn ṣúpó ni
target: We kneel and sacrifice a ram, and the bàtá drummer shows reluctance to take his leave.Does he wish to inherit a wife

input: A lé tẹ̀m̀bẹ̀lẹ̀kun jìnnà bí ẹni pé kó bọ́ jù sígbó.
target: One chases conspiracy away, as though one would have it disappear into the bush.

input: À n fọ̀tún tẹ́ní, à ń fòsì tú ṣòkòtò, obìnrín ní a kò bá òun gbọ́ tọmọ.
target: One spreads a mat with the right hand while removing one's pants with the left hand yet the woman complains that one is not helping her quest for a child.

input: À ń gba òròmọ adìẹ lọ́wọ́ ikú, ó ní wọn ò jẹ́ kí òun lo̩ jẹ̀ láàtàn.
target: One struggles to save the chick from certain death, and it complains that one is preventing it from foraging at the dump.

input: À ń gbèjà Ọ̀jà, Ọ̀já ní ta ní ń jà lẹ́yìnkùlé òun
target: We fight in defence of Ọ̀jà, and Ọ̀jà asks who is fighting in his backyard.

input: A ní ìrókò ni yó pa ọmọdé, ó bojú-wẹ̀yìn òòjọ́ ní ń jà
target: One curses a child that ìrókò will kill him, and he glances at his rear does the curse take effect immediately

input: A ní kí olókùnrùn ṣe tó, ó ní òun ò lè ṣe tó, tò, tó.

input: A ní kọ́mọ má kùú, o ní kò jọ bàbá kò jọ ìyá.

target: Curses are the antidote for curses.

input: Eré là ń fọmọ ayò ṣe.

target: The teasing involves pounded yams the corn-loaf is unwrapped, and the father of the household asks, Did someone call me

target: The teasing involves pounded yam even if you throw me on the ground I will eat with you.

target: he exclaims, What a maze of apartments

target: The person people have gathered to watch should not himself or herself be a spectator.

target: Whoever people speak to should listen whoever people instruct should accept instruction the one who does not listen will be covered by the earth.

input: Ẹni àìgbọ́n pa ló pọ̀ ẹni ọgbọ́n pa ò tó nǹkan.

input: Ẹní bá ríkun nímú ọlọ́jà ní ń fọn ọ́n.

target: One appeals only to those capable of helping one.

target: Whoever deprives himself of the title of Apena will wait until he dies before tasting free meat.

input: Ẹní gbọ́n juni lọ ní ń tẹni nÍfá.

input: Ẹní léku méjì á pòfo.
target: Whoever chases after two rats will catch neither.

target: Whoever wishes to raise an alarm will have to murder his father.

input: Ẹní rúbọ òrìṣà gbọ́dọ̀ rú ti èèyàn kí ẹbọọ́ tó gbà.
target: Whoever offers a sacrifice to a deity must also offer a sacrifice to humans in order for the sacrifice to be efficacious.

input: Ẹni tí a bá fi oríi rẹ̀ fọ́ àgbọn ò níí jẹ níbẹ̀.
target: The person on whose head a coconut is broken will not share in eating it.

input: Ẹni tí a bá ń bá nájà là ń wò, a kì í wo ariwo ọjà.
target: One pays attention to the person with whom one is bargaining, not to the commotion of the market place.

input: Ẹni tí a wífún kó gbọ́ ẹni tí kò gbọ́, taraa rẹ̀ ni yó dà.
target: Let the person one advises heed one the heedless person places himself at risk.

input: Ẹni tí ẹ̀gún gún lẹ́sẹ̀ ní ń ṣe lákáǹláká tẹ̀lé alábẹ́rẹ́.
target: It is the person with a thorn in his foot who limps to the person with a needle.

input: Ẹni tí kò gbọ́n lààwẹ̀ ń gbò.
target: Only the unwise hungers while fasting.

input: Ẹni tí kò mọ iṣẹ́ẹ́ jẹ́ ní ń pààrà lẹ́ẹ̀mejì.
target: It is a person who does not know how to carry out instructions that is forced to repeat his or her efforts.

input: Ẹni tí kò mọ ọba ní ń fọba ṣeré.
target: Only a person who does not know the king trifles with the king.

input: Ẹni tí ó lè jà ni yóò kúnlẹ̀ kalẹ́.
target: It is the incorrigible fighter who has to remain on his or her knees until nightfall.

input: Ẹni tí yó bọ Ògún, yó ra ọjàa tirẹ̀ lọ́tọ̀.
target: The person who will worship Ògun will keep his or her market purchases separate from those of others.

input: Ẹni tí yó fò yó bẹ̀rẹ̀.
target: The person who will leap must first crouch.

input: Ẹni tí yó mu ẹ̀kọ fòrò, yó bàá ọmọ ẹlẹ́kọ ṣeré.

input: Ẹni tí yó mu ẹ̀kọ ọ̀fẹ́ yó bàá ọmọ ẹlẹ́kọ ṣeré.
target: The person who wishes to eat free corn pap will play with the seller's child.

input: Ẹni tí yó ṣòwò àlè, ẹníi rẹ̀ ní ń ká ẹni tí yó ṣòwòo Ṣàngó, ààjàa rẹ̀ ní ń rà.
target: Whoever chooses concubinage as a practice must provide herself with a sleeping mat whoever chooses Ṣàngò's trade one to do with metal must purchase his magical rattle.

input: Ẹni tí yó yááni lówó, tí kò níí sinni, ohùn ẹnuu rẹ̀ la ti ń mọ̀.
target: one can tell from the tone of his or her voice.

input: Ẹni tó bá da omi síwájú á tẹ ilẹ̀ tútù.
target: Whoever throws water ahead will step on cool earth.

input: Ẹni tó bá fi ojù àná wòkú, ẹbọra a bọ́ ọ láṣọ.

input: Ẹni tó bá máa jẹ ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ a jẹ èyí tó lẹ́yin.
target: If one must eat a toad one should eat one with eggs.

input: Ẹni tó bá máa lu òṣùgbó a lu ńlá kékeré ẹgbẹ̀fà, ńlá ẹgbẹ̀fà.
target: Whoever will smite a secret-cult priest had better smite an important one for a lowly one twelve hundred cowries in fines, and for an important one twelve hundred cowries.

input: Ẹni tó bá máa mú ọ̀bọ a ṣe bí ọ̀bọ.

target: It is a person who has prior knowledge of the facts of a matter that can foil a devious person's attempts to skirt them.

input: Ẹni tó bá ní igbàá lò, bí igbàá bá já, kó dúró so ó.
target: If one must use a tree-climbing rope and it breaks, one must pause to repair it.

input: Ẹni tó bá pẹ́ lórí imí, eṣinṣin kéṣinṣin yóò bá a níbẹ̀.

input: Ẹni tó bá rántí Efuji, kó má fi ore ṣe ẹṣin.

target: The vulture has endured the drenching rain from a great distance, but who sent the vulture on an errand

target: The rainy season passes, the dry season passes, and the suggestion is that the rat's burrow be sealed up tight when will the time be ripe to kill the rat

input: Ìgbà tí a bá dóko làárọ̀ ẹni.

input: Ìgbà tí a bá rẹni lòwúrọ̀ ẹni.
target: Whenever one first sees a person, that is that person's morning.

input: Igbá tó gbédè là ń pè lóṣùwọ̀n.

input: Ìgbín ìbá má mọ̀ ọ́n jẹ̀ ìbá ti kú síjù.

target: The snail never embarks on a dyeing trade, and the spotted grass-mouse never digs for àràn.

input: Igbó lẹranko ń gbé.
target: The forest is the home for animals to live in.

input: Ìgbọ̀nwọ́ ti kékeré yọké.
target: The elbow develops a hump right from its youth.

input: Ìjà ní ń pa onítìjú ogun ní ń pa alágbára.
target: A street fight is the death of a bashful person warring is the death of a strong man.

input: Ijó ní ń bọ́ṣọ, ìjà ní ń bọ́ ẹ̀wù.
target: It is dance that strips one of one's cloth it is a fight that takes off one's shirt.

input: Ikúdú pa ẹṣin à ń yọ̀ ó ń bọ̀ wá pa ọmọ èèyàn.
target: An abandoned well kills a horse and we rejoice it will in time kill a human being.

input: Ilé ajá là ń wá ìwo lọ
target: Is a dog's house the place to go in search of horns

input: Ilé olóuńjẹ là ń dẹ̀bìtì àyà sí.
target: It is in the home of a person who has food that one sets one's chest like a trap.

input: Ilẹ̀ nìjòkò ń jókòó de ìdí.
target: It is on the ground that the stool sits to await the buttocks.

input: Ìlẹ̀kẹ̀ àmúyọ, a kì í sin kádìí tán.
target: One does not string decorative beads all around one's waist.

input: Ìloro là ń wọ̀ ká tó wọlé.
target: One enters the porch first before one enters the house.

input: Iná èsìsì kì í jóni lẹ́ẹ̀mejì.
target: The fire of the stinging tragia plant does not burn a person twice.

input: Iná kúkú ni yó ba ọbẹ̀ ará oko jẹ́.
target: It is too much fire that will ruin the stew of a bushman.

input: Iná tó ń lérí omi á kù sọnù.
target: The fire that challenges water will die off.

input: Ìpàṣán tí a fi na ìyálé ń bẹ láàjà fún ìyàwó.
target: The whip used on the senior wife is resting on the rafters waiting for the new wife.

input: Ìròrẹ́ ò leè jà ó múlé ti agbọ́n.
target: Ìròrẹ́ cannot fight, so it makes its home close to the wasp's.

input: Isó inú ẹ̀kú, à-mú-mọ́ra.
target: The fart within a masquerader's shroud is something to be endured.

input: Onígbá ní ń pe igbá ẹ̀ ní àíkàrágbá káyé tó fi kólẹ̀.
target: It is the owner of the calabash who first called it a broken piece of gourd before the world used it for scooping dirt.

input: Onígbèsè tí ń pa àpatà ẹyẹ́lé.
target: Habitual debtor who butchers a pigeon for sale.

input: Onígẹ̀gẹ́ fìlẹ̀kẹ̀ dọ́pọ̀ adámú fi sàárà san ẹgbẹ̀ta.
target: The goitered person sets a low price on beads the person with a blocked nose repays six thousand cowries with alms.

input: Oníṣègùn tó sọ pé díẹ̀ ò tó òun, òfo ni yó fọwọ́ mú.
target: The medicine man who is dissatisfied with a modest payment will wind up with nothing.

input: Ooré pẹ́, aṣiwèrèé gbàgbé.
target: The favor is long past the imbecile forgets.

input: Orí ọ̀kẹ́rẹ́ popo láwo bí a wí fọ́mọ ẹni a gbọ́ràn.
target: The squirrel's head sits in a plate like a lump if one counsels one's child it should listen.

input: Orí tí yó jẹ igún kì í gbọ́ bí wọ́n fun ládìẹ kò níí gbà.
target: The head that is destined to eat a vulture cannot be saved if a chicken is offered to it it will refuse.

input: Orí tó kọ ẹrù, owó ní ńnáni.
target: A head that refuses to carry loads will cost its owner some money.

input: Orin tí ò ṣoroó dá kì í ṣòroó gbè bí ó bá ní héééé, à ní háááá.
target: A song that is not difficult to lead is not difficult to follow if the leader sings haaaay, one responds haaaah.

input: Orín yí, ìlùú yí padà.
target: The song changes, and the drumming changes to suit.

input: Òrìṣà tó ní tÒgún kì í ṣe ọ̀nà ò ní rí nńkan jẹ lásìkò tó fẹ́.
target: The god that says matters pertaining to Ògún are irrelevant will not find anything to eat when heshe wishes.

input: Oòrùn kì í jẹ iṣu àgbà kó má mọbẹ̀.
target: An elder does not lose his yams to the sun without knowing where the event happened.

input: Oòrùn kì í là kínú bí olóko.
target: The sun does not shine and cause displeasure in the farmer.

input: Òṣùpá lé a ní kò gún ẹni tọ́wọ́ ẹ̀ ẹ́ bá to kó tún un ṣe.
target: The moon appears and people say it is not straight whoever can reach it let him go and right it.

input: Òtòṣì ò gbọ́ tìṣẹ́ ẹ̀ ó ní ogún kó àparò ọdẹ́ rorò.
target: The destitute person does not look to repairing his fortune he says the partidge has been captured in a war, for the hunter is merciless.

input: Owó kì í lóye kọ́mọ kú sẹ́rú.
target: If the amount of money is known, a child cannot die in slavery.

input: Owó kì í yéye kọ́mọ ó kú.
target: If money is available in abundance, a child does not die.

input: Owó la fi ń fíná owó bí ẹgbẹ̀rún bá so lókè, igbió la fi ń ká a.
target: Money is what one uses to kindle the fire for money if a thousand cowries grow from the branches above, one uses two hundred cowries to pluck them.

input: Owó la fi ń lògbà ọgbọ́n la fi ń gbélé ayé.
target: It is with money that we secure pleasures it is with wisdom that one secures a good life.

input: Owó ní ń pa ọjà ọ̀mọ̀ràn.
target: It is money that brings a knowing person's trading to a conclusion.

input: Owó tọ́mọdé bá kọ́kọ́ ní, àkàrà ní ń fií rà.
target: The first money a youth comes into he spends on bean fritters.

input: Òwú kì í là kínú bí olóko.
target: The cotton seed does not open and thus anger the farmer.

input: Owú pani ju kùmọ̀.
target: Jealousy kills more surely than a cudgel.

input: Òyìnbó Òkè Eléérú, ó ṣubú sóde Alọ́ba kùmọ̀ ni yó gbe dìde.
target: The white man from Òkè Elérú he collapses in front of Alọba's compound cudgels will help him up.

input: Ọ̀bẹ ń wólé ara ẹ̀ ó ní òún ń ba àkọ̀ jẹ́.
target: The knife is destroying its own home, it says it is ruining the sheath.

input: Ọbẹ̀ tí baálé kì í jẹ, ìyáálé ilé kì í sè é.
target: The sort of stew the man of the house will not eat, the woman of the house should not cook.

input: Ọ̀dẹ̀ ọmọ ń fi ìdò ṣeré.
target: An idiot child that plays with ìdò flowers.

input: Ọ̀dẹ̀dẹ̀ ò gba òró, àfi abẹ́ ọdán.
target: The porch does not accommodate standing people only the shade of the ọdán banyan tree does.

input: Ọ̀fàfà fohùn ṣakin.
target: The tree-bear wins renown with its voice.

input: Ọgbọ́n a-dákọ-kéré ò tó ti a-yọwó-má-rà.
target: The cunning of the person who skimps on the measure of her corn meal is not as great as that of the would-be purchaser who refuses to buy.

input: Ọgbọ́n dùn-ún gbọ́n ìmọ́ dùn-ún mọ̀.
target: Wisdom is a good thing to have knowledge is a good thing to have.

input: Ọgbọ́n ju agbára.
target: Wisdom is greater than strength.

input: Ọgbọ́n kì í tán.
target: Wisdom is never used up.

input: Ọgbọn la fi ń gbé ayé.
target: One needs wisdom to live in this world.

input: Ọgbọ́n lajá fi ń pa ìkokò bọ Ifá.
target: It is cunning that the dog employs in order to sacrifice a wolf to Ifá.

input: Ọgbọ́n ní ń ṣẹgun ìmọ̀ràn ní ń ṣẹ́ ẹ̀tẹ̀.
target: Cunning wins battles knowledge defeats plots.

input: Ọgbọ́n ọlọgbọ́n la fi ń ṣọgbọ́n, ìmọ̀ràn ẹnìkan ò tọ́ bọ̀rọ̀.
target: One learns wisdom from other people's wisdom one person's knowledge does not amount to anything.

input: Ọgbọ́n tí ahún gbọ́n, ẹ̀yìn ni yó máa tọ ti ìgbín.
target: The cunning that the tortoise has will always rank behind that of the snail.

input: Ọgbọ́n tí ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ fi pa ẹfọ̀n ló fi ń jẹ ẹ́.
target: The same cunning with which the toad killed the buffalo will show it how to eat the prey.

input: Ọgbọọgbọ́n làgbàlagbàá fi ń sá fún ẹran ńlá.
target: It is with cunning that a grown man runs away from a bull.

input: Ọjọ́ eré là ń jiyàn ohun.
target: It is on a playful occasion that one argues about matters.

input: Ọjọ́ tíìlùú bá ń lu onílù, iṣẹ́ mìíràn-án yá.
target: The day the drum begins to beat the drummer is the day he should seek another employment.

input: Ọjọ́ tí olówó ń ṣẹbọ ni à-wà-jẹ-wà-mu ìwọ̀fà.
target: The day the person who did the hiring makes a sacrifice is the day the hired hand eats and drinks.

input: Ọ̀kẹ́rẹ́ ń sunkún agbádá èyí tí àjàòó dá léṣìí kí ló fi ṣe Ṣebí igi ló fi n gùn.
target: The squirrel weeps for want of a stately garment the garment the àjàò bird made last year, what did it do with it Was it not tree climbing it used the garment for

input: Ọkọ́ ọlọ́kọ́ la fi ń gbọ́n èkìtì.
target: It is other people's hoe that one uses to clear a mound of rubbish.

input: Ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan là ń yọ ẹsẹ̀ lábàtà.
target: One at a time is how one extricates one's feet from a mire.

input: Ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan là ń yọ ẹsẹ̀ lẹ́kù.
target: One at a time is how one removes one's legs from a masquerade costume.

input: Ọkùnrin jẹ́jẹ́ a-bìwà-kunkun.
target: An easy-going man's gentle mien hides a strong disposition.

input: Ọlọ ò lọ ló dé Ìbarà Ìbarà a máa ṣe ilé ọlọ
target: If the grindstone did not move, how did it get to Ìbarà Is Ìbarà the home of grindstones

input: Ọlọ́gbọ́n jẹni bí ẹmùrẹ́n aṣiwèré jẹni bí ìgbọ̀ngbọ̀n.
target: The wise person bites one like a mosquito the mad person bites one like a gadfly.

input: Ọlọgbọ́n ló lè mọ àdììtú èdè.
target: Only a wise person can decipher the meaning of speech.

input: Ọlọgbọ́n ni yó jogún ògo aṣiwèrè ni yó ru ìtìjú wálé.
target: The wise child will inherit glory the idiot child will bring shame home with him.

input: Ọlọgbọ́n ọmọ ní ń mú inúu bàbá ẹ̀ dùn aṣiwèrè ọmọ ní ń ba inú ìyá ẹ̀ jẹ́.
target: A wise child gladdens the heart of his father an imbecile of a child saddens the heart of his mother.

input: Ọlọ́jà kì í wí pé kọ́jà ó tú.
target: The owner of the market never wishes the market to be disrupted.

input: Ọlọ́tí kì í mọ ọmọ ẹ̀ lólè
target: The wine seller never realizes that his child is a thief.

input: Ọlọ́tọ̀ọ́ ní tòun ọ̀tọ̀ ìyá ẹ̀ẹ́ kú nílé, o gbé e lọ sin sóko.
target: Ọlọ́tọ̀ says his ways are different his mother dies at home and he takes her to the farm for burial.

input: Ọmọ atiro tó ra bàtà fún bàbá ẹ̀, ọ̀rọ̀ ló fẹ́ gbọ́.
target: The child of a cripple who bought shoes for his father is asking for a stern lecture.

input: Ọmọ ẹní dàra, bíi ká fi ṣaya kọ́.
target: One's child may be beautiful, but one cannot make her one's wife.

input: Ọmọ ẹni ẹlẹni ò jọ ọmọ ẹni ọmọ eni ìbá jiyán, ọmọ ẹni ẹlẹ́ni a jẹ̀kọ.
target: Other people's children are not like one's own when one's child eats pounded yams, other people's children will eat corn meal loaf.

input: Ọmọ ẹni kì í gbọnsẹ̀ ká fi eèsún nù ú nídìí.
target: One does not, after one's child defecates, wipe the child's anus with the abrasive elephant grass.

input: Ọmọ iná là ń rán síná.
target: It is the child of fire that one sends on an errand to fire.

input: Ọmọọ̀ mi ò yó la mọ̀ ọmọọ̀ mí yó, ṣùgbọ́n kò rí sáárá fẹ́, a ò mọ ìyẹn.
target: My child did not have enough to eat, we understand My child had enough to eat but had no snuff to snort, that we do not understand.

input: Ọmọ tí ò ní baba kì í jìjà ẹ̀bi.
target: A fatherless child should not engage in an unjust fight.

input: Ọmọdé kékeré ò mọ ogun, ó ní kógun ó wá, ó ní bógún bá dé òun a kó síyàrá ìyá òun.
target: A small child does not know what war is like, hence, he says that war should break out, for when it does he will go hide in his mother's room.

input: Ọmọdé kì í mọ àkókò tí kúrò-kúròó fi ń kúrò.
target: A small child never knows when kúròkúrò takes its leave.

input: Ọmọde kì í mọ ìtàn, kó mọ à-gbọ́-wí, kó mọ ọjọ́ tí a ṣe ẹ̀dá òun.
target: A child does not know so much history and know so much hearsay that it knows the day of its creation.

input: Ọmọdé kì í mọ orií jẹ kó má rá a lẹ́nu.
target: A child is never so careful about eating corn meal that it does not smear the meal on its mouth.

input: Ọmọdé kì í ní ina níle kí tòde má jòó o.
target: A child does not have fire at home and therefore escape being burned by the fire abroad.

input: Ọmọdé mọ sáárá, ṣùgbọ́n kò mọ àlọ̀yí.
target: A child knows snuff, but does not know how to grind and turn the tobacco.

input: Ọmọdé ní wọ́n ńjẹ igún, bàbá ẹ̀ẹ́ ní wọn kì í jẹ ẹ́ ó ní ẹnìkán jẹ ẹ́ rí lójú òun bàbá ẹ̀ẹ́ ní ta ni Ó ní ẹni náà ò sí.
target: A child says that people do eat vultures, and its father says people do not the child says someone did eat a vulture in its presence its father asks, who The child says the person is dead.

input: Ọmọdé ò mẹ̀fọ́, ó ń pè é légbògi.
target: A child does not recognize a vegetable and calls it medicine.

input: Ọmọdé ò mọ oògùn, ó ń pè é lẹ́fọ̀o kò mọ̀ pé ikú tó pa baba òun ni.
target: A child does not know medicine and he therefore calls it vegetables it does not recognize it as what killed its father.

input: Ọmọdé ò moògùn ó ń pè é lẹ́gùn-ún.
target: A child does not know medicine and says it is a thorn.

input: Ọmọdé yìí, máa wò mí lójú, ẹni tí a bá lọ sóde là ń wò lójú.
target: Child, keep your eyes on me one keeps one's eyes on the person who takes one visiting.

input: Ọ̀mọ̀ràn ní ń mọ oyún ìgbín.
target: Only a sage knows the pregnancy of a snail.

input: Ọ̀pá gbóńgbó ní n ṣíwájú agbọ́ọni.
target: It is a small walking-stick that goes before the person who walks a path overhung with foliage that is wet with morning dew.

input: Ọpẹ́ ló yẹ ẹrú.
target: Gratitude is what befits the slave.

input: Ọ̀pẹ̀lẹ̀ èèyàn, bí a ò bá gbé e lulẹ̀, kò níí lè fọhùn ire.
target: unless you throw him down he will not talk sense.

input: Ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ ní kéjò máa kálọ ìjà òún di ojú ọ̀nà.
target: The toad tells the snake to follow it, for it does not fight except by the roadside.

input: Ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ ní òún lè sín ìlẹ̀kẹ̀ ta ní jẹ́ fi ìlẹ̀kẹ̀ ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ sídìí ọmọọ ẹ̀
target: The toad boasts that it knows how to string beads who, though, would put a toad's beads around his child's waist

input: Ọ̀pọ̀lọ̀ ń yan káńdú-kàǹdù-káńdú lóju ẹlẹ́gùúsí ẹlẹ́gùúsí ò gbọdọ̀ yí i lata.
target: The toad struts nonchalantly before the person cooking ẹ̀gúsí stew the person cooking the ẹ̀gúsí stew will never add it to the ingredients.

input: Ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ ò mọ̀nà odò, ó dà á sí àwàdà.
target: The toad does not know the way to the stream and turns matters into a jest.

input: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ òjò ní ń lé eégún wọlé kẹri-kẹri.
target: It is a deluge that chases the eégún masquerader indoors indefinitely.

input: Ọ̀ràn kan la fi ń ṣòfin ọ̀kan.
target: One problem serves as the basis for a law that will apply to another case.

input: Ọ̀ràn ọlọ́ràn la fi ń kọ́gbọ́n.
target: From other people's problems one learns wisdom.

input: Ọ̀ràn tí ò sunwọ̀n, konko ǹ ṣojú.
target: A matter that is unpalatable hardens the eyes.

input: Ọ̀rọ̀ kì í gbórín ká fi ọ̀bẹ bù ú, ẹnu la fi ń wí i.
target: A problem is not so formidable that one attacks it with a knife one tackles it with the mouth.

input: Ọ̀rọ̀ la fi ń jẹ omitooro ọ̀rọ̀.
target: Words are the things with which to savor the delicious broth of words.

input: Ọ̀rọ̀ọ́ ni òun ò nílé ibi tí wọ́n bá rí ni wọ́n ti ń sọ òun.
target: Discourse says it has no home people engage in it wherever they please.

input: Ọ̀rọ̀ rere ní ń yọ obì lápò ọ̀rọ̀ búburú ní ń yọ ọfà lápó.
target: Good talk brings the kola-nut out of the pouch provocative talk draws the arrow out of th quiver.

input: Ọ̀rọ̀ tí ọlọgbọ́n bá sọ, ẹnu aṣiwèrè la ti ń gbọ́ ọ.
target: Whatever a wiseman says will be heard repeated by the nitwit.

input: Ọ̀rọ̀ tó dojú rú di ti ọlọ́rọ̀, ayé á dẹ̀yìn.
target: A problem that is too complicated to resolve becomes the sole responsibility of the person concerned the world leaves himher to hisher devices.

input: Ọsán gbé ojú ọrun le kókó bó bá wọ odò, a di ọ̀-rọ̀-pọ̀jọ̀-pọ̀jọ̀.
target: The bow-string is taut while it remains on the bow dipped into the river it becomes very soft indeed.

input: Ọ̀sán ọ̀run ò pọ́n ẹni tó bá yá kó máa bá tiẹ̀ lọ.
target: It is not yet noon time in heaven whoever is anxious to get there may go ahead by himselfherself.

input: Ọwọ́ aṣiwèrè ni a gbé ń bá apá yíya.
target: It is in the hands of an imbecile that one finds a severed arm.

input: Ọ̀wọ̀ọ kókó la fi ń wọ igi ọ̀wọ̀ òrìṣà la fi ń wọ àfín.
target: The regard one has for the knob is the one with which one clothes the tree the regard one has for the gods is the same that one invests the albino with.

input: Rà á ire, gà á ire ìpéǹpéjú ni àlàa fìlà.
target: Press it well on the head puff it out the eyebrow is the limit for the cap.

input: Ràdà-ràdà-á mọ ibi tí ó ńrè.
target: The meandering person knows where he is headed.

input: Rírí tí a rí igún la fi ń ta igún lọ́fà.
target: It is because one sees the vulture that one shoots arrows at it.

input: Sìn mí ká relé àna, ó wẹ̀wù ẹtù.
target: Go with me to my in-laws' home, and he wore a garment made from rich hand-woven material.

input: Sọ̀rọ̀ kí ọlọ́rọ̀ gbọ́, àbùkù ní ń fi kanni.
target: Spreading rumors into the ears of the subject of the rumor brings disgrace to one.

input: Ṣàǹgó kì í jà kó mú ilé aró.
target: Ṣango does not fight and destroy the enclosure for dyeing.

input: Ṣàngó ní òun ní ń kó ọkùnrin suuru bá jà Èṣù ní bíi tòun Ṣàngó ní kí tÈṣù kúrò.
target: Ṣàngó says he gathers people around him to fight together Èṣù asks if Ṣàngó includes people like him, and Ṣàngó says Èṣù is the exception.

input: Ṣe mí níṣu ní ń ṣíwájú ẹ kúuṣẹ́ bí
target: Does Give me some yam go before Hello there, you working man.

input: Ṣẹ̀kẹ̀rẹ̀ ò ṣéé fọ̀pá na.
target: The beaded musical gourd is not something to play with a stick.

input: Ṣẹ́kẹ́ṣẹkẹ̀ dára, ṣùgbọ́n alágbẹ̀dẹ ò rọ ọ́ fún ọmọ ẹ̀.
target: Handcuffs are pretty, but the blacksmith does not fashion them for his own child.

input: Sútà ò nílé ìkóríta lÈṣù ń gbé.
target: Perfidy has no home the home of Èṣù is the crossroads.

input: Ta lèèyàn nínú ẹrú Ààrẹ A ní Ìdaganna la wá wá, ẹ ní Ìdakolo
target: Which of the Ààrẹ́'s slaves is a person of any account We said we came looking for Ìdaganna, and you ask, Ìdakolo

input: Ta ní jẹ́ jẹ ọṣẹ kó fògìrì fọṣọ
target: Who would eat soap and wash clothes with fermented beans

input: Ta ní mọ̀dí òjò, bí kò ṣe Ṣàngó
target: Who can know the secret of the rain if not Ṣàngo

input: Tábà tí ò dùn, ẹnu ò tà á.
target: Snuff that is not pleasant, the mouth cannot not sell.

input: Tèmi ò ṣòro, tí kì í jẹ kọ́mọ alágbẹ̀dẹ ní idà.
target: Mine is not urgent.which prevents the son of the blacksmith from owning a sword.

input: Tẹni ní ń jọnilójú eèràá bímọọ ẹ̀ ó sọ ọ́ ní òyírìgbí.
target: One's own thing is what impresses one the ant has a child and names it The-one-who-rolls-mightily-around.

input: Tẹni-n-tẹni bí àpọ́n bá sun iṣu a bù fọ́mọọ ẹ̀.
target: One's own is one's own when a man without a wife roasts yams he cuts a piece for his child.

input: Tẹ̀tẹ́ ní ń ṣíwájú eré sísa.
target: A child's learning to walk comes before running.

input: Tiè̩é̩ sàn, tèmí sàn, lolókùnrùn méjì fi ń dìmú.
target: Your condition is better My condition is better, is what gets two invalids into a fight.

input: Tinú ọ̀lẹ lọ̀lẹ ń jẹ aṣiwèrè èèyàn ni ò mọ èrú tí yó gbà.
target: The lazy person eats the products of his native wisdom only a fool does not know what devious way will be fruitful.

input: Wàrà-wàrà là ń yọ oró iná.
target: When one is on fire one's reaction is extremely agile.

input: Wèrèé dùn-ún wò, kò ṣéé bí lọ́mọ.
target: An imbecile makes an entertaining spectacle, but one would not want one as one's child.

input: Wèrèé yàtọ̀ sí wéré wéré kì í ṣe wèrè ìjá yàtọ̀ sí eré.
target: Madness differs from the singing of Islamic songs the singing of Islamic songs is not madness fighting is different from playing.
