input: Bí a bá fi ọdún mẹ́ta ṣánpá, ọdún mélòó la ó fi fò
target: If one spends three years flapping one's arms, how many years will one take to fly

input: Bí a bá fi ọwọ́ kan fọmọ fọ́kọ, ọwọ́ mẹ́wẹ̀ẹ̀wá kì í ṣeé gbà á mọ́.
target: If one gives a girl away in marriage with one hand, ten hands will not suffice to take her back.

input: Bí a bá lé ẹni, tí a kò bá ẹni, ìwọ̀n là ń bá ẹnií ṣọ̀tá mọ.
target: If one chases a person and does not catch up with the person, one should moderate one's hatred of the person.

input: Bí a bá ní ká bẹ́ igi, a ó bẹ̀ẹ́ èèyàn.
target: If one attempts to cut a tree, one will cut people.

input: Bí a bá ní ká jẹ èkuru kó tán, a kì í gbọn ọwọ́ọ rẹ̀ sáwo.
target: If one wishes to clean one's plate of dry bean grits, one does not keep scraping the remnants from one's fingers onto the plate.

input: Bí a bá ń jà, bí í kákú là ń wí
target: Even though we are quarrelling, should we wish each other dead

input: Bí a bá ń retí òfò, ká fi ohun tọrẹ.
target: If one expects a loss, one should make a gift of what one has.

input: Bí a bá perí ajá, ká perí ìkòkò tí a ó fi sè é.
target: If one talks of the dog, one should also talk of the pot one will use to cook it.

input: Bí a bá róbìnrin à lérí ogun bí a bá róbìnrin à sọ̀rọ̀ ìjà bí a dé ojú ogun à ba búbú.
target: When one sees women one boasts of war when one sees women one talks of battle when one gets to battle, one lies low.

input: Bí a bá sọ́ pé ẹyẹ ni yó jẹ ojú ẹni, bí a rí tí-ń-tín, a ó máa sá lọ.
target: If one has been told that a bird will eat one's eyes, when one sees the tiniest of birds, one takes to one's heels.

input: Bí a bá sọ̀kò sí àárín ọjà, ará ilé ẹni ní ń bà.
target: If one throws a stone into the market place, it hits someone from one's household.

input: Bí a bá sọ̀rọ̀ fún olófòófó, ajádìí agbọ̀n la sọ ọ́ sí.
target: Whatever one says to a talebearer one says to a basket that has lost its bottom.

input: Bí a bá ṣí ìdí ẹni sókè, ọmọ aráyé á rọ omi gbígbóná sí i.
target: If one exposes one's anus to view, people will fill it with hot water.

input: Bí a bá wí a dàbí òwe bí a ò bá wí a dàbí ìjà.
target: If one speaks it sounds as though one was speaking in proverbs if one does not speak it seems as though one was picking a fight.

input: Bí a kò bá láyàa rìndọ̀rìndọ̀, a kì í jẹ aáyán.
target: If one's stomach is not immune to nausea, one does not eat roaches.

input: Bí a kò bá lè kú, ìpẹ̀ là ń gbà.
target: If one is unable or unwilling to die, one accepts consolation.

input: Bí a kò bá lè mú ọkọ, a kì í na obìnrin-in rẹ.
target: If one is no match for the husband, one does not hit the wife.

input: Bí a kò bá lówó aládìn-ín, à jẹun lójúmọmọ, à gbálẹ̀ sùn wàrà.
target: If one has no money for lamp oil, one eats in the daytime, and one sweeps the house and goes to sleep in good time.

input: Bí a kò bá ní èsè ẹ̀fà, a kì í kó iṣu òje.
target: If one does not have twelve hundred cowries in savings, one does not purchase yams worth fourteen hundred cowries.

input: Bí a kò bá rí wọlé-wọ̀de a ò gbọdọ̀ wọlé ọba.
target: If one cannot find the official gate keeper one dares not enter the king's palace.

input: Bí a kò bá ṣe fún ilẹ̀, a kì í fi ọwọ́ sọ ọ́.
target: If one has done nothing for Earth, one does not swear by it.

input: Bí a kò rówó ra ẹrú, à sọ adìẹ ẹni lórúkọ.
target: If one has no money to buy a slave, one gives one's chicken a name.

input: Bí a ó ti ṣe é ní ń fi araa rẹ̀ hàn.
target: How it will be accomplished will reveal itself.

input: Bí adìẹ́ bá gbélẹ̀ a ya òpìpì.
target: If a chicken always keeps to the ground, it becomes flightless.

input: Bí àjànàkú ò bá gbẹ́kẹ̀lé fùrọ̀, kì í mi òdù àgbọn.
target: If an elephant is not sure of its anus, it does not swallow whole coconuts.

input: Bí àjẹ́ bá mupo, ojúu rẹ̀ a rọ̀.
target: When a witch has drunk oil, she calms down.

input: Bí alágbáraá bá jẹ ọ́ níyà, fẹ̀rín sí i.
target: If a powerful person mistreats you, burst into laughter.

input: Bí alágẹmọọ́ bá fẹ́ kọjá, ìjàm̀pere ò níí jà.
target: When the chameleon wishes to go by, the black ants refrain from stinging.

input: Bí alẹ́ bá lẹ́, adẹ́tẹ̀ a rìn, a yan.
target: When night falls, the leper walks and struts.

input: Bí àṣá bá ń bínú, sùúrù ló yẹ ọlọ́jà.
target: If the kite is displaying anger, the best response for the trader is patience.

input: Bí aáṣẹ́ bá ti ń fò, bẹ́ẹ̀ la ti ń sọ̀kò sí i.
target: It is according to the flight pattern of the standardwinged nightjar that one throws stones at it.

input: Bí awó ti ń lù lawó ti ń jó.
target: As the initiate of mysteries drums, so the initiate of mysteries dances.

input: Bí bàtá bá ró àrójù, yíya ní ń ya.
target: If the bàtá drum sounds too loudly, it tears.

input: Bí ekòló bá kọ ebè, araa rẹ̀ ni yó gbìn sí i.
target: If a worm makes a heap, it is itself that it will plant in it.

input: Bí èṣù ikú bá ń ṣe ìgbín nìgbín ń yẹ́yin.
target: It is when the snail wants to invite death that it lays eggs.

input: Bí ẹjá bá sùn, ẹja á fi ẹja jẹ.
target: If fish sleeps, fish will devour fish.

input: Bí ẹlẹ́yìnkùlé ò sùn, à pẹ́ lẹ́yìnkùlée rẹ̀ títí bó pẹ́ títí orun a gbé onílé lọ.
target: If the owner of the backyard does not sleep, one stays in the backyard for a long time, sooner or later the owner of the house will fall asleep.

input: Bí ẹlẹ́jọ́ bá mọ ẹjọ́ọ rẹ̀ lẹ́bi, kì í pẹ́ níkùnúnlẹ̀.
target: If the person involved in a case acknowledges his or her guilt, he or she does not last long on his or her knees.

input: Bí ẹnìkán bá fojú di Orò, Orò a gbé e.
target: If anyone defies the Orò mystery, it does away with him or her.

input: Bí ẹnìkán ṣe ohun tí ẹnìkan ò ṣe rí, ojúu rẹ̀ á rí ohun tí ẹnìkan ò rí rí.
target: If a person does what no one has ever done before, his eyes will see what no one has ever seen before.

input: Bí ìdí ìkokò kò bá dá a lójú, kì í gbé egungun mì.
target: If the wolf does not have faith in its anus it does not swallow bones.

input: Bí ìfà bí ìfà lọmọdé fi ń dáràn wọlé.
target: As though he were stumbling on treasures, thus a youth brings trouble into the household.

input: Bí ilé bá dá, adẹ́tẹ̀ a rìn, a yan.
target: When the house is deserted, the leper will walk and strut.

input: Bí ìlùú bá dún àdúnjù, yó fàya.
target: If a drum makes too much noise, it breaks.

input: Bí iná bá jóni, tó jó ọmọ ẹni, tara ẹni là ń kọ́ gbọ̀n.
target: If one is on fire and one's child is on fire, one douses one's fire first.

input: Bí iṣu ẹní bá funfun, à fọwọ́ bò ó jẹ.
target: If one's yam is white, one eats it furtively.

input: Bí kò bá sí oníṣẹ́ iṣẹ́ ò leè lọ bí kò bá sí ọlọ́wẹ̀ a kì í ṣọ̀wẹ̀ àkẹ̀yìnsí ọlọ́wẹ̀ là ń ṣípá.
target: If the owner of the job is absent the job does not progress if the person who engaged the help is absent no help is given when the back of the person who engaged help is turned, one lifts one's hands from the job.

input: Bí o máa ra ilá ra ilá, bí o máa gba ènì gba ènì ọmọdé kì í wá sọ́ja Agbó-mẹ́kùn kó wá mú eku.
target: If you wish to buy okro, buy okro if you wish to receive a gratuity do so a child does not come to a tiger hunt and catch rats.

input: Bí obìnrín bá wọgbó orò, a ò lè rí àbọ̀ọ ẹ̀ mọ́.
target: If a woman enters the ritual grove of the orò cult no one will ever see her return.

input: Bí ògbó ẹni ò bá dánilójú, a kì í fi gbárí wò.
target: If one does not trust one's cudgel, one does not try it on one's own head.

input: Bí ojú alákẹdun ò dá igi, kì í gùn ún.
target: If the monkey is not certain about a tree, it does not climb it.

input: Bí ojú onísó ò bá sunwọ̀n, a kì í lọ̀ ọ́.
target: If the face of the person who farted is baleful, one does not make a big fuss about the fart.

input: Bí ológbòó bá pa eku, a fi ìrùu rẹ̀ dẹlé.
target: When a cat kills a mouse, it uses the tail as a sentry.

input: Bí ológbòó bá ṣẹ̀ ń pa ẹmọ́, à mọ̀ pé ó máa lọ.
target: When a cat begins to kill guinea pigs, one knows it is ready to go.

input: Bí olóweé bá mọ òwee rẹ̀, tí kò já a, ẹ̀rù ìjà ń bà á ni.
target: If the butt of a proverb recognizes it but does not acknowledge it, he is afraid of a fight.

input: Bí òní ti rí, ọ̀la ò rí bẹ́ẹ̀, ni babaláwoó fi ń dÍfá lọ́rọọrún.
target: As today is, tomorrow will not be, hence the diviner consults the oracle every five days.

input: Bí oníṣú bá fi iṣuu rẹ̀ se ẹ̀bẹ, ọgbọ́n a tán nínú a-tu-èèpo-jẹ.
target: If the owner of the yams cuts them for porridge, the person who gleans what sticks to the peelings is at a loss for what to do.

input: Bí ooré bá pọ̀ lápọ̀jù, ibi ní ń dà.
target: If goodness is excessive, it becomes evil.

input: Bí òwe ò bá jọ òwe, a kì í pa á.
target: If a proverb does not apply to a situation, one does not use it.

input: Bí ọmọ ẹní bá dára, ká sọ pé ó dára bíi ká fi ṣaya ẹni kọ́.
target: If one's daughter is beautiful, one may acknowledge that she is beautiful, but one may not make her one's wife.

input: Bí ọmọdé bá dárí sọ apá, apá á pá bó bá dárí sọ ìrókò, ìrókò a kò ó lọ́nà.
target: If a child strikes his head against the mahogany bean tree the tree will kill him if he strikes his head against the ìrókò tree, the tree will accost him on his way.

input: Bí ọmọdé ò rí àjẹkùu kìnìún nínú igbo, a ní kí ẹran bí ẹkùn ó pa òun.
target: If a child has not seen the leavings of a lion in the forest he prays that he might be killed by an animal like the leopard.

input: Bí ọ̀nàá dé orí àpáta, níṣe ní ń pin.
target: When a trail comes to a rock, it ends.

input: Bí ọ̀ràn-án bá ṣú òkùnkùn, à bẹ̀ ẹ́ wò lábẹ́.
target: If a matter is dark, one peeps at it under cover.

input: Bí ọ̀ràn ò tán, ibì kan là ń gbé arékété lohun ń ṣe.
target: If a problem is not over, one stays in place it is the over-eager person who comes to grief.

input: Bí ọtí bá kún inú, ọtí á pọmọ bí oòrùn-ún bá pọ̀ lápọ̀jù a sọ ọmọ di wèrè bí a bá lọ́ba lánìíjù a sínni níwín tẹ̀tẹ̀ ẹ̀gún pọ̀ lódò o di olú eri.
target: If wine fills the stomach it intoxicates a child if there is too much sun it makes a child go insane if one has too much authority one goes mad spinach grew in too great abundance by the stream and became ordinary weed.

input: Bí ọwọ́ ò bá tẹ èkù idà, a kì í bèrè ikú tó pa baba ẹni.
target: If one has not laid one's hand on the hilt of the sword, one does not ask what death killed one's father.

input: Bíbi là ń bi odò wò ká tó wọ̀ ọ́.
target: One asks a river before one enters it.

input: Bọ̀rọ̀kìnní àṣejù, oko olówó ni ń múni lọ.
target: Excessive devotion to fashion leads one to pawn oneself.

input: Bọ̀rọ̀kìnnín lọ̀tá ìlú afínjú lọba ń pa.
target: The dandy is the enemy of the town it is the finicky person that the king kills.

input: Dàda ò leè jà, ṣùgbọ́n ó lábùúrò tó gbójú.
target: Dada cannot fight, but he has a brave younger brother.

input: Dágun-dágun Kaletu tí ń dá ìbejì lápá.
target: Troublemaker of Kaletu, who breaks the arms of a twin.

input: Dá-mìíràn-kún-mìíràn tí ń pa àpatà ẹyẹlé.
target: One-who-commits-crimes-atop-he butchers pigeons for sale.

input: Dàńdógó kọjá ẹ̀wù àbínúdá bí a bá ko ẹni tó juni lọ, a yàgò fún un.
target: Dàńdógó is not something to make in a huff if one meets a person who is too much for one, one makes way.

input: Dá-nǹkan-dá-nǹkan, tí kì í dáṣọ̀, tí kì í dẹ́wù.
target: Originator-of-he not make a cloth and does not make a dress.

input: Èké tanni síjà ẹkùn, ó fi ọrán ṣíṣẹ́ sápó ẹni.
target: The devious person goads one to confront a leopard and fills one's quiver with broken arrows.

input: Eku tí yó pa ológìnní ò níí dúró láyé.
target: The mouse that attempts to kill a cat will not live long on this earth.

input: Eku ò gbọdọ̀ ná ọjà tí ológìnní dá.
target: A mouse dares not visit a market established by a cat.

input: Èmi ló lòní, èmi ló lọ̀la lọmọdé fi ń dígbèsè.
target: Today belongs to me tomorrow belongs to me is the attitude that pushes a youth into debt.

input: Èmi ò wá ikún inú agbè fi jiyán ṣùgbọ́n bíkún bá yí sínú agbè mi mo lè fi jiyán.
target: I will not go looking for a squirrel in my gourd to eat with pounded yam but if a squirrel falls into my gourd I will eat it with pounded yam.

input: Èpèé pọ̀ ju ohun tó nù lọ abẹ́rẹ́ sọnù a gbé ṣẹ́ẹ́rẹ́ síta.
target: The curse is out of all proportion to the lost article a needle is lost the owner brings out hisher magic wand.

input: Èpèé pọ̀ ju ohun tó nù abẹ́rẹ́ sọnù wọ́n lọ gbé Ṣàǹgó.
target: The cursing is far in excess of what is lost a needle goes missing and the owners invoke Ṣàngó.

input: Erée kí lajá ń bá ẹkùn ṣe
target: What sort of sport is it that the dog is engaged in with the leopard

input: Èrò kì í jẹ́wọ́ọ Mo tà tán.
target: The trader never confesses, I sold all my wares.

input: Eṣinṣin ò mọkú jíjẹ ni tirẹ̀.
target: The fly does not heed death all its cares to do is eat.

input: Èṣù ò ṣejò ẹni tó tẹ ejò mọ́lẹ̀ lẹ̀bá ń bá.
target: There is no disaster stalking the snake it is whoever steps on a snake that is in trouble.

input: Etí mẹta ò yẹ orí èèyàn mẹ́ta ò dúró ní méjì-méjì.
target: Three ears are unbecoming for the head three people cannot stand in twos.

input: Ewú logbó irùngbọ̀n làgbà máamú làfojúdi.
target: Grey hair shows age a beard shows maturity a moustache shows impudence.

input: Ewúrẹ́ jẹ ó relé àgùntán jẹ ó relé à-jẹ-ì-wálé ló ba ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ jẹ́.
target: The goat forages and returns home the sheep forages and returns home the pig's flaw is its habit of not returning home after foraging.

input: Ewúrẹ́ kì í wọlé tọ ìkokò.
target: A goat does not venture into the lair of a wolf.

input: Èèyan má-jẹ̀ẹ́-kí-èèyàn-kú ń bẹ níbòmíràn bó-le-kú-ó-kú ń bẹ nílée wa.
target: Save-the-person-from-death type of people abounds elsewhere let-the-person-die-if-heshe-wishes type abounds in our house.

input: Èèyàn-án ní òun ó bà ọ́ jẹ́ o ní kò tó bẹ́ẹ̀ bí ó bá ní o ò nùdí, ẹni mélòó lo máa fẹ fùrọ̀ hàn
target: A person vows to disgrace you and you respond that there is no way he can succeed if he spreads the word that you did not clean yourself after defecating, to how many people will you display your anus

input: Èyí ayé ń ṣe n kà ṣàì ṣe bádìẹẹ́ máa wọ ọ̀ọ̀dẹ̀ a bẹ̀rẹ̀.
target: Whatever the rest of the world does I will not forswear when a chicken wants to enter the porch it stoops.

input: Èyí ò tófò, èyí ò tófò fìlà ìmàleé kù pẹ́tẹ́kí.
target: This is no great loss this is no great loss the muslim's cap dwindles to almost nothing.

input: Ẹ pa Ayéjẹ́nkú, ẹ pa Ìyálóde Aníwúrà ìgbà tí ẹ pa Ìyápọ̀ ẹ gbàgbé ogun.
target: You killed Ayejenku and killed Iyalode Aniwura but when you killed Iyapọ you forgot about wars.

input: Ẹ̀bi alábahun kì í gbèé dẹ̀bi ànaa rẹ̀.
target: The Tortoise's guilt is not long in becoming that of his parent-in-law's.

input: Ẹ̀bìtì ò peèrà tó ṣe pẹ̀lẹ́pẹ̀lẹ́ ẹnu ẹni ní ń pani.
target: A trap does not kill an ant that is cautious it's one's mouth that turns out to be one's death.

input: Ẹ̀bìtì tí ò kún ẹmọ́ lójú, òun ní ń yí i lẹ́pọ̀n sẹ́yìn.
target: It is a trap that the giant rat disdains that wrenches its testicles backwards.

input: Ẹ̀gbá mọ̀dí Ọbà ẹni tó gbéniṣánlẹ̀ẹ́ lè pani.
target: The Ẹgba know the secrets of Ọba town whoever throws a person has the ability to kill the person.

input: Ẹgbẹ́ ẹja lẹja ń wẹ̀ tọ̀ ẹgbẹ́ ẹyẹ lẹyẹ ń wọ́ lé.
target: Fish swim in a school of their own kind birds fly in a flock of their own kind.

input: Ẹ̀yìn àjànàkú là ń yọ ogbó ta ní jẹ́ yọ agada lójú erin
target: It is after the demise of the elephant that one brandishes a cudgel who dares draw a scimitar in the face of an elephant

input: Ẹ̀hìn ní ńdun ol-ókùú-àdá sí.
target: It is the back of the man with a blunt cutlass that suffers.

input: Ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo lọmọ ń sín tí à ń ní à-sín-gbó, à-sín-tọ́.
target: It is when a child sneezes only once that one wishes the child sneeze and grow old, sneeze and live long.

input: Ẹ̀kọ tí kò bá léwé làgbà ń gbà.
target: It is corn-loaf that has no leaf wrapping that the elder takes.

input: Ẹkùn kì í yan kí ajá yan.
target: A leopard does not strut and be answered by strutting from a dog.

input: Ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ tó kú légbodò ló ní ká fòun jẹyán.
target: It is a pig that dies at the time of the harvesting of new yams that asks to be eaten with pounded yam.

input: Ẹlẹ́jọ́ kú sílé, aláròyé kú síta gbangba.
target: The person involved in an affair dies at home the spokesperson dies out in the open.

input: Ẹlẹ́kún sunkún ó bá tirẹ̀ lọ aláròpa ìbá sunkún kò dákẹ́.
target: The person with a cause to cry cries and departs if it were a person whose mind never leaves a problem he or she would never have stopped crying.

input: Ẹlẹ́rù ní ńgbé ẹrù ká tó ba ké ọfẹ.
target: The owner of the load must first lift it before one lends one's encouragement.

input: Ẹ̀lúlùú, ìwọ ló fòjò pa araà rẹ.
target: Larkheeled Cuckoo, it was you that got yourself drenched in the rain.

input: Ẹni àjò ò pé kó múra ilé.
target: The person for whom the journey has not been profitable should prepare to return home.

input: Ẹní bá rọra pa eèrà á rí ìfun inúu rẹ̀.
target: Whoever takes great care in killing an ant will see its innards.

input: Ẹní bá fẹ́ abuké ni yó ru ọmọọ rẹ̀ dàgbà.
target: Whoever marries a humpbacked woman will carry her child on his back until the child is weaned.

input: Ẹní bá fẹ́ arúgbó gbẹ̀yìn ni yó sìnkúu rẹ̀.
target: The last spouse of an old person will bury him or her.

input: Ẹní bá mọ ayéé jẹ kì í gun àgbọn.
target: Whoever knows what makes for a good life never climbs coconut palms.

input: Ẹní bá mọ ayéé jẹ kì í jà.
target: Whoever knows how to enjoy life does not enter into a fight.

input: Ẹní bá mọ iṣin-ín jẹ a mọ ikú ojúu rẹ̀ẹ́ yọ.
target: Whoever knows how to eat Akee Apple must know how to remove its deadly raphe.

input: Ẹní bá na Ọ̀yẹ̀kú á ríjà Ogbè.
target: Whoever whips Ọ̀yẹ̀kú will have Ogbè to answer to.

input: Ẹní bá sọ púpọ̀ á ṣìsọ.
target: Whoever talks a lot will misspeak.

input: Ẹní bá pé kí àkàlà má jòkú, ojúu rẹ̀ lẹyẹ ń kọ́kọ́ yọ jẹ.
target: Whoever says the ground-hornbill should not eat carrion, he or she will be the first to lose his or her eyes to the bird.

input: Ẹní bẹnií tẹ́ni.
target: Whoever pleads with one makes one lose face.

input: Ẹní dáríjiní ṣẹ̀tẹ́ ẹjọ́.
target: Whoever forgives one defuses the dispute.

input: Ẹní dúró de erín dúró dekú ẹní dúró dẹfọ̀n-ọ́n dúró dèjà ẹní dúró de eégún alágangan, ọ̀run ló fẹ́ẹ́ lọ.
target: Whoever waits in a charging elephant's path waits for death whoever waits in a buffalo's path waits for an attack whoever tarries before a fleet-footed masquerader hankers for a trip to heaven.

input: Ẹní fi ìpọ́njú kọ ẹyìn á kọ àbọ̀n ẹní fi ìpọ́njú rojọ́ á jẹ̀bi ọba ẹní fi ìpọ́njú lọ gbẹ́ ìhò á gbẹ́ ihò awọ́nrínwọ́n.
target: Whoever gathers palm fruits in desperation will gather unripe ones whoever states his or her case in desperation will be adjudged at fault by the king whoever digs a hole in desperation will dig out an iguana lizard.

input: Ẹní gúnyán kalẹ̀ yóò júbà ọbẹ̀.
target: A person who has made pounded yams must pay homage to the stew.

input: Ẹní gbé adíẹ òtòṣì-í gbé ti aláròyé.
target: Whoever steals a poor person's chicken steals from an incessant complainer.

input: Ẹní kánjú jayé á kánjú lọ sọ́run.
target: Whoever is in a hurry to enjoy life will go to heaven in a hurry.

input: Ẹni méjì kì í bínú egbinrin.
target: Two people do not hold a grudge and refuse reconciliation.

input: Ẹni òyìnbó fẹ́ràn ní ń tì mọ́lé.
target: It is the person the white man likes that the white man incarcerates.

input: Ẹní ṣe ọ̀ràn Ìjẹ̀bú etí ẹ̀ á gbọ́ ìbọn.
target: Whoever provokes an Ijẹbu person, his or her ears will hear gunshot.

input: Ẹni tí a bá ń bá ṣiṣẹ́ kì í ṣọ̀lẹ bórí bá túnni ṣe a kì í tẹ́ bọ̀rọ̀.
target: The person being lent a hand does not malinger if Providence favors one, one is not easily disgraced.

input: Ẹni tí a bá ń mú ìyàwó bọ̀ wá fún kì í garùn.
target: The person to whom a bride is being brought does not strain his neck to see her from a distance.

input: Ẹni tí a bá ti rí kì í tún ba mọ́lẹ̀ mọ́.
target: A person who has been seen has no further need of hiding.

input: Ẹni tí a fẹ́ẹ́ sunjẹ kì í fepo para lọ jókòó sídìí iná.
target: A person being eyed for barbecuing does not baste himself with oil and sit by the fire.

input: Ẹni tí a lù lógbòó mẹ́fà, tí a ní kó fiyèdénú ìgbà tí kò fiyèdénú ń kọ́
target: A person is hit with a cudgel six times and then urged to learn forbearance what other option does he or she have

input: Ẹni tí a ò lè mú, a kì í gọ dè é.
target: One does not lie in ambush for an adversary one is no match for.

input: Ẹni tí a ò lè mú, Ọlọ́run là ń fi lé lọ́wọ́.
target: An adversary over whom one cannot prevail, one leaves to God's judgement.

input: Ẹni tí ń sáré kiri nínúu pápá ń wá ọ̀nà àti jìn sí kòtò.
target: The person who runs about in the bush courts the danger of falling into a ditch.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá wọ odò ni àyà ń kò, àyà ò fo odò.
target: It is the person who enters a river who is terrified, not the river.

input: Ẹni tí ó jìn sí kòtòó kọ́ ará ìyókù lọ́gbọ́n.
target: The person who falls into a ditch teaches others a lesson.

input: Ẹni tí ó tọ odò tí kò dẹ̀yìn yò bàá Olúwẹri pàdé.
target: Whoever follows the river without turning back will come face to face with Oluwẹri.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá mu ọtí ogójì á sọ̀rọ̀ okòó.
target: Whoever drinks forty cowries worth of wine will talk twenty cowries worth of talk.

input: Ẹni tí ó yá ẹgbàafà tí kò san án, ó bẹ́gi dí ọ̀nà egbèje.
target: The person who borrows twelve hundred cowries and does not pay them back blocks the path of fourteen hundred cowries.

input: Ẹni tí ó ba ogún-un baba rẹ̀ jẹ́, ó ja òkú ọ̀run lólè, yó sì di ẹni ìfibú.
target: Whoever ruins his or her father's bequest robs the dead, and becomes a person of reproach.

input: Ẹni tí ó mú u lórí ní ó kú, ìwọ tí o mú u lẹ́sẹ̀ẹ́ ní ó ń jòwèrè.
target: The person holding it by the head says it is dead you who are holding it by the feet say it is going through death throes.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá obìnrin kó lọ sílée rẹ̀ yó sùn nínú ẹ̀rù.
target: A man who goes with a woman to her house will sleep in fear.

input: Ẹni tí ò fẹ́ẹ́ wọ àkísà kì í bá ajá ṣe erée géle.
target: A person who does not wish to wear rags should not engage in rough play with a dog.

input: Ẹni tí ò tónií nà ò gbọdọ̀ ṣe kọ́-ń-dú síni.
target: A person who is not strong enough to beat one up should not adopt a threatening pose towards one.

input: Ẹni tí Oròó máa mú ń ba wọn ṣe àìsùn orò.
target: The person who will be the sacrificial victim of orò is joining in the revelry on the eve of the sacrifice.

input: Ẹnìkan kì í fi ọ̀bẹ tó nù jẹṣu.
target: No one eats yams with a lost knife.

input: Ẹnu ẹyẹ ní ń pẹyẹ ẹnu òrofó ní ń pòrofó òrofó bímọ mẹ́fà, ó ní ilé òun-ún kún ṣọ́ṣọ́ṣọ́.
target: The bird's mouth is its death the green fruit pigeon's mouth is its death the pigeon hatches six chicks and boasts that its house is bursting at the seams.

input: Ẹnu iná ní ń pa iná ẹnu èrò ní ń pa èrò.
target: The mouth of the louse is its death the mouth of the nit is its death.

input: Ẹnu ni àparòó fi ń pe ọ̀rá a ní Kìkì ọ̀rá, kìkì ọ̀rá
target: With its own mouth the partridge invites its own ruin it cries, Nothing but fat, nothing but fat

input: Ẹnu òfòrò ní ń pa òfòrò òfòròó bímọ méjì, ó kó wọn wá sẹ́bàá ọ̀nà, ó ní Ọmọọ̀ mí yè koro-koro.
target: The squirrel's mouth summons its death the squirrel has two children, takes them to the edge of the path, and says, My children are hale and well indeed.

input: Ẹnu tí ìgbín fi bú òrìṣà ní ń fií lọlẹ̀ lọ bá a.
target: The same mouth with which the snail insults the god is the one on which it crawls to the god.

input: Ẹnuù mi kọ́ ni wọ́n ti máa gbọ́ pé ìyá ọbaá lájẹ̀ẹ́.
target: It is not from my mouth that people will learn that the king's mother is a witch.

input: Ẹrẹ̀ òkèọ̀dàn ni yó kìlọ̀ fún a-láròó-gbálẹ̀ aṣọ.
target: The mud on the plains will teach a lesson to the person whose loincloth has a train sweeping the ground.

input: Ẹ̀rù kọ́ ní ń ba ọ̀pẹ tó ní ká dá òun sí, nítorí ẹmu ọ̀la ni.
target: It is not out of fear that the palm-tree pleads to be allowed to stand it is on account of tomorrow's palm-wine.

input: Ẹṣin iwájú ni ti ẹ̀yìn ń wò sáré.
target: The leading horse is the one by which the followers set their pace.

input: Ẹ̀sọ̀ ẹ̀sọ̀ la fi ń lá ọbẹ̀ tó gbóná.
target: Slowly, slowly is the way to eat soup that is scalding hot.

input: Ẹ̀tẹ́ ní ń gbẹ̀yìn aláṣejù.
target: Disgrace is the reward of excess.

input: Ẹyẹ kí lo máa pa tí ò ń fi àkùkọ ṣe oògùn àtè
target: What sort of bird do you hope to kill that you use a cock in the birdlime charm

input: Ẹyin lọ̀rọ̀ bó bá balẹ̀ fífọ́ ní ń fọ́.
target: Words are eggs when they drop on the floor they shatter into pieces.

input: Ẹyin adìẹ ò gbọdọ̀ forí sọ àpáta.
target: A chicken egg should not strike its head against a rock.

input: Fáàárí àṣejù, oko olówó ní ń mú ọmọ lọ.
target: Intemperate dandyism lands a youth in a creditor's farm as a pawn.

input: Fẹ̀yìntì kí o rí ìṣe èké farapamọ́ kí o gbọ́ bí aṣenií ti ń sọ.
target: Sit back and you will see how a devious person operates conceal yourself and you will hear how those who seek others' destruction speak.

input: Fi ẹ̀jẹ̀ sínú, tu itọ́ funfun jáde.
target: Keep your red blood inside and spit out clear saliva.

input: Fi ohun wé ohun, fi ọ̀ràn wé ọ̀ràn fi ọ̀ràn jì ká yìn ọ́.
target: Liken one thing to another, liken one matter to another forgive and forget and earn people's praise.

input: Fi ọ̀ràn sínú pète ẹ̀rín fi ebi sínú sunkún ayo.
target: Keep your troubles inside and laugh heartily keep your hunger hidden and pretend to weep from satiation.

input: Fò síhìnín fò sọ́hùnún làkèré fi ń ṣẹ́ nítan.
target: Jump this way, jump that way is the way a frog breaks its thigh.

input: Ganganran ò ṣéé kì mọ́lẹ̀ a-gúnni-lọ́wọ́-bíi-ṣoṣoro.
target: A sharp object is not something to grab for it is a-thing-that-pierces-one's-hand-like-a-sharp-instrument.

input: Gìdì-gìdì ò mọ́là ká ṣiṣẹ́ bí ẹrú ò da nǹkan.
target: Scurrying around does not ensure prosperity working like a slave results in nothing.

input: Gùdùgudu ò túra sílẹ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀kan.
target: Poisonous yam has never lost its skin.

input: Gùdùguduú kan légbò kán-ín-kán-ín.
target: Poisonous yam's roots are sour indeed.

input: Gbà sókè ni Gbà sọ́kọ̀ ohun tá a bá sọ síwájú là ḿbá.
target: Put this above ashore equals Put this in the boat it is what one throws ahead that one finds in one's path.

input: Gbéjò-gbéjò ò gbé ọká.
target: No snake dancer dances with a cobra.

input: Gbẹ́ran-gbẹ́ran ò gbé ẹkùn.
target: No animal pilferer ever pilfers a leopard.

input: Gbígbòòrò là ń ṣe ọ̀nà igi.
target: The path along which a log will be rolled must be made wide enough.

input: Gbogbo ajá ní ń jẹ imí èyí tó bá jẹ tiẹ̀ mẹ́nu laráyé ń pè ní dìgbòlugi.
target: All dogs eat excrement, but only those that smear their mouths with it are described as rabid.

input: Gbogbo ìjà nìjà bóo gbémi lulẹ̀ mà mọ́ ẹ lójú lákọ lákọ.
target: Every way of fighting is a legitimate way of fighting.If you are strong enough to throw me, I will fight back by looking at you with absolute disdain.

input: Gbogbo obìnrin ló ń gbéṣẹ́, èyí tó bá ṣe tiẹ̀ láṣejù laráyé ń pè láṣẹ́wó.
target: All women are unfaithful only those who know no moderation are put down as whores.

input: Gbólóhùn kan Agán tó awoó ṣe.
target: Just one utterance by the masquerader Agán is sufficient to effect a great deal of wonders.

input: Gbólóhùn kan-án ba ọ̀rọ̀ jẹ́ gbólóhùn kan-án tún ọ̀rọ̀ ṣe.
target: One solitary statement muddies an entire affair one solitary statement clears all the confusion.

input: Gbólóhùn kan la bi elépo elépo ń ṣe ìrànrán.
target: One asks only one question of the palm-oil seller, but she rambles endlessly on.

input: Ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ òṣì bí ọmọ ọlọ́rọ̀ là ń rí.
target: At the beginning of one's penury one seems like the child of most prosperous parents.

input: Ibi ìṣáná la ti ńkíyè sóògùn.
target: It is from the time one makes one's boasts that one should begin to mind one's charms or juju.

input: Ibi rere làkàsọ̀ńgbé sọlẹ̀.
target: The ladder always rests on a propitious spot.

input: Ibi tí a gbọ́n mọ là ń ṣòwò-o màlúù mọ.
target: One should limit the depth of one's involvement in cattle trading to the extent of one's astuteness.

input: Ibi tí a ti ń wo olókùnrùn lati ń wo ara ẹni.
target: Just as one cares for the sick, one should also care for oneself.

input: Ibi tí à ńlọ là ńwò, a kì í wo ibi tí a ti ṣubú.
target: One should keep one's eyes on where one is going, not where one stumbled.

input: Ibi tí akátá ba sí, adìẹ ò gbọdọ̀ débẹ̀.
target: Wherever the jackal lurks, the chicken must give the place a wide berth.

input: Ibi tí inú ń bí asẹ́ tó, inú ò gbọdọ̀ bí ìkòkò débẹ̀ bínú bá bí ìkòkò débẹ̀, ẹlẹ́kọ ò níí rí dá.
target: The cooking pot must never harbor a grudge to the same extent that the sieve does if the pot does so, the corn-meal trader will have nothing to sell.

input: Ibi tí ó mọ là ń pè lọ́mọ.
target: Where it stops, there one designates child.

input: Ìbínú baba òṣì.
target: Anger is the father of hopelessness.

input: Ìbínú lọbá fi ń yọ idà ìtìjù ló fi ń bẹ́ ẹ.
target: It is in anger that the king draws his sword it is shame that makes him go through with the beheading.

input: Ìbínú ò da nǹkan sùúrù baba ìwà àgbà tó ní sùúrù ohun gbogbo ló ní.
target: Anger accomplishes nothing forebearance is the father of character traits an elder who has forebearance has everything.

input: Ìbínú ò mọ̀ pé olúwa òun ò lẹ́sẹ̀ ńlẹ̀
target: Anger does not know that its owner has no legs to stand on.

input: Ìbìsẹ́yín àgbò kì í ṣojo.
target: A ram's stepping backwards is not indicative of cowardice.

input: Ìbọn-ọ́n ní apátí kò lápátí, taní jẹ́ jẹ́ ka kọjú ìbọn kọ òun
target: Whether a gun has a trigger or not, who would calmly permit the gun to be pointed at himher

input: Ìfẹ́ àfẹ́jù lewúrẹ́ fi ń bá ọkoọ ẹ̀ hu irùngbọ̀n.
target: It is excessive love that induces the goat to grow a beard in sympathy with her mate.

input: Ìfi ohun wé ohun, ìfi ọ̀ràn wé ọ̀ràn, kò jẹ́ kí ọ̀ràn ó tán.
target: Citing comparable things and recalling similar occurrences in the past makes ending a quarrel impossible.

input: Ìfunra loògùn àgbà.
target: Wariness is the elders' most efficacious juju.

input: Igi ganganran má gùnún mi lójú, òkèèrè la ti ń wò ó wá.
target: Protruding twig, do not poke me in the eye one must keep one's eyes on the twig from a distance.

input: Igi tó bá bá Ṣàngó lérí, gbígbẹ ní ń gbẹ.
target: Whatever tree engages in a contest of threats with Ṣàngó will suffer the fate of drying up.

input: Igúnnugún gbọ́n sínú.
target: The vulture conceals a lot of wisdom in itself.

input: Ìgbà ara ń bẹ lára là ń bù ú tà.
target: It is when there is a surfeit of flesh on the body that one cuts some of it for sale.

input: Igbá dojúdé ò jọ ti òṣónú, tinú igbá nigbá ń ṣe.
target: That a calabash faces downwards is no antisocial sign the calabash is only acting according to its nature.

input: Ìgbà tí a bá ní kí Ègùn má jà ní ń yọ̀bẹ.
target: It is only when one pleads with the Ègùn person from Porto Novo or Àjàṣẹ́ in present-day Benin Republicthat he draws his knife.

input: Ìgbà tí a bá perí àparò ní ń jáko.
target: Just as the talk turns to the partridge it shows up to raid the farm

input: Igbá tó fọ́ ní ń gba kasẹ létí ìkòkò tó fọ́ ní ń gba okùn lọ́rùn.
target: It is the broken calabash that has iron staples driven into its edges it is the cracked pot that has its neck tied with a rope.

input: Ìgbín ń ràjò ó filée ẹ̀ ṣẹrù.
target: The snail sets out on a journey and makes a load of its house.

input: Ìgbín tó ń jẹ̀ ní màfọ̀n, tí ò kúrò ní màfọ̀n, ewé àfọ̀n ni wọn ó fi dì í dele.
target: A snail that forages at the base of the African breadfruit tree and never leaves the base of the African breadfruit tree will be taken home wrapped in the leaf of the African breadfruit tree.

input: Ìgbẹ̀yìn ní ń yé olókùúàdá.
target: It is only at the end that the person with a blunt cutlass realizes his error.

input: Ìhàlẹ̀-ẹ́ ba ọ̀ṣọ́ èèyàn jẹ́.
target: Empty boasts ruin a person's reputation.

input: Ìjẹǹjẹ àná dùn méhoro ehoroó rebi ìjẹ àná kò dẹ̀yìn bọ̀.
target: Yesterday's food find so delighted the hare the hare went to the spot of yesterday's feeding and never returned.

input: Ìjímèrè tó lóun ò níí sá fájá, ojú ajá ni òì tíì to.
target: The brown monkey vows it will not run from a dog, only because the dog has not caught a glimpse of it.

input: Ijó àjójù ní ń mú kí okóo eégún yọ jáde.
target: Unrestrained dancing is what causes the masquerader's penis to become exposed.

input: Ìkánjú òun pẹ̀lẹ́, ọgbọọgba.
target: Haste and patience end up the same.

input: Ìkekere ń fọ̀rọ̀ ikú ṣẹ̀rín.
target: Ikekere type of fish is treating a deadly thing as something to laugh about.

input: Ìkó-eruku èèwọ̀ Ifẹ̀ ajá kì í gbó níbòji ẹkùn.
target: Carrying dust is taboo in Ifẹ́ no dog dares bark in the shadow of the leopard.

input: Ìkòkò ń seṣu ẹnìkan ò gbọ́ iṣú dénú odó ariwó ta.
target: Yams cook in a pot and nobody knows, but when the yams get into the mortar alarms sound.

input: Ìkókó ọmọ tó tọwọ́ bọ eérú ni yó mọ bó gbóná.
target: The newborn child who thrusts hisher hand into ashes will find out for himselfherself if it is hot.

input: Ikú ń dẹ Dẹ̀dẹ̀, Dẹ̀dẹ̀ ń dẹ ikú.
target: Death stalks Dẹdẹ, and Dẹdẹ stalks death.

input: Ikún ń jọ̀gẹ̀dẹ̀ ikún ń rèdí ikún ò mọ̀ pé ohun tó dùn ní ń pani.
target: The squirrel is eating a banana and the squirrel is wagging its tail the squirrel does not know that it is what is sweet that kills.

input: Ìlara àlàjù ní ń múni gbàjẹ́, ní ń múni ṣẹ́ṣó.
target: Excessive envy of others causes one to take on witching, and makes one become a wizard.

input: Ilé nÌjèṣàá ti ń múná lọ sóko.
target: It is from the home that the Ìjèṣà person takes fire to the farm.

input: Iná kì í wọ odò kó rójú ṣayé.
target: Fire does not enter into a stream and yet have the opportunity to live.

input: Iná ò ṣéé bò máṣọ.
target: Fire is not something one conceals under one's clothing.

input: Ìnàkí kì í ránṣẹ́ ìjà sẹ́kùn.
target: The baboon does not send an ultimatum to the leopard.

input: Inú ẹni lorúkọ tí a ó sọ ọmọ ẹni ń gbé.
target: It is inside oneself that the name one will name one's child resides.

input: Inúure àníjù, ìfura atèébú ní ń mù wá báni.
target: Too much good will towards others engenders suspicion and attracts insults.

input: Ìpàkọ́ ò gbọ́ ṣùtì, ìpẹ̀yìndà ò mọ yẹ̀gẹ̀ yíyẹ̀.
target: The occiput does not recognize contempt a turned back does not see a disdainful gesture.

input: Ìpàkọ́ là ń dà sẹ́yìn ká tó da yangan sẹ́nu.
target: One throws back the head first before throwing corn into the mouth.

input: Ìṣẹ́ kì í pani ayọ̀ ní ń pani.
target: Misfortune does not kill it is indulgent happiness that kills.

input: Ìtọ́jú ló yẹ abẹ́rẹ́.
target: Safe keeping is what is appropriate for a needle.

input: Ìtọsẹ̀ ló nìlú.
target: Close investigation keeps the affairs of the town in order.

input: Ìwà òní, ẹjọ́ ọ̀la.
target: Today's behavior causes tomorrow's problem.

input: Ìyá là bá bú bí a bú baba ìjà ní ń dà.
target: One would be wiser to insult another person's mother if one insults the father a fight would certainly ensue.

input: Ìyàn-án mú, ìrẹ́ yó ìyàn-án rọ̀, ìrẹ́ rù.
target: A famine rages and the grasshopper grows fat the famine subsides and the grasshopper grows lean.

input: Ìyàwó la bá sùn ọkọ ló lóyún.
target: The wife was the one made love to, but it is the husband who got pregnant.

input: Ìyàwó ò fọhùn, ó fọ́jú.
target: The bride does not speak, and she is also blind.

input: Ìyẹ̀wù kan ṣoṣo ò lè gba olókùnrùn méjì.
target: One single room will not do for two invalids.

input: Bí ebí bá ń pa ọ̀lẹ, à jẹ́ kó kú.
target: If a lazy person is suffering from hunger, heshe should be left to die.

input: Bí ẹkẹ́ẹ tálákà ò tó lówùúrọ̀, á tó lálẹ́.
target: If a poor person's forked stake is not long enough in the morning, it will be long enough at night.

input: Bí ẹnìkan ò kíni Kú-ù-jokòó, kíkí Ọlọ́run-ún ju ti igba èèyàn lọ.
target: If a person does not extend greetings to one, God's greetings are worth more than two hundred peoples'.

input: Bí ẹrú yó bàá jẹ ìfun, ibi ẹ̀dọ̀ níí tí ń bẹ̀rẹ̀.
target: A slave that would eat intestines must begin with the liver.

input: Bí ẹ̀yá bá dẹkùn, ẹran ní ńpajẹ.
target: When the cub becomes a grown leopard, it kills animals for food.

input: Bí ìbí bá tẹ̀, bí ìbí bá wọ́, oníkálukú a máa ṣe baba nílé araa rẹ̀.
target: If the pedigree is bent, if the pedigree is crooked, each person will play the father in his own home.

input: Bí ilẹ̀ẹ́ bá mọ́, ojú orun lọ̀lẹ ń wà.
target: When day breaks the lazy person will still be asleep.

input: Bí iná kò bá tán láṣọ, ẹ̀jẹ̀ kì í tán léèékánná.
target: If lice are not completely gone from one's clothings, one's nails will not be free of blood.

input: Bí ìṣẹ́ bá ń ṣẹ́ ọ̀dọ́ láṣẹ̀ẹ́jù, kó lọ sígbó erin bó bá pa erin ìṣẹ́ẹ rẹ̀ a tán bí erín bá pá a, ìṣẹ́ẹ rẹ̀ a tán.
target: If a youth is in the grips of excessive privations, he should go after an elephant if he kills an elephant his privations will be over if an elephant kills him, his privations will be over.

input: Bí iwájú ò bá ṣeé lọ sí, ẹ̀yìn a ṣeé padà sí.
target: If one cannot go forward, one will be able to retreat.

input: Bí màlúù tó màlúù, ọ̀pá kan ni Fúlàní fi ń dà wọ́n.
target: However numerous the cattle might be, it is with only one staff that the Fulbe man herds them.

input: Bí mo lè kú ma kú lọmọkùrín fi ń lágbárá N ò lè wáá kú lọmọkùnrín fi ń lẹ.
target: If I must die let me die is what makes a man strong I simply will not court death is what makes a man lazy or cowardly.

input: Bí ó pẹ́ títí, akólòlò á pe baba.
target: However long it may take, the stammarer will eventually say, Father.

input: Bí ó pẹ́ títí, àlejò á di onílé.
target: In time, a sojourner becomes a native.

input: Bí ó ti wuni là ń ṣe ìmàle ẹni bó wu Lèmó̩mù a fẹlẹ́dẹ̀ jẹ sààrì.
target: One practices one's Islam as one pleases if the Imam wishes he may break his fast with pork.

input: Bí Ògún ẹní bá dánilójú, à fi gbárí.
target: If one is sure of one's Ògún cult object, one taps ones head with it.

input: Bí ojú kò pọ́nni bí osùn, a kì í he ohun pupa bí idẹ.
target: If one's eyes do not become as red as camwood stain, one does not come by something as red as brass.

input: Bí ojú owó ẹni ò yóni, ènì ò lè yóni.
target: If what one bought for one's money does not fill one, the little extra thrown into the bargain will not.

input: Bí ojúmọ́ mọ́ lékèélékèé a yalé ẹlẹ́fun, agbe a yalé aláró, àlùkò a yalé olósùn.
target: When day dawns the cattle egret makes for the home of the dealer in chalk, the blue touraco heads for the home of the indigo dealer, the purple àlúkò bird seeks out the dealer in camwood resin.

input: Bí ọwọ́ kò sin ilẹ̀, tí kò sin ẹnu, ayo ní ń jẹ́.
target: If the hand does not cease going down and going to the mouth, satiation results.

input: Bí Ṣàǹgó bá ńpa àràbà, tó ń pa ìrókò, bíi tigi ńlá kọ́.
target: Even though Ṣango kills the silk-cotton tree and kills the ìrókò tree, no such fate can befall the huge tree.

input: Dàńdógó kì í ṣe ẹ̀wù ọmọdé.
target: Dàńdógò is not a garment for the young.

input: Dídán là ń dán ọ̀ràn wò bí olówó ẹní kú, à lọ ṣúpó.
target: One should give everything a try if one's owner dies one goes to claim his wife.

input: Dídán lẹyẹlé ń dán kú.
target: A perpetually shining appearance is what chracterizes the pigeon even until death.

input: Díẹ̀-díẹ̀ leku ń jawọ.
target: It is bit by bit that rats eat leather.

input: Díẹ̀-díẹ̀ lẹyẹ ń mu ọsàn.
target: It is bit by bit that a bird eats an orange.

input: Díẹ̀-díẹ̀ ní ń tánṣẹ́.
target: Gradual efforts complete a task.

input: Dùndún fọ̀ràn gbogbo ṣàpamọ́ra.
target: The talking drum endures all matters without complaint.

input: Ebè kan ṣoṣo àkùrọ́ kúrò ní Mo fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ ṣíwọ́.
target: A single heap on the farm does not warrant I am just about done.

input: Ebi ni yó kọ̀ọ́ wèrè lọ́gbọ́n.
target: It is hunger that will force sense into the imbecile.

input: Ebí ń pa ejò, ahún ń yan.
target: The snake is hungry, and the tortoise saunters by.

input: Ebi ò jẹ́ ká pa ọwọ́ mọ́ ebí ṣenú papala.
target: Hunger keeps one from folding one's hands hunger causes the mouth or cheeks to shrink.

input: Èébú kì í so.
target: Insults do not attach to one's body like pods.

input: Èdì kì í mú ọjọ́ kó má là.
target: No charm can act upon the day and keep it from dawning.

input: Eégún tí ń jẹ orí ẹṣin, orí àgbò ò lè kò ó láyà.
target: The masquerader who is accustomed to eating horse heads will not be daunted by ram heads.

input: Èkó ilá gba ara ẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ ọ̀bẹ.
target: Okro that has gone fibrous has delivered itself from the knife.

input: Èminrin ń jẹni, kò tó ìyà.
target: Being bothered by sandflies is no misfortune.

input: Èpè ìbínú ò pa odì.
target: An angry curse does not kill an enemy.

input: Èpè ìlasa kì í ja àgbọ̀nrín.
target: The curses of okro leaves do not affect the deer.

input: Èpò ìbúlẹ̀ kì í pa irẹ́.
target: Creeping weeds cannot kill the silk rubber tree.

input: Erín jẹ̀ jẹ̀ jẹ̀ kò fọwọ́ kọ́ aṣá ẹ̀fọ́n jẹ̀ jẹ̀ jẹ̀ kò ki ẹsẹ̀ wọ pòòlò ẹyẹ kékéèké ń fò lókè wọn ò forí gbági.
target: The elephant forages a long time without cutting its hand on a spear the buffalo forages a long time without falling into a trap numerous small birds fly across the sky without colliding with trees.

input: Èṣì ò rọ́ba dádé Ògúnṣọṣẹ́ ò róòrùn wẹ̀wù ẹ̀jẹ̀ òdòdó ò róòrùn pọ́n ilé ọmọ lọmọ́ ti pọ́n wá.
target: Error does not await the king before it dons a crown Ogunṣọṣẹ does not wait for the sun before it dons a bloody cloak the flower does not wait for the sun before it brightens brightness comes with the child from its house.

input: Eṣinṣín ń pọntí ekòló ń ṣú ọ̀lẹ̀lẹ̀ kantí-kantí ní ká wá nǹkan dí agbè lẹ́nu kí nǹkankan má kòó sí i.
target: The fly is procuring wine while the worm is cooking bean-meal, and the sugar-fly asks them to find something to cork the gourd so nothing would enter into it.

input: Eṣú jẹ oko tán eṣù lọ eṣú lọ Wata, ilée rẹ̀.
target: The locusts are done feeding, the locusts have departed the locusts have gone to Wata, their home.

input: Èèwọ̀ ni tọwọ̀ a kì í figi ọwọ̀ dáná.
target: one does not make kindling of broomsticks.

input: Ewu iná kì í pa àwòdì.
target: The African black kite is never killed in a brushfire emergency.

input: Ewúrẹ́ ń ṣọdún, àgùtán gbàlù sẹ́yìn, òbúkọọ́ ní ká sin òun lọ sílé àna òun.
target: The goat is celebrating an event, the sheep is in a procession with drums, and the he-goat asks to be accompanied to its in-law's home.

input: Ewúrẹ́ ò lè rí ewé ọdán òkè fi ṣe nǹkan.
target: A goat can in no wise take the fig tree's leaves aloft for any purpose.

input: Ewúro ò fi tojo korò.
target: The bitter-leaf did not become bitter as a result of cowardice.

input: Èèyàn ìbáà kúrú, ìbáà búrẹ́wà, gbèsè ò sí, ìtìjú ò sí.
target: Whether a person be short or ugly, if there is no debt, there can be no disgrace.

input: Ẹbọ jíjẹ kì í pa igún.
target: The consumption of sacrificial offerings will not kill the vulture.

input: Ẹgbẹ̀rún eèrà ò lè gbé ṣúgà wọ́n ó kàn tò yí i ká lásán ni.
target: A thousand ants cannot lift a cube of sugar they can only mill around it in vain.

input: Ẹgbẹ̀rún ẹja ò lè dẹ́rù pa odò.
target: A thousand fishes will not overload a river.

input: Ẹ̀yìn ológbò kì í balẹ̀.
target: A cat's back never touches the ground.

input: Ẹjọ́ ẹlẹ́jọ́, lọ́yà ń rò ó, áḿbọ̀ǹtorí ẹjọ́ araa rẹ̀.
target: The lawyer argues other people's cases, much more his own.

input: Ẹlẹ́mùn-ún ò mú eégún.
target: An apprehender does not apprehend a masquerader.

input: Ẹ̀lúlùú ní kàkà kí òun má dun ọbẹ̀, òun á rúnwọ rúnsẹ̀ sí i.
target: The larkheeled Cuckoo vows that rather than not being delicious in the stew, it will crush its arms and legs in pursuit of that end.

input: Ẹ̀lukú tí kò ní èlè lẹgbẹ́ẹ rẹ̀ ń ṣá pa.
target: It is the Ẹ̀lukú masquerader without a matchete that is hacked to death by its colleagues.

input: Ẹní bá ń ṣiṣẹ́ kì í ṣọ̀lẹ bórí bá túnniṣe a kì í tẹ́ bọ̀rọ̀.
target: Whoever has a job should not malinger if Providence smiles on one one can hardly fail.

input: Ẹní bá ń jẹ òbúkọ tó gbójú, yó jẹ àgùtàn tó yọ̀wo.
target: Whoever is used to eating full-grown he-goats will eat lambs that have sprouted horns.

input: Ẹní bá yẹ ọ̀nà Ìjẹ̀bú tì ni yó yẹ̀ ẹ́ tán.
target: The same person who weeds the road to Ìjẹ̀bú without carrying off the weeds will eventually remove them.

input: Ẹní gbani láya ò ní kírú ẹni má rà.
target: The person who takes one's wife cannot stop one's locust bean seeds from fermenting.

input: Ẹní máa jẹun kunkun a tìlẹ̀kùn kunkun.
target: Whoever wishes to eat heartily must lock his door firmly.

input: Ẹní máa rí àtisùn akàn á pẹ́ létí isà.
target: Whoever wishes to see a crab go to sleep will stay long by its hole.

input: Ẹní máa jẹ oyin inú àpáta kìí wo ẹnu àáké.
target: Whoever will eat the honey in a rock does not worry about the edge of the axe.

input: Ẹní máa rí àtisùn-un pẹ́pẹ́yẹ á jẹ gbèsè àdín.
target: Whoever wishes to see ducks go to sleep will go into debt paying for fuel oil.

input: Ẹní yára lÒgún ń gbè.
target: Ògún is on the side of the swift.

input: Ẹni èèyàn ò kí kó yọ̀ ẹni Ọlọ́run ò kí kó ṣọ́ra.
target: Whoever is shunned by people should rejoice whoever is shunned by God should look out.

input: Ẹni ọ̀lẹ́ paá re ọ̀run òṣì ẹni iṣẹ́ paá re ọ̀run ẹ̀yẹ.
target: Whoever dies from poverty dies a miserable death whoever dies from work dies a noble death.

input: Ẹni tí ó gbin ọrún èbù tó pè é nígba, tó bá jẹ ọgọ́rùn-ún òtítọ́ tán, á wá jẹ ọgọ́rùn-ún irọ́.
target: The person who plants a hundred yam seedlings and says he planted two hundred, after he has eaten a hundred truths, he will come to eat a hundred lies.

input: Ẹni tí ó gbálẹ̀ ni ilẹ̀ ń mọ́ fún.
target: It is for the person who sweeps the floor that the floor is clean.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá ní ìtara ló ní àtètèbá.
target: It is the industrious person that wins the spoils.

input: Ẹni tí eégún ń lé kó máa rọ́jú bó ti ń rẹ ará ayé, bẹ́ẹ̀ ní ń rẹ ará ọ̀run.
target: The person being chased by a masquerader should persevere just as an earthling tires, so does the being from heaven.

input: Ẹni tí ó forí sọlẹ̀ẹ́ gbìyànjú ikú.
target: Whoever dives head first to the ground has made a creditable attempt at suicide.

input: Ẹni tí à ḿbọ́ ò mọ̀ pé ìyàn-án mú.
target: A person fed by others is never aware that there is famine.

input: Ẹni tí ó fò sókèé bẹ́ ijó lórí.
target: Whoever leaps up decapitates dance.

input: Ẹni tí iṣẹ́ ń paá yá ju ẹni tí ìṣẹ́ ń pa.
target: A person dying from overwork is better than a person dying of destitution.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá pẹ́ lẹ́yìn ni à ń yọ́ omi ọbẹ̀ dè.
target: Those who arrive late are the ones who find the watery residue of the stew awaiting them.

input: Ẹni tí ń gbẹ́lẹ̀ ní ń sìnkú ẹni tí ń sunkún ariwo ló ń pa.
target: The person digging a grave is the one performing his or her funerary duties the person crying is merely making a noise.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá wo ojú ìyàwó ní ń mọ̀ pé ìyàwó ń sunkún.
target: Only a person who looks at the bride's face knows that the bride is crying.

input: Ẹni tí ọ̀ṣọ́ bá wù kó ṣòwò ẹni ajé yalée rẹ̀ ló gbọ́n.
target: Whoever likes fineries should engage in a trade it is the person blessed by riches that is wise.

input: Ẹni tí ó bá ńjẹ lábẹ́ẹ Jẹ́gẹ́dẹ́ ní ńpè é nígi àràbà.
target: Only those whose livelihood depends on Jẹgẹdẹ call him a silk cotton tree.

input: Ẹni tí ó bẹ Ìgè Àdùbí níṣẹ́, araa rẹ̀ ló bẹ̀ Ìgè Àdùbí ò níí jẹ́, bẹ́ẹ̀ni kò níí kọ̀.
target: Whoever assigns a task to Ìgè Àdùbí assigns it to himself or herself Ìgè Àdùbí will neither agree to do the task nor will he refuse.

input: Ẹni tí kíkíi rẹ̀ ò yóni, àìkíi rẹ̀ ò lè pani lébi.
target: A person whose greetings do not fill one's stomach cannot cause one to starve by withholding the greetings.

input: Ẹnu iṣẹ́ ẹni ni a ti ń mọ ẹni lọ́lẹ.
target: It is at one's occupation that one proves oneself an idler.

input: Ẹnu òfìfo kì í dún yànmù-yànmù.
target: Empty mouths do not make chewing noises.

input: Ẹnú dùn-ún ròfọ́ agada ọwọ́ dùn-ún ṣánko.
target: The mouth cooks vegetable stew most expertly the hand emulating a machete cuts a field most effortlessly.

input: Ẹ̀rù kì í ba igbó, bẹ́ẹ̀ni kì í ba odò ẹ̀rù kì í ba ọlọ lójú ata.
target: The forest knows no fear, and neither does the river know fear the grind-stone never shows fear in the face of pepper.

input: Ẹ̀rù kì í ba orí kó sá wọnú.
target: The head is never so frightened that it disappears into the shoulder.

input: Ẹ̀rù ogun kì í ba jagun-jagun.
target: Fear of battle never afflicts a warrior.

input: Ẹsẹ̀ kì í wúwo kí ẹlésẹ̀ má lè gbé e.
target: The feet are never so heavy that the owner cannot lift them.

input: Ẹ̀sọ̀ ẹ̀sọ̀ ni ìgbín fi ń gbà gun igi.
target: Slowly slowly is the way a snail climbs a tree.

input: Ẹṣin kì í dani kí á má tún gùn ún.
target: One does not refrain from mounting a horse that has thrown one.

input: Ẹṣin kì í já kó já èkejìi rẹ̀.
target: A horse does not get loose and stop to free its companion.

input: Ẹ̀tẹ́ bá ọ̀lẹ.
target: Disgrace comes upon the shiftless.

input: Ẹyẹ ò sọ fún ẹyẹ pé òkò ń bọ̀.
target: A bird does not tell a bird that a stone is on its way.

input: Fi gọ̀gọ̀ sílẹ̀ fún ọ̀dáwé fi ọkọ sílẹ̀ fún onílara.
target: Leave the hooked stick alone for the leaf plucker leave the husband alone for the jealous woman.

input: Fífẹ́ la fẹ́ ẹ̀fọ́ tí à ń pèé ní ọ̀rẹ́ ẹ̀kọ ti ilé ogeé tó ogeé jẹ.
target: It is only because one loves spinach that one calls it a friend of corn loaf what the dandy has at home is enough food for him or her.

input: Fọ́ ẹ̀kọ ká jọ mu ú, kò tó ọkọlóbìnrin-ín ṣe ni.
target: Prepare the corn pap and let us eat it together is an indication that the speaker lacks what it takes to be a husband.

input: Gbẹ́dó-gbẹ́dó kan ò lè fi ọ̀gẹ̀dẹ̀ ṣe nǹkan.
target: No carver of mortars can do a thing to the banana stem.

input: Ìbẹ̀rù ejò ò jẹ́ ká tẹ ọmọ ejò mọ́lẹ̀.
target: Fear of the snake keeps one from stepping on the young of the snake.

input: Ibi gbogbo ní ń rọ àdàbà lọ́rùn.
target: Every place is hospitable and comfortable for the dove.

input: Ibi gbogbo nilẹ̀ ọ̀wọ̀.
target: Every place deserves to be treated with respect and reverence.

input: Ibi tí a ní kí gbégbé má gbèé, ibẹ̀ ní ń gbé.
target: The spot one cautions the gbégbé plant not to inhabit, there it will surely inhabit.

input: Ibi tí a ní kí tẹ̀tẹ̀ má tẹ̀, ibẹ̀ ní ń tẹ̀.
target: Wherever one orders wild spinach not to step on, there it will surely trample.

input: Ibo ni imú wà sẹnu Ibo ni Làǹlátẹ̀ẹ́ wà sí Èrúwà
target: How much distance exists between the nose and the mouth How much distance exists between Làǹlátẹ̀ and Èrúwà

input: Idà kì í lọ kídà má bọ̀.
target: The sword never departs without returning.

input: Ìdẹra ò kan àgbà.
target: Ease has nothing to do with age.

input: Igi kì í dá lóko kó pa ará ilé.
target: A tree does not snap in the forest and kill a person at home.

input: Igúnnugún pa guuru mádìẹ kò leè gbe.
target: The vulture rushes at the chicken, but it cannot carry it off.

input: Igba eṣinṣin kì í dènà de ọwọ̀.
target: Two hundred flies will not lie in ambush for a broom.

input: Igba ẹranko kì í dènà de ẹkùn.
target: Two hundred animals will not lie in ambush for a leopard.

input: Ìgbà yí làárọ̀ Arúgbó ń kọgba.
target: Is it just morning now The old man is striving to make two hundred heaps a day.

input: Ìgbà yí làárọ̀ Arúgbó ń ṣoge.
target: Is it just morning now The old person is grooming himselfherself.

input: Ìgbé a gbé ìyàwó kò ṣéé gbé owó.
target: The strategy one adopts in acquiring a wife will not do with regard to money.

input: Igbe kí-ni-ngó-jẹ-sùn ní ḿpọ̀lẹ.
target: The cry What shall I eat for supper is what kills the lazy person.

input: Ìgbín kì í tẹnu mọ́gi kó má gùn ún.
target: The snail will not fasten unto a tree and fail to climb it.

input: Ìgbín kọ mímì ejò.
target: The snail rejects the fate of being swallowed by a snake.

input: Ìjà ò mọ ẹ̀gbọ́n, ó sọ àbúrò dakin.
target: Fighting knows not who is the elder it makes a hero of the younger.

input: Ìje òun oore ní ń mú ọmọ ṣiṣẹ́.
target: Competition and reward are the inducements for a child to work hard.

input: Ìjèṣà ò nídìi ìṣáná ilé lọmọ Ọwá ti ń fọnná lọ sóko.
target: The Ìjèṣà person does not need matches it is from the home that the scion of Ọwa takes burning faggots to the farm.

input: Ìjẹkújẹ kì í pa ahanrandi.
target: Careless eating does not kill the worm ahanrandi.

input: Ikán ò lè rí ṣe lára ìgànná.
target: The termite can have no adverse effect on a wall.

input: Ìkòkò tí yó jẹ ata, ìdí ẹ̀ á gbóná.
target: The pot that wishes to eat pepper stew will first endure a scalded bottom.

input: Ìkọ́ kì í kọ́ ejò lẹ́sẹ̀.
target: A snare never catches a snake in the leg.

input: Ikọ̀ tí ò mọ iṣẹ́ẹ́ jẹ́ ní ń jẹ́ ẹ lẹ́ẹ̀mejèe.
target: It is the messenger who does not know how to deliver a message properly that delivers it seven times over.

input: Ilá kì í ga ju akórè lọ kó má tẹ̀ ẹ́ ká.
target: The okro plant is never so much taller than the harvester that heshe cannot bend it to harvest.

input: Òjò ìbá rọ̀, kí ladẹ́tẹ̀ ìbá gbìn Ọwọ́ adẹ́tẹ̀ ò ká ẹyọ àgbàdo mẹ́wàá.
target: Were it to rain, what would the leper have planted A leper's palm cannot scoop ten grains of corn.

input: Òjò pamí, òjò pa èreè mi òjò ò pa ẹwà araà mi dànù.
target: The rain may beat me, and the rain may beat my statue the rain cannot wash away my good looks.

input: Òjò-ó pọnmi fún ọ̀lẹ, kò ṣẹ́gi fún ọ̀lẹ.
target: The rain provides water for the lazy person but it does not fetch firewood for the lazy person.

input: Òjòó pa alágùnúndì, àgúndìí domi ìyàwó ń retí àgúndì, ọkọ́ sùn sóko.
target: Rain beats the man carrying pounded yams wrapped in leaves, the pounded yams become water-logged the wife awaits the pounded yams, the husband sleeps on the farm.

input: Òjó jìyà gbé alágbáraá bú u, ó gun àjà a tọ̀ ọ́.
target: Òjó is victimized without recourse a bully insults him, he goes to hide in the rafters, and his nemesis follows him there.

input: Òjòó pa odídẹ àlùkò ń yọ̀, àlùkòó rò pé ìkó bàjẹ́ òjó mú ìkó wọṣọ.
target: Rain beats the parrot and the touraco rejoices, thinking that the parrot's tail feather is ruined the rain only makes the tail feather brighter.

input: Òjòjò ọ̀lẹ ò tán bọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀lẹ́ bà á tì ó dáná orí.
target: A lazy person's illness is not soon over the lazy person finds no way out and prepares a fire to warm his head.

input: Ojú abanijẹ́ pọ́n, kò lè tan fìtílà.
target: The detractor's eyes glow red, but they cannot light a lamp.

input: Ojú ànaà mi ò sunwọ̀n kò ju kó gba ọmọ ẹ̀ lọ.
target: The look on my parent-in-law's face is baleful the worst heshe can do is take hisher daughter back.

input: Ojú kì í pọ́n iṣin ká má bàá wóró nínú ẹ̀.
target: The Akee apple is never so blighted that one does not find a seed in it.

input: Ojú kì í pọ́n iṣin kó má là.
target: The Akee apple is never so blighted that it does not eventually split open.

input: Ojú là ń rọ́ ògó ṣòroó ṣe.
target: One only tries one's best heroic deeds do not come easy.

input: Ojú lakàn-án fi ń ṣọ́ orí.
target: The crab watches after its head with its eyes.

input: Ojú mẹ́wàá kò jọ ojú ẹni.
target: Ten eyes are not like one's own.

input: Ojú ò fẹ́rakù tí ń ta ajá ẹ lókòó ó fowó ṣíyán jẹ.
target: We might see each other again who sells his dog for twenty cowries and spent the money on pounded yams to eat.

input: Ojú olójú kì í gba ọ̀ràn fúnni wò.
target: Other people's eyes will not look after matters for one.

input: Ojú olójú ò jọ ojú ẹni a-ṣọ́ràn-deni ò wọ́pọ̀.
target: Other people's eyes are nothing like one's owń minders of other people's business are few.

input: Ojú pọ́n koko má fọ̀ọ́ ọ̀gẹ̀dẹ̀ pọ́n koko má rọ̀ ọ̀rán fini dùgbẹ̀-dùgbẹ̀ yunni nù ọ̀ràn tí ń finni ò leè pani.
target: The eyes go red but do not go blind the banana goes brilliant yellow but does not rot a problem rattles one to one's foundations and lets one go a problem that rattles one will not kill one.

input: Ojú rẹ́gbin kò fọ́ a-jọ̀pọ̀-ìyà-má-rù.
target: like one who sustains a succession of sufferings without wasting away.

input: Ojú ti kókó, ojú ti eéwo ojú ti aáràgbá ìdí pẹ̀lú.
target: The lump that attacks the head is shamed, the boil is shamed, and the hardened tissue on the buttocks is shames also.

input: Ojú tí ń pọ́n awo àpọ́nkú kọ́ ìyà tí ń jẹ awo àjẹlà ìṣẹ́ tí ń ṣẹ́ awo à-ṣẹ́-ṣẹ́-obì-jẹ ni.
target: The suffering that the babaláwo is experiencing is not something that leads to death the hard times that the babaláwo is going through is one that leads to riches the vicissitudes that now befall the babaláwo are ones that leave room for taking a bite of kola-nut.

input: Ojú tó ti rí gbẹ̀lẹ̀dẹ́ ti rópin ìran.
target: The eyes that have seen gbẹ̀lẹ̀dẹ́ have seen the ultimate in sights.

input: Ojú tó ti rókun ò ní rọ́sà kó bẹ̀rù.
target: The eyes that have seen the ocean will not tremble at the sight of the lagoon.

input: Ojúmọ́ kì í mọ́ kí ọwọ́ má yùn-ún ẹnu.
target: Never a day dawns that the hand does not make a trip to the mouth.

input: Ojúoró ní ń lékè omi òṣíbàtà ní ń lékè odò.
target: The water lettuce always winds up on the surface of the water the water-lily always wings up on the surface of the stream.

input: Òkè lẹyẹ ń fọhùn.
target: It is from aloft that the bird sounds off.

input: Òkè méjì kì í bínú ẹni bí a bá gun ọ̀kan, à sì máa rọ ọ̀kan.
target: One cannot be bedeviled by two hills if one ascends a hill, one descends a hill.

input: Òkété fìjà sẹ́yìn ó dọ́jà tán ó káwọ́ lérí.
target: The giant bush rat turns its back at the place where he has a quarrel after getting to the market it clamps its hands on its head.

input: Òkìkí ajá kì í pa oṣù.
target: A dog's howling will not kill the moon.

input: Òkìkí ò poṣù ariwo ò pagún ibi ẹ rí ẹ kíbòsíì mi lọ.
target: Being widely reputed does not kill the moon being noised about does not kill the vulture wherever you please, make a noise about me.

input: Oko etílé ladìẹ́ lè ro.
target: The chicken is good at cultivating only the soil close by the home.

input: Òkò kan igi òkò padà sẹ́yìn kí o rebi o ti wá.
target: Stone, hit a tree, stone retrace your steps and return to whence you came.

input: Òkú ò moye à ń ràgọ̀.
target: The corpse does not know the cost of the shroud.

input: Òkú ọdún mẹ́ta kúrò ní àlejò sàréè.
target: A three-year-old corpse of is no longer a newcomer to the grave.

input: Òkú ọ̀lẹ ò ní pósí.
target: A lazy person's corpse does not merit a coffin.

input: Olójú kì í fojú ẹ̀ sílẹ̀ kí tàlùbọ́ kó wọ̀ ọ́.
target: The owner of the eyes will not neglect them and watch foreign matter lodge in them.

input: Olówó kì í fi owó ẹ̀ fún abòṣì ná.
target: The rich person will not give hisher money to a poor person to spend.

input: Olówó mọ òwò.
target: The rich person is an expert at trading.

input: Olúmọ Ẹ̀gbá ò ṣéé gbé.
target: The Olúmọ of the Ègbá territory is impossible to carry.

input: Omi adágún ò lè gbé màlúù lọ.
target: A stagnant pool cannot carry off a cow.

input: Omi ló dànù, agbè ò fọ́.
target: It is the water that is spilled the water gourd is not broken.

input: Omi ń bẹ látọ́.
target: There is water in the long-necked calabash.

input: Omi ṣẹ́lẹ̀rú ò mu akèrègbè.
target: The water from a new spring will not cover a gourd to the top.

input: Omí wọ́ yanrìn gbẹrẹrẹ, bẹ́ẹ̀ni omi ò lọ́wọ́, omi ò lẹ́sẹ̀.
target: Water drags the sand about, and yet water lacks hands and lacks legs.

input: Oní ló ń mọ, ìjà ọ̀lẹ.
target: It will all end some time today a lazy person's motto in a fight.

input: Òní, Mò ń lọ ọ̀la, Mò ń lọ, kò jẹ́ kí àlejò gbin awùsá.
target: Today, I am leaving tomorrow, I am leaving, prevents the sorjourner from planting awùsá.

input: Òní ọ̀wẹ̀, ọ̀la àáró iṣẹ́ oníṣẹ́ ò jẹ́ ká ráàyè ṣe tẹni.
target: Today, a communal project tomorrow group work on a somebody's farm other people's work prevents one from doing one's own.

input: Oníbàjẹ́ ò lódó ẹnu gbogbo lodóo wọn.
target: Detractors of others have no pestles their mouths are their pestles.

input: Oníbànà ní ń tọ́jú òroǹbó onídẹ ní ń tọ́jú awẹdẹ.
target: It is he who has copper ornaments who must procure oranges whoever has brass ornaments must procure the herb awẹdẹ.

input: Onígbèsè èèyàn-án ti kú a ò tíì sìnkú ẹ̀ ni.
target: The habitual debtor is already dead except that he ha not yet been buried.

input: OníṢàngó ò mẹni tí òún ń wà lóògì dànù.
target: The Ṣàngó worshipper knows not whose ground corn he is spilling.

input: Oníṣe kì í fiṣe ẹ̀ sílẹ̀ re ibi ó ń re àjò ó mú iṣe ẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ gírígírí.
target: The owner of a habit will not go on a journey and leave his habit at home when he goes he takes his habit along with him.

input: Oníṣòwó wà lóòrùn náwónáwó wà níbòji.
target: The person who does the trading is in the sun the person who spends the money is in the shade.

input: Oníṣú fiṣu ẹ se ẹ̀bẹ ojú ti atèèpojẹ.
target: The owner of the yams makes yam pottage out of the yams the person who eats the yam scrapings off the peels is shamed.

input: Orí adẹ́tù ń pète àrán orí adáràn-án ń pète àtijọba.
target: The head that wears a cloth cap strives to wear a velvet cap the one that wears a velvet cap strives to become a king.

input: Orí iṣẹ́ laago ń kú lé.
target: It is while at work that a clock dies.

input: Orí kì í tóbi kólórí má lè gbé e.
target: A head is never so heavy that the owner cannot carry it.

input: Orí ń lá kì í pá tán.
target: A huge head does not go completely bald.

input: Orí olórí kì í báni gbẹ́rù.
target: Other people's heads will not carry one's load for one.

input: Òrìṣà tí ń gbọ̀lẹ ò sí apá ẹni ní ń gbeni.
target: There is no god that comes to the aid of shiftless people only one's arms aid one.

input: Oríta mẹ́ta ò kọnnú ẹbọ.
target: A crossroads where three roads meet is not afraid of sacrificial offerings.

input: Òru ni ìnàyìn àgbẹ̀.
target: Night time is a farmer's time to stretch the back.

input: Oòrùn ò kan àtàrí, ọwọ́ ò dá.
target: The sun has not risen directly above the head working hands cannot cease their toil.

input: Oòrùn ò pa ọ́, òjò ò pa ọ́, o ní ò ń ṣiṣẹ́ ajé.
target: The sun does not beat you, the rain does not beat you, and yet you say you are engaged in a gainful pursuit.

input: Òṣìṣẹ́ lọ̀tá ọ̀lẹ.
target: The industrious person is the enemy of the shiftless person.

input: Òṣìṣẹ́ wà lóòrùn ẹní máa jẹ́ wà níbòji.
target: The laborer is in the sun the person who will reap the fruit is in the shade.

input: Oṣù mẹ́ta lebi ń pàgbẹ̀.
target: The farmer's hunger lasts only three months.

input: Òwò àdà kì í pa àdá òwò ọkọ́ kì í yọ ọkọ́ lẹ́nu.
target: A machete's trade does not kill the machet a hoe's trade does not cause problems for the hoe.

input: Owó ò mọ ẹ̀gbọ́n, ó sọ àbúrò dàgbà.
target: Wealth does not know who is the elder it makes a senior of the younger person.

input: Owó ò níran àfi ẹni tí kò bá ṣiṣẹ́.
target: Money has no lineage except for the person who will not work.

input: Òwò tí a bá máa ṣe àṣelà, a kì í rí àpá ẹ̀ lára ẹni.
target: The trade that one will pursue and that will make one prosper does not leave scars on one.

input: Òwò tí a fowó rà, owó la fi ń pa.
target: Merchandise that one buys with money, one earns money for.

input: Òwò tí a ó ṣe là ń tọ́jú Òjí fabẹ họra.
target: The trade one will pursue is the one one protects Òjí scratches his body with a razor.

input: Owó olówó leégún ń ná.
target: Other people's money is what the masquerader spends.

input: Òyìnbó baba ọ̀nájà ajé baba téní-téní.
target: The white man is the past master of trading money is the guarantee of fashionableness.

input: Òyìnbó ta ọjà ta orúkẹ Ègún tajà ta èdìdì.
target: The white man sells merchandise with the name brand still attached the Ègùn person sells cloth still in its bundle.

input: Ọba tó fi iyùn bọlẹ̀, ọba tó wú u, àwọn méjèèjì la ó máa sọ orúkọọ wọn.
target: The king who buries coral beads, the king who digs them up, both of then will have their names remembered by posterity.

input: Ọba tó sọ ẹgàn di erùfù ọba tó sọ erùfù dẹgàn, àwọn méjèèjì la ó máa sọ orúkọọ wọn.
target: The king who turned a forest into a sandy plain, the king who turned a sandy plain into a forest, both of their names will be remembered by posterity.

input: Ọbẹ̀ tó dùn, owó ló pa á.
target: A delicious stew was procured with money.

input: Ọbẹ̀ẹ́ tutù tán, a dawọ́ bù ú lá.
target: The stew having cooled, one hollows one's palm to eat it.

input: Ọ̀dájú ló bí owó ìtìjú ló bí gbèsè.
target: It is brazenness that gives birth to wealth it is excessive reticence that gives birth to poverty.

input: Ọdọọdún làgbẹ̀ ń níyì.
target: It is every year that the farmer receives praise.

input: Ọdún yìí ọdẹ́ pa erin ẹ̀ẹ̀míràn ọdẹ́ pa ẹfọ̀n ọdún mẹ́fà ọdẹ́ pa òló ọlá ń rewájú, tàbí ọlá ńrẹ̀yìn
target: This year the hunter kills an elephant the next year the hunter kills a buffalo two years hence the hunter kills a grass mouse is his glory increasing or decreasing

input: Ọ̀gẹ̀dẹ̀ dúdú ò ṣéé bùṣán ọmọ burúkú ò ṣéé lù pa.
target: An unripe plantain is not something to eat a useless child is not something to beat to death.

input: Ọgbọ́n òyìnbó ti ojú òkun là wá aṣọ kí ni o borí akẹsẹ
target: The white man's wisdom shines even across the seas what cloth, though, is better than akẹsẹ cloth

input: Ọjà tí a fowó rà, owó la fi ń pa.
target: One makes money from goods one purchased with money.

input: Ọ̀-jẹ-wọ̀mù-wọ̀mù-kú-wọ̀mù-wọ̀mù lorúkọ tí àpà ń jẹ́.
target: One-who-eats-recklessly-and-dies-recklessly is the name one calls a wasteful person.

input: Ọjọ́ a bá kọ́ ọ̀lẹ là ń kọ́ inú rírọ́.
target: The day one learns laziness is the day one should learn how to endure a painfully empty stomach.

input: Ọjọ́ a bá rí ìbí nìbí ń wọlẹ̀.
target: The day one sees the after-birth is the day it enters the earth.

input: Ọjọ́ eré lọ̀ràn ń dun ọ̀lẹ.
target: It is on the day of relaxation that the lazy person experiences regret.

input: Ọjọ́ tí a dóko là ń jìjà ilẹ̀.
target: The day one gets to the farm is the day one fights over boundaries.

input: Ọjọ́ tí a ń kọ́ṣẹ́ là ń kọ́ ìyára.
target: The day one learns a trade is the day one learns to be quick at it.

input: Ọ̀kàràkàrà ń ké, ẹnu ẹ̀ ń bẹ́jẹ̀ ó ní bí ẹnu òún ya dé ìpàkọ́, òun ó sàáà máa wí tòun.
target: Ọ̀kàràkàrà is calling and blood drips from its beaks it says even if its mouth tears to the occiput it will continue its calling.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ bà á tì, ó kó sílé Ifá.
target: The lazy person fails at everything, whereupon he becomes an Ifá acolyte.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ bà á tì, ó kó sílée kéú.
target: The lazy person fails at everything, whereupon he goes to a Quaranic school.

input: Ọ̀lẹ, baba àrùn.
target: Laziness, father of all diseases.

input: Ọ̀lẹ èèyàn ò rí ayé wá.
target: A lazy person has found no world to come to.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ fẹ́ àrùn kù, ó bú pùrù sẹ́kún.
target: The lazy person cannot find a disease to contract, he bursts into tears.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ fi ọ̀ràn gbogbo ṣe hòo.
target: The lazy person replies yes to all propositions.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ jogún ìbànújẹ́, ó ní òún jogún ìran òun.
target: The lazy person inherits unhappiness, he says he has inherited the fate of his lineage.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ jogún ìbáwí.
target: The lazy person inherits recriminations.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ kákò, ó di òjòjò.
target: The lazy person curls up, and his condition becomes a serious ailment.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ kún àárẹ̀ lọ́wọ́.
target: Laziness lends weariness a hand.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ mọ èèwọ̀ ìjà ó ní bàbá òún ní kóun má jà lọ́nà oko.
target: he says his father has ordered him not to fight on the way to the farm.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ ní ọjọ́ tí ikú bá pa òun, inú òhun á dùn.Ikú ní òun ó jẹ̀ẹ́ kí ojú ẹ̀ rí màbo.
target: The lazy person says on the day he dies, he will be happy.Death says he will visit him the lazy person with suffering that is out of this world.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ ní ọjọ́ tí òún bá kú òun ó yọ̀ ohun tí ojú ọ̀lẹ́ máa rí kó tó kú ń kọ́
target: The coward says he will rejoice on the day he dies but what about the woes he will experience before he dies

input: Ọ̀lẹ ò yẹẹ́ ní lọ́mọ.
target: A lazy person is not something one wants as a child.

input: Ọ̀lẹ́ wáṣẹ́ rírọ̀ ṣe.
target: The lazy person seeks out an easy task to do.

input: Ọlọgbọ́n kì í kú sóko ọ̀lẹ bí ọlọgbọ́n bá kú sóko ọ̀lẹ, ọ̀ràn náà nídìí.
target: The wise will not die on a farm for the lazy if a wise person dies on a farm for the lazy, there must be some explanation.

input: Ọlọ́mú dá ọmú ìyá ẹ̀ gbé.
target: Each child must lift its mother's breast by itself.

input: Ọlọ́run yó pèsè kì í ṣe bí èsè oríta.
target: The Lord will give alms, but not the type one comes upon at crossroads.

input: Ọmọ tí yó jẹ̀ẹ́ àṣàmú, kékeré ní ń tií n ṣẹnu ṣámú-ṣámú.
target: A person that will become exemplary will begin showing precociousness from childhood.

input: Ọmọ tó káwọ́ sókè ló fẹ́ ká gbé òun.
target: It is the child that lifts up its arms that induces people to lift it.

input: Ọmọ tó ṣípá fúnni là ń gbé jó.
target: It is the child that lifts its arms to one that one picks up to dance with.

input: Ọmọdé ò mọ ibi tí à ń pọn òun rè.
target: A child does not know where the person who carries it on her back is headed with it.

input: Ọ̀mu ní ń gbe ọ̀mu mì.
target: It is drunkenness that swallows or drowns a champion drinker.

input: Ọ̀nà kì í dí mọ́ aládàá.
target: The path does not close on a man carrying a machete.

input: Ọ̀ràn búburú kì í bá ikún nílé.
target: An evil event never finds the squirrel at home.

input: Ọ̀ràn fini dùgbẹ̀-dùgbẹ̀ yinni nù ọ̀ràn fini dùgbẹ̀-dùgbẹ̀ bí ẹnipé kò ní í tán ọ̀ràn ń bọ̀ wá tán ojú á tẹlẹ́gàn, a sì ti ẹni tí ń yọnusọ.
target: A problem shakes one up vigorously and lets one go a problem shakes one up vigorously as though it would never end the trouble will end, deflating the ill-wishers and also those who will not mind their own business.

input: Ọrùn kì í wọ òṣùká ẹlẹ́rù lọrùn ń wọ̀.
target: The pad placed on the head to soften the friction of the load on the head does not suffer from the weight the person carrying the load is the one whose neck suffers under the weight.

input: Ọwọ́ atẹ́gùn ò ká gẹdú.
target: The wind is no match for timber.

input: Ọwọ́ ẹni la fi ńtú ìwà ara ẹni ṣe.
target: One's own hands are what one uses to mend one's fortune.

input: Ọwọ́ ẹni ni yó yòóni.
target: One hands are what feed one to satiation.

input: Ọwọ́ ní ń tún ara ṣe.
target: The hands are the agents for grooming the body.

input: Ọwọ́ tó dilẹ̀ là ń fi lérán.
target: It is on an idle hand that one rests one's chin.

input: Ọyẹ́ ni yó kìlọ̀ fún onítòbí.
target: It is the harmattan that will teach the person who has only a loin cloth a lesson.

input: Pa á ní ń jẹ́ ọgbẹ́, tiiri ní ń jẹ ọfà bí a bá ta á ṣe là ń wá a bí a ò bá wá a a dẹran ìdin.
